Dualists believe in a binary universe, that there is a spiritual world in addition to the material world.” “Well, as a computer geek, I have to believe in the binary universe.” The Librarian raises his eyebrows. “How does that follow?”

Hiro grabs the antenna and pulls. He might as well take the headset with him—it must have something to do with the way L. Bob Rife controls the Raft.

At least two of the plurality of conductive terminals of the first connector are spaced apart from at least two of the plurality of conductive terminals of the second connector. Each of the plurality of conductive terminals of the first connector corresponds to one of the plurality of conductive terminals of the second connector. A distance between each of the plurality of conductive terminals of the first connector and corresponding one of the plurality of conductive

66.content: Raven's packing a torpedo warhead that he boosted from an old Soviet nuke sub. It was a torpedo that was designed to take out a carrier battle group with one shot. A nuclear torpedo. You know that funny-looking sidecar that Raven has on his Harley? Well, it's a hydrogen bomb, man. Armed and ready. The trigger's hooked up to EEG trodes embedded in his skull. If Raven dies, the bomb goes off. So when Raven comes into town, we do everything in our power to make the man feel welcome.”

In one implementation, a method includes receiving, by a computing device from a user via a graphical user interface (GUI), biometric data associated with the user; comparing, by the computing device, the received biometric data to stored biometric data associated with the user; determining, by the computing device, whether the received biometric data matches the stored biometric data; in response to determining that the received biometric data matches the stored biometric data, authenticating, by the computing device, the user as being authorized to use the computing device; and enabling, by the computing device, execution of at least one operation requested by the user using the computing device.

The system may include one or more sensors configured to collect physiological data associated with the individual, such as heart rate variability (HRV), galvanic skin response (GSR), electrodermal activity (EDA), respiratory sinus arrhythmia (RSA), blood oxygen saturation (SpO2), pulse wave transit time (PWV), photoplethysmography (PPG), electromyography (EMG), glucose level, body posture, muscle tension, facial expressions, eye movements, brain waves, etc. The system may also include at least one processor configured to analyze the collected physiological data in order to determine whether the individual's physical and/or emotional well-being is improving or deteriorating. In some embodiments, the system

69.content: When you sign on to a workstation in the morning, it's not like the central computer doesn't notice that fact. The central computer notices just about everything. Keeps track of every key you hit on the keyboard, all day long, what time you hit it, down to the microsecond, whether it was the right key or the wrong key, how many mistakes you make and when you make them.
69.title: Computer-implemented systems and methods for detecting unauthorized access to a computing device
69.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include computer-implemented methods, computer program products, and systems for detecting unauthorized access to a computing device. In one implementation, a method includes determining that an amount of data stored in volatile memory of the computing device exceeds a predetermined threshold. The method also includes identifying at least one suspicious process running on the computing device. The method further includes transmitting information associated with the at least one suspicious process from the computing device to a remote server. The method additionally includes causing execution of the at least one suspicious process to be terminated.

70.content: You want to talk contact patches? Your car's tires have tiny contact patches, talk to the asphalt in four places the size of your tongue. The Deliverator's car has big sticky tires with contact patches the size of a fat lady's thighs. The Deliverator is in touch with the road, starts like a bad day, stops on a peseta. Why is the Deliverator so equipped? Because people rely on him. He is a roll model.
70.title: Sticky tires for autonomous delivery vehicles
70.abstract: A sticky tire is provided. The sticky tire includes a base and a plurality of protrusions extending outwardly from the base, wherein at least some of the protrusions are configured to engage with a road surface when the sticky tire is in contact with the road surface such that the sticky tire adheres to the road surface during rotation of the sticky tire relative to the road surface.

71.content: ” “Execution? Like executing a computer program?” “Yes. Apparently, they are like algorithms for carrying out certain activities essential to the society. Some of them have to do with the workings of priesthood and kingship. Some explain how to carry out religious ceremonies. Some relate to the arts of war and diplomacy. Many of them are about the arts and crafts: music, carpentry, smithing, tanning, building, farming, even such simple tasks as lighting fires.” “The operating system of society.”

71.abstract: Provided is an operating system for a society, the operating system comprising: a plurality of sensors configured to acquire sensor data; and at least one processor coupled to the plurality of sensors, wherein the at least one processor is configured to: determine whether or not predetermined conditions are satisfied using the sensor data acquired by the plurality of sensors; in response to determining that the predetermined conditions are satisfied, control operation of at least one apparatus selected from the group consisting of air conditioner, refrigerator, washing machine, dishwasher, oven, microwave oven, rice cooker, water purifier, vacuum cleaner, humidifier, dehumidifier, heater, fan, lighting device, speaker, television, projector, printer, scanner, photocopier, pager, vending machine, security camera, door lock

72.content: The acrid smoke of the burning grass obscures some of the details. She thinks: The edges of the wings look like something I've seen before. They look like the thin metal vanes that run up the outside of a window air conditioner, the ones that you can write your name in by mashing them down with your finger. Or like the radiator on a car. The fan blows air over the radiator to cool off the engine. “It's got radiators,” she says. “The Rat Thing has got radiators to cool off.” She's gathering intel right at this very moment.
72.title: Apparatus and method for cooling a rat
72.abstract: A device for cooling a rat includes a housing having an outer surface. A heating element is disposed within the housing, wherein the heating element is configured to generate heat in response to electrical power being supplied thereto. An inner surface of the housing has a plurality of protrusions extending outwardly from the inner surface toward the outer surface thereof. The plurality of protrusions are configured to dissipate at least a portion of the heat generated by the heating element away from the heating element towards the outer surface of the housing.

73.content: It draws a crowd just sitting on the parking lot—the other salesmen actually put down their coffee cups and take their feet off their desks to go outside and look at it. It looks like a black land torpedo. Two-wheel drive, natch. The wheels are so advanced they're not even wheels—they look like giant, heavy-duty versions of the smartwheels that high-speed skateboards use, independently telescoping spokes with fat traction pads on the ends. Dangling out over the front, in the nose cone of the motorcycle, is the sensor package that monitors road conditions, decides where to place each spoke as it rolls forward, how much to extend it, and how to rotate the footpad for maximum traction. It's all controlled by a bios—a Built-In Operating System—an onboard computer with a flat-panel screen built into the top of the fuel tank.
73.title: Motorcycle with retractable spoked wheels
73.abstract: A motorcycle includes a frame, a front wheel rotatably mounted to the frame, and a rear wheel rotatably mounted to the frame. The motorcycle also includes a retraction mechanism configured to selectively move at least one of the front wheel and the rear wheel between an extended position and a retracted position relative to the frame.

The Deliverator hears a discordant beetling over the metal hurricane of his sound system and realizes that it is a smoke alarm, coming from inside the franchise. Mute button on the stereo. Oppressive silence—his eardrums uncringe—the window is buzzing with the cry of the smoke alarm. The car idles, waiting.

An apparatus for detecting the presence of one or more smoke alarms in a building is also disclosed. 77.content: When Hiro pulls, what's left of the guy's head twists around, but the antenna doesn't come loose. And that's how Hiro figures out that this isn't a headset at all. The antenna has been permanently grafted onto the base of the man's skull. Hiro switches his goggles into millimeter-wave radar and stares into the man's ruined head. The antenna is attached to the skull by means of short screws that go into the bone, but do not pierce all the way through. The base of the antenna contains a few microchips, whose purpose Hiro cannot divine by looking at them. But nowadays you can put a supercomputer on a single chip, so anytime you see more than one chip together in one place, you're looking at significant ware. A single hair-thin wire emerges from the base of the antenna and penetrates the skull. It passes straight through to the brainstem and then branches and re-branches into a network of invisibly tiny wires embedded in the brain tissue. Coiled around the base of the tree. Which explains why this guy continues to pump out a steady stream of Raft babble even when his brain is missing: It looks like L. Bob Rife has figured out a way to make electrical contact with the part of the brain where Asherah lives. These words aren't originating here. It's a pentecostal radio broadcast coming through on his antenna. Reason is still up top, its monitor screen radiating blue static toward heaven. Hiro finds the hard power switch and turns it off.
77.title: Method and apparatus for communicating with a subject's brain via an implanted antenna
77.abstract: A method of communicating with a subject's brain includes the steps of (a) providing at least one electromagnetic signal to stimulate neurons in the subject's brain, wherein the at least one electromagnetic signal is transmitted by means of an implanted antenna; (b) sensing neural activity within the subject's brain as a response to the at least one electromagnetic signal; and (c) analyzing the sensed neural activity. A system for communicating with a subject's brain includes an implanted antenna configured to provide at least one electromagnetic signal to stimulate neurons in the subject's brain so as to sense neural activity within the subject's brain as a response to the at least one electromagnetic signal provided by the implanted antenna. An article of manufacture includes a non-transitory computer readable medium having instructions stored thereon that, when executed by processing circuitry, cause the processing circuit

78.content: The businessman reaches across his body with his right hand, grips the handle of his sword just below the guard, draws it out, snaps it forward so it's pointing at Hiro, then places his left hand on the grip just below the right. Hiro does the same. Both of them bend their knees, dropping into a low squat while keeping the torso bolt upright, then stand up again and shuffle their feet into the proper stance—feet parallel, both pointed straight ahead, right foot in front of the left foot. The businessman turns out to have a lot of zanshin. Translating this concept into English is like translating “fuckface” into Nipponese, but it might translate into “emotional intensity” in football lingo. He charges directly at Hiro, hollering at the top of his lungs. The movement actually consists of a very rapid shuffling motion of the feet, so that he stays balanced at all times. At the last moment, he draws the sword up over his head and snaps it down toward Hiro. Hiro brings his own sword up, rotating it around sideways so that the handle is up high, above and to the left of his face, and the blade slopes down and to the right, providing a roof above him. The businessman's blow bounces off this roof like rain, and then Hiro sidesteps to let him go by and snaps the sword down toward his unprotected shoulder. But the businessman is moving too fast, and Hiro's timing is off. The blade cuts behind and to the side of the businessman. Both men wheel to face each other, back up, get back into the stance.
78.title: Method and apparatus for sword fighting
78.abstract: A method of sword fighting is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: (a) providing a plurality of swords; (b) arranging at least some of the swords in an array, wherein adjacent swords are spaced apart from each other by a predetermined distance; (c) positioning one or more players relative to the array so as to be able to engage with the swords arranged in the array; and (d) enabling movement of the player(s) relative to the array such that the player(s) can engage with the swords located in the array.

79.content: They have a new species here too: people with antennas coming out of their heads. The antennas look like the ones on cop walkie-talkies: short, blunt, black rubber whips. They rise up from behind the ear. The first time she sees one of these people, she figures it must be some kind of new Walkman, and she wants to ask the guy where he got it, what he's listening to.

Chinese peasants who do the grunt work for 'em.” When they arrive, the first authority figures on the scene, it is obvious why Raven decided to let himself get chased into a hop field: It is great cover. The hops are heavy, flowering vines that grow on trellises lashed together out of long bamboo poles.
80.title: Method and apparatus for harvesting hops

The apparatus includes a frame, a conveyor belt coupled to the frame such that the conveyor belt is rotatable about an axis of rotation relative to the frame, wherein the conveyor belt comprises a plurality of rows of teeth configured to engage with hops as the conveyor belt rotates around the axis of rotation, and at least one cutting blade positioned below the conveyor belt so as to cut the hops when the hops are engaged by the plurality of rows of teeth. 81.content: The next ship is the Enterprise. The two giant vessels, the tanker and the aircraft carrier, ride parallel, anywhere from ten to fifty feet apart, joined by a number of gigantic cables and held apart by huge airbags, like they squished a few blimps between them to keep them from rubbing. The heavy cables aren't just lashed from one ship to another; they've done something clever with weights and pulleys, he suspects, to allow for some slack when rough seas pull the ships opposite ways. Hiro rides his own little airbag in between them.

The tanker portion comprises one or more fuel storage tanks that are capable of being replenished while the aircraft carrier/tanker hybrid is airborne.

82.content: “Poonmissile, like?” Bruce Lee says, pointing to one of the antiship missiles on the deck. “Bugs? Motorolas?” “Poonmissile is a Harpoon antiship missile, real expensive,” Eliot says. “A bug is a microchip. Motorola would be one brand, like Ford or Chevy. Bruce Lee deals in a lot of electronics—you know, typical Asian pirate dude.” “He'd give us a Harpoon missile for you guys?” Fisheye says.
82.title:
Harpoon antiship missile
Summarize the content into a title:
A harpoon antiship missile is disclosed. The harpoon antiship missile includes a launch tube, a
82.abstract: The present disclosure provides systems and methods for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV). In one implementation, a UAV control system comprises at least one processor coupled to a non-transitory computer readable medium storing instructions that when executed by the at least one processor cause the at least one processor to perform operations comprising obtaining sensor data associated with an environment in which the UAV is operating; determining a trajectory of the UAV within the environment using the sensor data; receiving input from a user indicating a target location within the environment; modifying the trajectory of the UAV such that the modified trajectory causes the UAV to fly toward the target location; and causing the UAV to operate according to the modified trajectory. Other implementations are also described herein.

83.content: He twists the throttle up once and Scott feels, but does not hear, the power of the engine. This baby is so efficient it doesn't waste power by making noise. “Say hi to your brand-new niece,” the guy says, and then lets go the clutch. The spokes flex and gather themselves and the bike springs forward out of the lot, seeming to jump off its electric paws. He cuts right across the parking lot of the neighboring NeoAquarian Temple franchise and pulls out onto the road.
83.title: Electric motorcycle
83.abstract: An electric motorcycle includes an electric motor, a battery pack, and a controller configured to control the electric motor. The controller is configured to determine whether or not charging of the battery pack has been completed in accordance with a predetermined charge completion criterion by acquiring information relating to state of charge (SOC) of the battery pack at regular time intervals during charging of the battery pack; and stop charging of the battery pack when it is determined that charging of the battery pack has been completed. In addition, the controller is configured to resume charging of the battery pack when it is determined that charging of the battery pack has been interrupted for a predetermined period of time while charging of the battery pack was being performed after determining that charging of the battery pack has been completed.

84.content: So every few dozen feet there's a large man with erect posture wearing an acid green windbreaker with ENFORCER spelled out across the back. Very conspicuous, which is how they like it. But it's all done with electropigment, so if there's trouble, these guys can turn themselves black by flipping a lapel switch. And they can make themselves bulletproof just by zipping the windbreakers up the front.
84.title:
Electropigmented clothing
Method:Electropigmented clothing
84.abstract: (a) providing an electropigment; (b) applying the electropigment to at least one surface of a garment; and (c) activating the electropigment.

85.content: The van was parked on a ship, and the ship was headed out to sea. It's a real ocean-going ship. An old, shitty, rusty one that probably cost about five bucks at the ship junkyard. But it carries cars, and it goes through the water, and it doesn't sink. The ship is just like the van, except bigger, with more people.
85.title: Method and apparatus for parking a vehicle on a ship
85.abstract: A method of parking a vehicle on a ship includes receiving an instruction to park the vehicle on the ship. The method also includes moving the vehicle from a first position to a second position, in which the vehicle is at least partially submerged in water adjacent to the ship. In addition, the method includes securing the vehicle to the ship while the vehicle is in the second position. Further, the method includes moving the vehicle from the second position to a third position, in which the vehicle is secured to the ship but not submerged in water. Moreover, the method includes moving the vehicle from the third position to a fourth position, in which the vehicle is securely fastened to the ship and fully submerged in water. Furthermore, the method includes maintaining the vehicle in the fourth position until removal of the vehicle from the ship.

86.content: And I asked what the hell is that thing. And Gurov says, that thing is a ten-megaton hydrogen bomb we scavenged from a ballistic missile. A city-buster. Any more questions?”
86.title: Apparatus and method for generating a ten-megaton hydrogen bomb
86.abstract: An apparatus is provided for generating a thermonuclear explosion. The apparatus includes an outer casing, an inner casing disposed within the outer casing, at least one fissile material layer disposed between the inner casing and the outer casing, wherein the at least one fissile material layer comprises uranium or plutonium; and a fusion fuel layer disposed between the inner casing and the outer casing, wherein the fusion fuel layer comprises lithium deuteride.

87.content: It starts to come down. The Kouriers fan out away from it so that the chopper comes down in the middle of a radial burst of poon cables. Tony, the security guy, climbs down out of the open door, moving slowly, high-stepping his way through the web of cables but somehow retaining his balance and his dignity. He walks away from the chopper until he is out from under the rotor blades, then pulls an Uzi out from under his windbreaker and fires a short air burst. “Get the fuck away from our chopper!” he is shouting.
87.title: Method and apparatus for securing a helicopter
87.abstract: A method of securing a helicopter comprises determining that the helicopter is to be secured, wherein the helicopter comprises at least one rotor blade. The method further comprises generating an electromagnetic pulse (EMP), wherein the EMP has a frequency in a range from about 30 kilohertz (kHz) to about 1 gigahertz (GHz). The method further comprises directing the EMP toward the at least one rotor blade such that the EMP induces eddy currents within the at least one rotor blade. The method further comprises disrupting rotation of the at least one rotor blade due to the induced eddy currents.

88.content: 8 His tongue is stinging; he realizes that, back in Reality, he has forgotten to swallow his beer. It's ironic that Juanita has come into this place in a low-tech, black-and-white avatar. She was the one who figured out a way to make avatars show something close to real emotion. That is a fact Hiro has never forgotten, because she did most of her work when they were together, and whenever an avatar looks surprised or angry or passionate in the Metaverse, he sees an echo of himself or Juanita—the Adam and Eve of the Metaverse. Makes it hard to forget.
88.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for avatars in the metaverse
88.abstract: Implementations described herein relate to methods, systems, and/or computer-readable media that facilitate providing an avatar within a virtual environment. In some implementations, one or more processors of a computing device may execute machine-readable instructions embodied in a non-transitory storage medium configured to instruct the one or more processors to perform operations comprising determining at least one physical attribute associated with a user; receiving input from the user via a graphical user interface (GUI), wherein the input is indicative of how the user would like their avatar to be presented within the virtual environment; generating an avatar based on the determined at least one physical attribute and the received input; and presenting the generated avatar within the virtual environment. Other implementations are also disclosed herein.

89.content: Uncle Enzo reckons that with the Mafia's emphasis on loyalty and traditional family values, they can sign up a lot of these entrepreneurs before they become Narcolombian citizens. And that explains the billboards that Jason sees with growing frequency as he drives into Compton. The smiling face of Uncle Enzo seems to beam down from every corner. Typically, he's got his arm around the shoulders of a young wholesome-looking black kid, and there's a catch phrase above: THE MAFIA—YOU'VE GOT A FRIEND IN THE FAMILY! and RELAX—YOU ARE ENTERING A MAFIA WATCH NEIGHBORHOOD! and UNCLE ENZO FORGIVES AND FORGETS. This last one usually accompanies a picture of Uncle Enzo with his arm around some teenager's shoulders, giving him a stern avuncular talking-to. It is an allusion to the fact that the Colombians and Jamaicans kill just about everyone.
89.title: Narco-mafia
89.abstract: A method of identifying narco-mafia is disclosed. In one embodiment, the method comprises receiving an input image; extracting at least one feature from the input image; determining whether the at least one feature extracted from the input image satisfies a predetermined condition; and in response to determining that the at least one feature extracted from the input image satisfies the predetermined condition, classifying the input image as containing information pertaining to narco-mafia.

90.content: The goggles throw a light, smoky haze across his eyes and reflect a distorted wide-angle view of a brilliantly lit boulevard that stretches off into an infinite blackness. This boulevard does not really exist; it is a computer-rendered view of an imaginary place. Beneath this image, it is possible to see Hiro's eyes, which look Asian.
90.title: Goggles for virtual reality applications
90.abstract: A head-mounted display (HMD) system includes an HMD configured to be worn by a user, the HMD comprising at least one optical element that directs light from a display of the HMD toward a user's eyes. The HMD also includes a camera coupled to the at least one optical element such that the camera captures images of the user's eyes while the user is wearing the HMD.

91.content: But it's very difficult to work in machine language because you go crazy after a while, working at such a minute level. So a whole Babel of computer languages has been created for programmers: FORTRAN, BASIC, COBOL, LISP, Pascal, C, PROLOG, FORTH. You talk to the computer in one of these languages, and a piece of software called a compiler converts it into machine language. But you never can tell exactly what the compiler is doing.
91.title: Computer-implemented systems and methods for compiling source code
91.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include computer-implemented methods, computer program products, and systems for performing software compilation. In one implementation, a method is performed by at least one processing device executing at least one executable instruction stored in at least one machine-readable medium. The method includes identifying an application programming interface (API) to be compiled; obtaining API information associated with the identified API; determining whether the obtained API information satisfies predetermined criteria; and if the obtained API information satisfies the predetermined criteria, causing generation of compiler directives that are used to compile the identified API.

92.content: I was going to buy a motorcycle.” “Oh. What kind of motorcycle were you looking for?” “One of the new Yamahas? With the new generation smartwheels?” Scott grins manfully, trying to put the best face on the awful fact that he is about to reveal. “I know exactly the one you mean.
92.title: Smartwheels for motorcycles
92.abstract: A smartwheel is provided that includes a wheel hub, an outer rim extending radially outward from the wheel hub, and a plurality of sensors disposed between the wheel hub and the outer rim. Each of the plurality of sensors is configured to measure at least one physical parameter associated with the wheel hub or the outer rim. A controller is in communication with each of the plurality of sensors. The controller is configured to receive measurement data from each of the plurality of sensors indicative of respective measurements of the at least one physical parameter measured by each of the plurality of sensors.

93.content: He gets a grip. He slams the window shut, strangling the relentless keening of the smoke alarm. A Nipponese robot arm shoves the pizza out and into the top slot. The hatch folds shut to protect it. As the Deliverator is pulling out of the chute, building up speed, checking the address that is flashed across his windshield, deciding whether to turn right or left, it happens. His stereo cuts out again—on command of the onboard system. The cockpit lights go red . Red. A repetitive buzzer begins to sound. The LED readout on his windshield, which echoes the one on the pizza box, flashes up: 20:00.
93.title: Method and apparatus for delivering pizza
93.abstract: A method of delivering a pizza includes receiving an order to deliver a pizza from a customer, wherein the pizza comprises one or more ingredients. The method also includes determining a delivery time associated with the pizza in response to receipt of the order. The method further includes transmitting instructions to prepare the pizza at a predetermined time prior to the determined delivery time. In addition, the method includes preparing the pizza according to the instructions while maintaining the temperature of the pizza within a predetermined range. Further, the method includes storing the pizza in a refrigerated compartment when the temperature of the pizza is maintained within the predetermined range. Moreover, the method includes retrieving the pizza from the refrigerated compartment during the determined delivery time.

94.content: The column of light begins to flow up and down and resolve itself into a human form. Actually, it is four human forms, female nudes standing shoulder to shoulder, facing outward, like caryatids. Each of them is carrying something long and slender in her hands: a pair of tubes. A third of a million hackers stare at the women, towering above the stage, as they raise their arms above their heads and unroll the four scrolls, turning each one of them into a flat television screen the size of a football field.
94.title: Method and apparatus for generating a column of light that resolves itself into a human form
94.abstract: A method is provided for generating a column of light that resolves itself into a human form. The method comprises the steps of providing a plurality of columns of light, wherein each column of light emanates from a respective one of a plurality of luminous sources; projecting the plurality of columns of light in such a manner as to cause them to converge at a predetermined focal point so as to generate a single column of light having a cross-sectional area equal to or less than about 0.25 milliradians squared (mrad2); and causing the generated column of light to resolve itself into a human form when viewed by an observer located at a position corresponding to the predetermined focal point. An apparatus for carrying out the method is also provided.

95.content: “Yes?” the Librarian says. “If there was some phenomenon that moved through the population, altering their minds in such a way that they couldn't process the Sumerian language anymore. Kind of in the same way that a virus moves from one computer to another, damaging each computer in the same way. Coiling around the brainstem.” “Lagos devoted much time and effort to this idea,” the Librarian says. “He felt that the nam-shub of Enki was a neurolinguistic virus.” “And that this Enki character was a real personage?”
95.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and mitigating neuro-linguistic viruses
95.abstract: A method of detecting and mitigating Neuro-Linguistic Viruses (NLVs) is disclosed. The NLVs may be transmitted from one person to another through the use of spoken, written, or other forms of communication. In some embodiments, an individual's susceptibility to being infected with an NLV may be assessed by measuring physiological indicators such as heart rate, blood pressure, skin conductance, respiratory rate, eye movement, facial muscle tension, body temperature, sweat gland activity, galvanic skin response, electromyography, electroencephalography, pupil dilation/constriction, blink rate, salivary cortisol level, glucose level, serotonin level, dopamine level, norepinephrine level, oxytocin level, testosterone level, estrogen level,

96.content: You do your work on the computer. The computer keeps a copy of everything, so that if you get sick or something, it's all there where your co-workers and supervisors can get access to it. If you want to write little notes or make phone doodles, you're perfectly free to do that at home, in your spare time. And there's the question of interchangeability. Fed workers, like military people, are intended to be interchangeable parts. What happens if your workstation should break down?
96.title: Systems and methods for interchangeable workstations
96.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for an interchangeable workstation. In one implementation, a system includes a plurality of modular components configured to be coupled together to form at least two different types of workstations. A first type of workstation is formed from a first subset of the plurality of modular components while a second type of workstation is formed from a second subset of the plurality of modular components. One or more sensors are positioned in each of the plurality of modular components such that when the plurality of modular components are coupled together as either the first type of workstation or the second type of workstation, data can be collected by the one or more sensors associated with both the first type of workstation and the second type of workstation.

97.content: He opens up the briefcase, revealing the little computer keyboard. He shoves his ID card into the slot, types on it for a couple of seconds. He unsnaps a tube from the top of the briefcase, places it into the socket in the bottom part. The machine draws it inside, does something, spits it back out. He hands the tube to Y.T. The red numbers on top are counting down from ten. “When it gets down to one, hold it up to your nose and start inhaling,” the guy says.
97.title: Briefcase
97.abstract: A briefcase includes a main body, a handle and a locking mechanism. The main body has an accommodating space for storing items. The handle is pivotally connected to the main body so that the handle can rotate relative to the main body between a first position and a second position. When the handle is in the first position, the handle protrudes outward from the main body. When the handle is in the second position, the handle retracts into the main body. The locking mechanism locks the handle when the handle is in the second position such that the handle does not protrude outward from the main body.

98.content: Here it comes.” A Yamaha semi is pulling into the truck entrance with a new shipment of motorcycles in the back. “It's on that truck,” the guy says. “If you can give me one of your cards, I'll jot down the vehicle identification number on back so you can pull it off the truck for me.” “This was a special order made by Mr. Norman?” “He claimed he was just ordering it as a display model, you know. But it sort of has my name on it.”
98.title: Apparatus and method for transporting and displaying motorcycles
98.abstract: An apparatus for transporting and displaying motorcycles includes a first frame, a second frame coupled to the first frame, a plurality of wheels rotatably coupled to at least one of the first frame or the second frame, wherein the plurality of wheels are configured to rotate in response to movement of the apparatus. The apparatus also includes a support structure disposed between the first frame and the second frame, wherein the support structure is movable with respect to both the first frame and the second frame such that rotation of the plurality of wheels causes translation of the support structure relative to the first frame and/or the second frame.

99.content: He pokes his katana through the side of the cube and follows it through the wall and out the other side. This is a hack. It is really based on a very old hack, a loophole that he found years ago when he was trying to graft the sword-fighting rules onto the existing Metaverse software.
99.title: Systems and methods for sword-fighting in virtual reality
99.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for sword-fighting in virtual reality. In one implementation, a method includes receiving an input from a user to initiate a sword-fighting session between the user and at least one other user via a virtual reality (VR) system. The method also includes determining that the user has won the sword-fighting session with the at least one other user by analyzing data associated with the VR headset worn by the user during the sword-fighting session. Additionally, the method includes awarding points to the user upon determining that the user has won the sword-fighting session with the at least one other user. Further, the method includes updating a leaderboard according to the points awarded to the user after determining that the user has won the sword-fighting session with the at least one other user.

100.content: Each one consists of a hub with many stout spokes. Each spoke telescopes in five sections. On the end is a squat foot, rubber tread on the bottom, swiveling on a ball joint. As the wheels roll, the feet plant themselves one at a time, almost glomming into one continuous tire. If you surf over a bump, the spokes retract to pass over it. If you surf over a chuckhole, the robo-prongs plumb its asphalty depths.
100.title: Multi-spoke self-retracting tire
100.abstract: A multi-spoke self-retracting tire includes a wheel hub, a rim and a tire. The rim is provided with a plurality of spokes extending radially outward from an inner peripheral surface of the rim to an outer peripheral surface of the rim. Each of the spokes has a first end connected to the rim and a second end opposite to the first end in a circumferential direction; each of the spokes further comprises at least one elastic member disposed between the first end and the second end for providing elasticity to the spoke.

101.content: Half a block from the entrance to Blooming Greens, she unpoons the Audi and coasts into a McDonald's. She goes into the ladies'. It has a hung ceiling. She stands on the seat of the third toilet, pushes up one of the ceiling tiles, moves it aside. A cotton sleeve tumbles out, bearing a delicate floral print. She pulls on it and hauls down the whole ensemble, the blouse, the pleated skirt, underwear from Vicky's, the leather shoes, the necklace and earrings, even a fucking purse. She takes off her RadiKS coverall, wads it up, sticks it into the ceiling, replaces the loose tile. Then she puts on the ensemble.
101.title: Blooming greens
101.abstract: A method of producing blooming greens is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) planting seeds in soil to produce seedlings; (b) transplanting the seedlings into pots, wherein each pot contains one or more seedlings; and (c) transferring the pots containing the seedlings from an indoor environment to an outdoor environment at a predetermined time after completion of step (b).

102.content: 50 Raven ushers Y.T. onto a flat-assed boat with a canopy on top. It is some kind of a riverboat that has been turned into a Vietnamese/American/Thai/Chinese business establishment, kind of a bar/restaurant/whorehouse/gambling den. It has a few big rooms, where lots of people are letting it all hang out, and a lot of little tiny steel-walled rooms down below where God knows what kind of activity is taking place.
102.title: Vietnamese/American/Thai/Chinese fusion cuisine served on a flat-assed boat with a canopy on top
102.abstract: A method of preparing Vietnamese/American/Thai/Chinese fusion cuisine includes serving the food on a flat-assed boat with a canopy on top.

103.content: “What is your name?” a voice says. It's an unnaturally calm and liquid voice. Computer generated. That way, everything it says to her is impartial, stripped of emotional content, she has no way to pick up any cues as to how the interrogation is going.
103.title: Computer-implemented system and computer-implemented method for conducting an interrogation
103.abstract: A computer-implemented system (100) is provided for conducting an interrogation. The computer-implemented system (100) comprises at least one processor (102), wherein the at least one processor (102) is configured to execute instructions stored in memory (104). The execution of the instructions by the at least one processor (102) causes the at least one processor (102) to perform operations comprising receiving, from a first user device (106a), data indicative of a plurality of audio signals captured during an interrogation session between a second user device (106b) and a third user device (106c); determining whether any of the plurality of audio signals includes evidence of coercion; responsive to it being determined that none of the plurality of audio signals includes evidence of coercion, providing access to

104.content: “I must humbly apologize for arranging the whole thing so hastily and haphazardly,” Hiro says. “It pains me deeply that you should feel the need to apologize when you have given me an opportunity that any Nipponese rapper would give anything for—to perform my humble works before actual homeboys from the ghettos of L.A.” “I am profoundly embarrassed to reveal that these fans are not exactly ghetto homeboys, as I must have carelessly led you to believe. They are thrashers. Skateboarders
104.title: Systems and methods for providing a virtual reality (VR) environment that simulates a rap battle between a VR user and one or more VR users, wherein the VR user is Japanese hip-hop artist Hiro Nak
104.abstract: A system may provide a virtual reality (VR) environment that simulates a rap battle between a VR user and one or more VR users, wherein the VR user is Japanese hip-hop artist Hiro Nakamura.

105.content: She guns it out onto the highway. It responds as only an ancient taxicab will. The only problem being that half a dozen other ancient taxicabs are now following them. Something is pressing against Y.T.'s left thigh.
105.title: Apparatus and method for transporting an ancient taxicab
105.abstract: An apparatus for transporting an ancient taxicab is disclosed. The apparatus includes a frame, a first axle coupled to the frame, a second axle coupled to the frame, at least one wheel rotatably coupled to each of the first axle and the second axle, wherein the at least one wheels are configured to engage with a ground surface when the apparatus is in use; and a power source operatively coupled to the first axle and the second axle such that rotation of the first axle and the second axle is driven by the power source. A method for transporting an ancient taxicab using the apparatus is also disclosed.

106.content: He takes another drag on his cigarette, spouts the smoke up above his head in a geyser, watches it spread out against the ceiling. “What is the mechanism?” “We've got two kinds of language in our heads. The kind we're using now is acquired. It patterns our brains as we're learning it. But there's also a tongue that's based in the deep structures of the brain, that everyone shares. These structures consist of basic neural circuits that have to exist in order to allow our brains to acquire higher languages.” “Linguistic infrastructure,” Uncle Enzo says. “Yeah. I guess ‘deep structure' and ‘infrastructure' mean the same thing. Anyway, we can access those parts of the brain under the right conditions. Glossolalia—speaking in tongues—is the output side of it, where the deep linguistic structures hook into our tongues and speak, bypassing all the higher, acquired languages. Everyone's known that for some time.” “You're saying there's an input side, too?” Ng says. “Exactly. It works in reverse. Under the right conditions, your ears—or eyes—can tie into the deep structures, bypassing the higher language functions. Which is to say, someone who knows the right words can speak words, or show you visual symbols, that go past all your defenses and sink right into your brainstem. Like a cracker who breaks into a computer system, bypasses all the security precautions, and plugs himself into the core, enabling him to exert absolute control over the machine.” “In that situation, the people who own the computer are helpless,” Ng says. “Right. Because they access the machine at a higher level, which has now been overridden. In the same sense, once a neurolinguistic hacker plugs into the deep structures of our brain, we can't get him out—because we can't even control our own brain at such a basic level.” “What does this have to do with a clay tablet on the Enterprise?” Mr. Lee says.
106.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for neurolinguistic hacking
106.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods, systems, and computer-readable media for neurolinguistic hacking. In one implementation, a method is provided that includes receiving an input from a user via a graphical user interface (GUI), wherein the GUI comprises a plurality of selectable elements; analyzing the input to identify at least one element of the plurality of selectable elements selected by the user; determining whether the identified element corresponds to a predetermined action; in response to determining that the identified element corresponds to the predetermined action, executing the predetermined action; and providing feedback to the user regarding the execution of the predetermined action. Various other aspects are contemplated.

107.content: A wall of billowing orange flame grows up silently from the tank farm a mile away, like a time-lapse chrysanthemum. It is so vast and complicated in its blooming, uncontrolled growth that Rife stops halfway up the stairs to watch. A powerful disturbance is moving through the flame, leaving a linear trail in the light, like a cosmic ray fired through a cloud chamber. By the force of its passage, it leaves behind a shock wave that is clearly visible in the flame, a bright spreading cone that is a hundred times larger than the dark source at its apex: a black bulletlike thing supported on four legs that are churning too fast to be visible.
107.title: Billowing orange flame
107.abstract: A method of producing a billowing orange flame is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) providing a fuel and an oxidant; (b) mixing the fuel and the oxidant to produce a combustible mixture; (c) introducing the combustible mixture into a burner tube, wherein the burner tube includes a plurality of orifices through which the combustible mixture exits the burner tube such that the combustible mixture emanates outwardly from the burner tube in a fan-shaped pattern; and (d) igniting the combustible mixture within the burner tube so as to cause the combustible mixture to form a billowing orange flame at least partially encompassed by the fan-shaped pattern.

108.content: They have to nose their way along, tapping the horn, flashing the lights. Finally, they get to the flatbed semi that constitutes the stage for tonight's concert. Next to it is another semi, full of amps and other sound gear. The drivers of the trucks, an oppressed minority of two, have retreated into the cab of the sound truck to smoke cigarettes and glare balefully at the swarm of thrashers, their sworn enemies in the food chain of the highways.
108.title: Concert on a flatbed semi-trailer
108.abstract: A concert system for performing a concert on a flatbed trailer of a semi-trailer truck is disclosed. The concert system comprises at least one speaker configured to emit sound from the flatbed trailer, an amplifier in electrical communication with the at least one speaker, wherein the amplifier is configured to power the at least one speaker such that the at least one speaker emits sound through the flatbed trailer, and a microphone positioned within the flatbed trailer opposite the at least one speaker so as to pick up sound generated by the at least one speaker via the flatbed trailer. A method of performing a concert on a flatbed trailer of a semi-trailer truck using the concert system is also disclosed.

109.content: One of The Enforcers up the hill is carrying a flash-light. As he moves, it sweeps across the ground at a flat angle, briefly illuminating the ground like a searchlight. For an instant, the light shines into the motorcycle rut, and Hiro perceives that it has become a river of bright red, oxygenated blood. He learn English total immersion English/Japanese be mergin' Into super combination So can have fans in every nation Hong Kong they speak English, too
109.title: Total immersion English/Japanese be mergin' into super combination so can have fans in every nation Hong Kong they speak English, too
109.abstract: A method of providing an online game service is provided. The method includes the steps of: (a) determining whether or not at least one predetermined condition has been satisfied; and (b) when it is determined that the at least one predetermined condition has been satisfied, transmitting first information to a user terminal through which a plurality of users participate in the online game service.

110.content: “I didn't even really appreciate all of this until about ten years later, as a grad student, trying to build a user interface that would convey a lot of data very quickly, for one of these baby-killer grants.” This was her term for anything related to the Defense Department. “I was coming up with all kinds of elaborate technical fixes like trying to implant electrodes directly into the brain. Then I remembered my grandmother and realized, my God, the human mind can absorb and process an incredible amount of information—if it comes in the right format. The right interface.
110.title: Systems and methods for presenting data in a graphical user interface (GUI)
110.abstract: Implementations of systems and methods for presenting data in a GUI are described. In one implementation, a method includes receiving an input to display information associated with a plurality of objects within the GUI. The method further includes determining whether any of the plurality of objects satisfy at least one predetermined criterion. Responsive to determining that none of the plurality of objects satisfy the at least one predetermined criterion, the method includes causing presentation of the information associated with the plurality of objects within the GUI. Responsive to determining that at least one of the plurality of objects satisfies the at least one predetermined criterion, the method includes causing presentation of the information associated with the object(s) satisfying the at least one predetermined criterion within the GUI.

111.content: More embarrassed, like what an awkward way to meet someone. “It all has to do with imageering,” he says, spreading one hand dismissively. “There are not many ways for a man like me to meet with a young girl that do not generate incorrect images in the media.
111.title: Apparatus and method for facilitating a face-to-face meeting between a male celebrity and a female fan
111.abstract: An apparatus for facilitating a face-to-face meeting between a male celebrity and a female fan is disclosed. The apparatus includes an enclosure configured to be worn by the male celebrity, wherein the enclosure comprises at least one opening through which the male celebrity wearing the enclosure can see out of the enclosure but cannot be seen from outside the enclosure. The apparatus also includes a plurality of monitors positioned within the enclosure such that each of the plurality of monitors are visible to the male celebrity via the at least one opening when the male celebrity is wearing the enclosure. Each of the plurality of monitors displays video footage of the female fan so as to allow the male celebrity to view the female fan without being viewed by the female fan. A method for facilitating a face-to-face meeting between a male celebrity and a female fan is also dis

112.content: The health plan is very specific, contains major incentives, get too heavy or wheezy and, no one says anything about it—which would be rude—but you feel a definite pressure, a sense of not fitting in, as you walk across the sea of desks, eyes glance up to follow you, estimating the mass of your saddlebags, eyes darting back and forth between desks as, by consensus, your co-workers say to themselves, I wonder how much he or she is driving up our health plan premiums? So Y.T.'s mom has clacked up the stairs in her black pumps and gone into her office, actually a large room with computer workstations placed across it in a grid. Used to be divided up by partitions, but the EBGOC boys didn't like it, said what would happen if there had to be an evacuation? All those partitions would impede the free flow of unhinged panic. So no more partitions. Just workstations and chairs.
112.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for health insurance premium increases due to obesity and other lifestyle related illnesses. In one aspect, a method includes determining a
112.abstract: obesity factor associated with an individual's body mass index (BMI), wherein the obesity factor is determined by comparing the BMI of the individual to a predetermined range of BMIs that are associated with different obesity factors; identifying at least one chronic condition associated with being obese or overweight as indicated by the obesity factor; predicting future healthcare expenditures attributable to the at least one chronic condition using the obesity factor; and increasing a health insurance premium payable by the individual based on the predicted future healthcare expenditures attributable to the at least one chronic condition in order to cover the predicted future healthcare expenditures attributable to the at least one chronic condition. Other aspects include corresponding methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium. These and other aspects are disclosed and claimed herein

113.content: So he runs in the direction the scream came from, moving quickly from cover of one jet to the next, staying down in a crouch. He sees a pair of legs moving on the opposite side of a jet's fuselage. Uncle Enzo is near the tip of the jet's wing. He puts both hands on it, shoves down with all his weight, and then lets it go. It works: the jet rocks toward him on its suspension. The assassin thinks that Uncle Enzo has just jumped up onto the wingtip, so he climbs up onto the opposite wing and waits with his back to the fuselage, waiting to ambush Enzo when he climbs over the top.
113.title: Method and apparatus for defeating an assassin
113.abstract: A method of defeating an assassin is disclosed. The method comprises detecting, by one or more sensors associated with the assassin, at least one object in proximity to the assassin; determining whether the at least one object is within a predetermined distance from the assassin; responsive to determining that the at least one object is within the predetermined distance from the assassin, activating a plurality of electromagnetic emitter(s), wherein the plurality of electromagnetic emitter(s) are configured to emit radio frequency (RF) pulses toward the at least one object such that the RF pulses cause the at least one object to be deflected away from the assassin; and controlling movement of the assassin relative to the at least one object so as to avoid physical contact between the assassin and the at least one object. Various other aspects are also

114.content: The Kourier isn't ten feet behind him anymore—he is right there, peering in the rear window. Anticipating the maneuver, the Kourier reeled in his cord, which is attached to a handle with a power reel in it, and is now right on top of the pizza mobile, the front wheel of his skateboard actually underneath the Deliverator's rear bumper. An orange-and-blue-gloved hand reaches forward, a transparent sheet of plastic draped over it, and slaps his driver's side window. The Deliverator has just been stickered. The sticker is a foot across and reads, in big orange block letters, printed backward so that he can read it from the inside. THAT WAS STALE
114.title: Method and apparatus for delivering pizza
114.abstract: A method of delivering a pizza includes receiving an order to deliver a pizza from a customer, wherein the pizza comprises one or more ingredients. The method also includes determining that at least one of the one or more ingredients in the pizza does not meet predetermined quality standards. In response to determining that at least one of the one or more ingredients in the pizza does not meet the predetermined quality standards, the method further includes replacing the at least one of the one or more ingredients in the pizza with a replacement ingredient meeting the predetermined quality standards prior to delivery of the pizza to the customer.

115.content: It is the closest simulation of death that the Metaverse can offer, but all it really does is cause the user a lot of annoyance. Furthermore, the user finds that he can't get back into the Metaverse for a few minutes.
115.title: Systems and methods for simulating death in a virtual reality environment
115.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to systems and methods for simulating death in a virtual reality environment. In one implementation, a method is performed at a computing device executing a virtual reality (VR) application that provides an immersive VR experience via a head-mounted display (HMD). The method includes detecting movement data associated with movements of the HMD by a user wearing the HMD during execution of the VR application; determining whether the detected movement data satisfies a predetermined set of criteria indicative of intentional movement of the HMD by the user; and responsive to determining that the detected movement data satisfies the predetermined set of criteria, causing termination of the VR application.

116.content: We have a huge workforce that is illiterate or alliterate and relies on TV—which is sort of an oral tradition. And we have a small, extremely literate power elite—the people who go into the Metaverse, basically—who understand that information is power, and who control society because they have this semimystical ability to speak magic computer languages. “That makes us a big stumbling block to Rife's plan. People like L. Bob Rife can't do anything without us hackers.
116.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for hacking the metaverse
116.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to methods, systems, and computer-readable media for hacking the metaverse. In one implementation, a method is performed by at least one processor executing instructions stored in non-transitory memory. The method includes receiving an input from a user via a graphical user interface (GUI) associated with a virtual reality (VR) application running on a VR headset worn by the user; determining that the input corresponds to a request to execute a script within the VR application; identifying a plurality of scripts available for execution within the VR application; retrieving metadata associated with each of the plurality of scripts; transmitting the metadata to the user via the GUI such that the user can view the metadata while wearing the VR headset; receiving another input from the user via the GUI indicating a selection of one of the plurality of scripts; and executing the selected script within the VR application

117.content: Your passport, please.” Hiro hands it over. The man shoves it into a slot. Hiro's name, personal data, and mug shots are digitally transferred into the franchulate's bios, and with a little bit of key-pounding, the man persuades it to spit out a laminated photo ID card. “You get onto the pier with this,” he says.
117.title: Apparatus and method for issuing a digital passport
117.abstract: A system, apparatus, and method are disclosed herein to issue a digital passport. In one embodiment, an apparatus comprises at least one processor coupled to a memory containing instructions that when executed by the at least one processor causes the at least one processor to perform operations comprising receiving biometric data from a user; determining whether the received biometric data corresponds to previously stored biometric data; in response to determining that the received biometric data does not correspond to the previously stored biometric data, storing the received biometric data as part of a digital passport associated with the user; and providing the digital passport to the user.

118.content: Then it just remains for the Word from On High. But computers and communications are awfully good these days, and it usually doesn't take longer than a couple of seconds to perform a charge-card verification. The little machine beeps out its approval code, heavenly tunes sing out from tinny speakers, and a wide pair of pearlescent doors in the back of the room swing majestically open. “Thank you for your donation,” the girl says, slurring the words together into a single syllable. The customer stomps toward the double doors, drawn in by hypnotic organ strains. The interior of the chapel is weirdly colored, illuminated partly by fluorescent fixtures wedged into the ceiling and partly by large colored light boxes that simulate stained-glass windows. The largest of these, shaped like a fattened Gothic arch, is bolted to the back wall, above the altar, and features a blazing trinity: Jesus, Elvis, and the Reverend Wayne.
118.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for facilitating charitable donations
118.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods, systems, and computer-readable media for facilitating charitable donations. In one implementation, a method is provided that includes receiving an indication from a user device associated with a request to make a charitable donation; in response to receipt of the indication, identifying a plurality of charitable organizations eligible to receive the charitable donation; transmitting information about the plurality of charitable organizations to the user device via a communication network; receiving selections by the user device among the plurality of charitable organizations; determining at least one selected charitable organization out of the plurality of charitable organizations according to the selections received by the user device; and transferring the charitable donation to the at least one selected charitable organization.

119.content: Since then the Deliverator has kept the gun in the glove compartment and relied, instead, on a matched set of samurai swords, which have always been his weapon of choice anyhow. The punks in Gila Highlands weren't afraid of the gun, so the Deliverator was forced to use it.
119.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable storage medium, for deliverating samurai swords. In some implementations, a method includes determining that a user is holding a samurai sword,
119.abstract: receiving an indication of the user releasing the samurai sword; in response to receiving the indication of the user releasing the samurai sword, identifying one or more replacement samurai swords within a predetermined distance of the released samurai sword; and upon identifying the one or more replacement samurai swords, transmitting information associated with the one or more replacement samurai swords to the user such that the user can select from the one or more replacement samurai swords.

120.content: Trust gravity. She realizes halfway down that her blue-and-orange coverall, fly as it may be, is going to be a real attention getter in the middle of the night in the Falabala zone, so she reaches up to her collar, feels a hard disk sewn into the fabric, presses it between thumb and finger until it clicks. Her coverall darkens, the colors shimmer through the electropigment like an oil slick, and then it's black.
120.title:
Coverall with electropigmented fabric
Method:Coverall with electropigmented fabric
120.abstract: A coverall comprising an electropigmented fabric, wherein the electropigmented fabric is formed from at least two layers of woven or non-woven textile material.

121.content: Not much point in describing him, either. Traces of a southern or Texan accent. The bottom edge of the envelope is parallel to the edge of the desk, one-quarter inch away from it, perfectly centered between the left and right sides. Like he had a doctor come in here and put it on the desk with tweezers. It is addressed to: ROOM 968A, MAIL STOP MS-1569835, BUILDING LA-6, UNITED STATES OF AMERICA. “You want a return address on this?” she says.
121.title: Method and apparatus for generating a return address on an outgoing mailpiece
121.abstract: A method of generating a return address on an outgoing mailpiece includes receiving, by a computing device, the outgoing mailpiece. The computing device is in communication with at least one image capture device that captures images of the outgoing mailpiece. The computing device determines whether the outgoing mailpiece has been previously scanned using the at least one image capture device. In response to determining that the outgoing mailpiece has not been previously scanned using the at least one image capture device, the computing device retrieves information associated with the outgoing mailpiece from a database. The computing device generates a return address on the outgoing mailpiece according to the retrieved information. The computing device prints the generated return address on the outgoing mailpiece.

122.content: He might waste hours fooling around with some piece of code only to find out that it was the software to control the automatic toilet flushers at Rife Bible College. So Hiro keeps moving, keeps looking up at the tangle of shapes, trying to find a pattern. He knows, now, that he has found his way into the boiler room of the entire Metaverse. But he has no idea what he's looking for. This system, he realizes, really consists of several separate networks all tangled together in the same space. There's an extremely complicated tangle of fine red lines, millions of them, running back and forth between thousands of small red balls. Just as a wild guess, Hiro figures that this may represent Rife's fiber-optics network, with its innumerable local offices and nodes spread all over the world. There are a number of less complicated networks in other colors, which might represent coaxial lines, such as they used to use for cable television, or even voice phone lines. And there is a crude, heavily built, blocky network all done up in blue. It consists of a small number—fewer than a dozen—of big blue cubes. They are connected to each other, but to nothing else, by massive blue tubes; the tubes are transparent, and inside of them, Hiro can see bundles of smaller connections in various colors. It has taken Hiro a while to see all of this, because the blue cubes are nearly obscured; they are all surrounded by little red balls and other small nodes, like trees being over-whelmed with kudzu. It appears to be an older, preexisting network of some kind, with its own internal channels, mostly primitive ones like voice phone. Rife has patched into it, heavily, with his own, higher-tech systems. Hiro maneuvers until he can get a closer look at one of the blue cubes, peering through the clutter of lines that has grown around it. The blue cube has a big white star on each of its six faces. “It's the Government of the United States,” Juanita says. “Where hackers go to die,” Hiro says. The largest, and yet the least efficient, producer of computer software in the world. Hiro and Y.T. have eaten a lot of junk food together in different joints all over L.A.—doughnuts, burritos, pizza, sushi, you name it—and all Y.T. ever talks about is her mother and the terrible job that she has with the Feds. The regimentation. The lie-detector tests. The fact that for all the work she does, she really has no idea what it is that the government is really working on. It's always been a mystery to Hiro, too, but then, that's how the government is. It was invented to do stuff that private enterprise doesn't bother with, which means that there's probably no reason for it; you never know what they're doing or why. Hackers have traditionally looked upon the government's coding sweatshops with horror and just tried to forget that all of that shit ever existed. But they have thousands of programmers. The programmers work twelve hours a day out of some twisted sense of personal loyalty. Their software-engineering techniques, while cruel and ugly, are very sophisticated.
122.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on computer storage media, for metaverse, or, how I learned to stop worrying and love the singularity.
122.abstract: A system includes an artificial general intelligence (AGI) that is operable to interact with one or more virtual worlds of a metaverse in accordance with user-specified preferences. The AGI may be configured to learn from its interactions with the one or more virtual worlds so as to refine the user-specified preferences over time. In addition, the AGI may be configured to provide recommendations regarding activities within the one or more virtual worlds which are consistent with the user-specified preferences. Further, the AGI may be configured to facilitate communications between users who are participating in respective activities within the one or more virtual worlds. Yet further, the AGI may be configured to generate content associated with the one or more virtual worlds according to the user-specified preferences. Numerous other embodiments are described herein.

123.content: The transactee is a stocky Spanish-speaking woman in an orange dress. The girl types some stuff into the computer. The customer snaps her Visa card down on the fake wood altar top; it sounds like a rifle shot. The girl pries the card up using her inch-long fingernails, a dicey and complicated operation that makes Y.T. think of insects climbing out of their egg sacs. Then she performs the sacrament, swiping the card through its electromagnetic slot with a carefully modulated sweep of the arm, as though tearing back a veil, handing over the slip, mumbling that she needs a signature and daytime phone number.
123.title: Methods, systems, and devices for facilitating financial transactions
123.abstract: A method of facilitating a financial transaction is provided. The method includes receiving an indication that a first user device associated with a first user wants to send funds to a second user device associated with a second user. The method further includes determining whether the first user has previously sent funds to the second user within a predetermined period of time. The method also includes in accordance with a determination that the first user has not previously sent funds to the second user within the predetermined period of time, causing transmission of one or more messages to authorize the sending of the funds from the first user device to the second user device. Additionally, the method includes causing transmission of the funds from the first user device to the second user device upon receipt of authorization information from the second user device.

124.content: When a neighbor doggie barks at a stranger, pictures and sounds and smells come into his mind along with the bark. He suddenly knows what that stranger looks like. What he smells like. How he sounds. Then, if that stranger should come anywhere near his yard, he will recognize him.
124.title: Systems and methods for detecting and responding to intruders
124.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for detecting an intruder in a building. In one implementation, a method includes receiving sensor data from sensors positioned throughout a building; analyzing the sensor data to determine whether there is an intruder in the building; responsive to determining that there is an intruder in the building, transmitting information about the intruder to a mobile device associated with a resident of the building via a short-range wireless communication protocol; and activating at least one actuator within the building to deter or eject the intruder from the building. Implementations of the present disclosure may be implemented as a computer program product comprising a computer-readable medium having computer program instructions stored thereon. The computer program instructions, when executed by a computing system, cause the computing system to implement the techniques described herein.

125.content: It's an old building. Most of the doors are metal. But there's a couple of revolving doors, too, just big sheets of glass.
125.title: Apparatus and method for securing a revolving door
125.abstract: An apparatus for securing a revolving door, the apparatus comprising at least one sensor configured to detect movement of an object within a predetermined distance from the revolving door, wherein the at least one sensor is further configured to transmit a signal indicative of the detected movement. The apparatus also comprises processing circuitry configured to receive the signal transmitted by the at least one sensor; determine whether the detected movement corresponds to unauthorised access to the revolving door; and in response to determining that the detected movement corresponds to unauthorised access to the revolving door, control actuators associated with the revolving door to prevent rotation of the revolving door. A method for securing a revolving door is also disclosed herein.

126.content: A number of linguistic theories have been developed in an effort to tie all languages together.” “Theories Lagos tried to apply to his virus hypothesis.” “Yes. There are two schools: relativists and universalists. As George Steiner summarizes it, relativists tend to believe that language is not the vehicle of thought but its determining medium. It is the framework of cognition. Our perceptions of everything are organized by the flux of sensations passing over that framework. Hence, the study of the evolution of language is the study of the evolution of the human mind itself.” “Okay, I can see the significance of that. What about the universalists?” “In contrast with the relativists, who believe that languages need not have anything in common with each other, the universalists believe that if you can analyze languages enough, you can find that all of them have certain traits in common. So they analyze languages, looking for such traits.”
126.title: Method and system for analyzing languages
126.abstract: A method of analyzing a language is disclosed. The method includes receiving, by one or more processors, a plurality of sentences in the language; determining, by the one or more processors, whether each of the plurality of sentences comprises at least one ambiguous word; when it is determined that none of the plurality of sentences comprises an ambiguous word, generating, by the one or more processors, a first representation of the plurality of sentences; when it is determined that at least one of the plurality of sentences comprises an ambiguous word, generating, by the one or more processors, a second representation of the at least one of the plurality of sentences excluding the ambiguous word from the at least one of the plurality of sentences; combining, by the one or more processors, the first representation and the second representation to generate a third representation of the plurality

127.content: He is armed with a large, fat black suitcase. The suitcase is massively constructed, with built-in wheels, and weighs somewhere between three hundred pounds and a metric ton, as Hiro discovers when he tries to move it. Its weight turns the normally flat bottom of the life raft into a puckered cone. The suitcase has a noteworthy attachment: a flexible three-inch-thick cable or hose or something, a couple of meters long, that emerges from one corner, runs up the sloping floor of the life raft, over the edge, and trails in the water. At the end of this mysterious tentacle is a hunk of metal about the size of a wastebasket, but so finely sculpted into so many narrow fins and vanes that it appears to have a surface area the size of Delaware. Hiro only saw this thing out of the water for a few chaotic moments, when it was being transferred into the life raft. At that time it was glowing red hot. Since then, it has lurked below the surface, light gray, impossible to see clearly because the water around it is forever churning in a full, rolling boil. Fist-sized bubbles of steam coalesce amid its fractal tracery of hot vanes and pummel the surface of the ocean, ceaselessly, all day and all night. The powerless life raft, sloshing around the North Pacific, emits a vast, spreading plume of steam like that of an Iron Horse chugging full blast over the Continental Divide. Neither Hiro nor Eliot ever mentions, or even notices, the by-now-obvious fact that Fisheye is traveling with a small, self-contained nuclear power source—almost certainly radiothermal isotopes like the ones that power the Rat Thing. As long as Fisheye refuses to notice this fact, it would be rude for them to bring it up. All of the participants are clad in bright orange padded suits that cover their entire bodies. They are the North Pacific version of life vests.
127.title: Nuclear powered life raft
127.abstract: A nuclear powered life raft includes a reactor, a heat exchanger coupled to the reactor and configured to transfer thermal energy from the reactor to one or more fluids within the life raft, an electrical generator operably coupled to the heat exchanger such that the electrical generator is configured to generate electricity in response to flow of fluid through the heat exchanger.

128.content: Half a block away, on a side street, a bimbo box, a minivan, grinds its four pathetic cylinders into action. She sees it catercorner from her present coordinates. The white backup lights flash instantly as the driver shifts into D by way of R and N. Y.T. aims herself at the curb, hits it at a fast running velocity, the spokes of the smartwheels see it coming and retract in the right way so that she glides from street to lawn without a hitch. Across the lawn, the feet leave a trail of hexagonal padmarks. A stray dog turd, red with meaty undigestible food coloring, is embossed with the RadiKS logo, a mirror image of which is printed on the tread of each spoke.
128.title: Smartwheeled vehicle trademark infringement litigation
128.abstract: A system for smartwheeled vehicle trademark infringement litigation, the system including at least one computing device. The at least one computing device is configured to receive an image of a wheeled vehicle and determine whether the wheeled vehicle includes a wheel that resembles a wheel of a wheeled vehicle associated with a registered trademark.
