The at least one computing device is also configured to initiate legal action upon determining that the wheeled vehicle includes a wheel that resembles a wheel of a wheeled vehicle associated with a registered trademark. A method for smartwheeled vehicle trademark infringement litigation, the method performed by the at least one computing device, the method including receiving an image of a wheeled vehicle and determining whether the wheeled vehicle includes a wheel that resembles a wheel of a wheeled vehicle associated with a registered trademark.

129.content: South of there, the tributaries split into a delta of feeder roads that crosses the Canadian/American border at a dozen or more places spread out over five hundred miles from the fjords of British Columbia to the vast striped wheatlands of central Montana. Then it ties into the American road system, which serves as the headwaters of the migration. This five-hundred-mile swath of territory is filled with wouldbe arctic explorers in great wheeled houses, optimistically northbound, and more than a few rejects who have abandoned their bagos in the north country and hitched a ride back down south. The lumbering bagos and top-heavy four-wheelers form a moving slalom course for Hiro on his black motorcycle. All these beefy Caucasians with guns! Get enough of them together, looking for the America they always believed they'd grow up in, and they glom together like overcooked rice, form integral, starchy little units. With their power tools, portable generators, weapons, four-wheel-drive vehicles, and personal computers, they are like beavers hyped up on crystal meth, manic engineers without a blueprint, chewing through the wilderness, building things and abandoning them, altering the flow of mighty rivers and then moving on because the place ain't what it used to be. The byproduct of the lifestyle is polluted rivers, greenhouse effect, spouse abuse, televangelists, and serial killers. But as long as you have that four-wheel-drive vehicle and can keep driving north, you can sustain it, keep moving just quickly enough to stay one step ahead of your own waste stream. In twenty years, ten million white people will converge on the north pole and park their bagos there. The low-grade waste heat of their thermodynamically intense lifestyle will turn the crystalline icescape pliable and treacherous.
129.title: Method and apparatus for transporting a person on a motorcycle across a frozen body of water
129.abstract: A method is disclosed for transporting a person on a motorcycle across a frozen body of water. The method includes the steps of providing an ice sled, attaching the ice sled to the motorcycle in such a way as to allow rotation of the ice sled relative to the motorcycle about a longitudinal axis of the motorcycle, driving the motorcycle onto the surface of the frozen body of water with the ice sled attached thereto, rotating the ice sled around the longitudinal axis of the motorcycle so that the ice sled slides along the surface of the frozen body of water, thereby pulling the motorcycle behind the ice sled over the surface of the frozen body of water, removing the ice sled from attachment to the motorcycle after the motorcycle has crossed the entirety of the frozen body of water, and riding the motorcycle off the ice sled once it has been removed from attachment to the motorcycle

130.content: “Screw you, asshole,” she says, reeling in her poon, looking back toward the boulevard for some promising westbound traffic. Whatever this guy has in mind, it is probably unprofessional. “Young lady,” says another voice, an older and more arresting sort of voice, “it's fine if you don't like Jason. But your pal, Uncle Enzo, needs your help.” A door on the back of the semi has opened up. A man in a black suit is standing there. Behind him, the interior of the semi is brightly lit up. Halogen light glares off the man's slick hairdo.
130.title: Jason goes to hell: the book of revenge
130.abstract: A method for providing an interactive story is provided. The method includes receiving, at a computing device from a user, a selection of one or more characters among a plurality of pre-determined characters; determining that the selected character(s) are in conflict with each other; and responsive to determining that the selected character(s) are in conflict with each other, presenting (e.g., via a graphical user interface displayed on a display associated with the computing device) a choice between the selected character(s).

131.content: Behind everything is the jagged horizon line of that funky improvised barrier technology that the Falabalas are so good at. A barrier that has been completely spurned, snubbed, and confounded by Y.T., who dropped out of the sky into the middle of the camp like a Stealth fighter with an inferiority complex.
131.title: Method and apparatus for deploying a barrier in a hostile environment
131.abstract: A method of deploying a barrier in a hostile environment is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: (a) providing an unmanned aerial vehicle; (b) launching the unmanned aerial vehicle into the hostile environment; (c) navigating the unmanned aerial vehicle to a predetermined location within the hostile environment; (d) landing the unmanned aerial vehicle at the predetermined location; (e) releasing a barrier from the unmanned aerial vehicle, wherein the barrier is configured to be deployed across a pathway through the hostile environment; and (f) removing the unmanned aerial vehicle from the hostile environment.

132.content: The great majority of the jobs are simple deliveries, which he portions out to Kouriers. Then there are collections from delinquent borrowers and from franchisees who depend on Nova Sicilia for their plant security. If it's a first notice, Jason likes to drop by in person, just to show the flag, to emphasize that his organization takes a personal, one-to-one, hands-on, micromanaged approach to debt-related issues. If it's a second or third notice, he usually writes a contract with Deadbeaters International, a high-impact collection agency with whose work he has always been very happy. Then there is the occasional Code H. Jason hates to deal with Code Hs, views them as symptoms of a breakdown in the system of mutual trust that makes society work. But usually these are handled directly from the regional level, and all Jason has to do is aftermath management and spin control. This morning, Jason is looking especially crisp, his Oldsmobile freshly waxed and polished. Before he goes inside, he plucks a couple of burger wrappers off the parking lot, snipers be damned. He has heard that Uncle Enzo is in the area, and you never knew when he might pull his fleet of limousines and war wagons into a neighborhood franchise and pop in to shake hands with the rank and file.
132.title: Systems and methods for debt collection
132.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for debt collection. In one implementation, a computer-implemented method is provided. The method includes receiving an indication that a user account has been flagged as fraudulent by a financial institution associated with the user account. The method further includes identifying at least one payment obligation associated with the user account. The method additionally includes transmitting information related to the at least one payment obligation to a service provider system. The method also includes receiving confirmation from the service provider system that the at least one payment obligation has been resolved. Responsive to receipt of the confirmation, the method includes removing the user account from a blacklist maintained by the financial institution. Removal of the user account from the blacklist may result in reinstatement of access to additional services offered by the financial institution.

133.content: They spread the practice to Texas. There it became known as the revival movement. It spread like wildfire, all across the United States, and then the world, reaching China and India in 1906. The twentieth century's mass media, high literacy rates, and high-speed transportation all served as superb vectors for the infection. In a packed revival hall or a Third World refugee encampment, glossolalia spread from one person to the next as fast as panic.
133.title: Method and apparatus for glossolalia
133.abstract: A method of performing glossolalia is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (i) receiving an input signal; (ii) processing the input signal to generate at least one acoustic feature vector; (iii) classifying the at least one acoustic feature vector against a plurality of pre-determined classes, wherein each member of the plurality of pre-determined classes corresponds to a different type of glossolalia; and (iv) outputting a result corresponding to the classification of the at least one acoustic feature vector with respect to the plurality of pre-determined classes. An apparatus for performing glossolalia is also disclosed.

134.content: He turns and looks back at ten thousand shrieking groupies. Now that he's all by himself in the entryway, no longer immersed in a flood of avatars, he can see all of the people in the front row of the crowd with perfect clarity. They are all done up in their wildest and fanciest avatars, hoping that Da5id—The Black Sun's owner and hacker-in-chief—will invite them inside.
134.title: Systems and methods for managing access to a virtual environment based on an avatar of a user of the virtual environment
134.abstract: Implementations relate to systems and methods for managing access to a virtual environment based on an avatar of a user of the virtual environment. In one implementation, a method includes receiving, from a first client device associated with a first user, a request to join a virtual environment (VE) hosted by a second client device associated with a second user. The method also includes determining that the VE is inaccessible to the first user based at least in part on an appearance of an avatar of the first user within the VE. The method further includes transmitting, to the first client device, information indicating that the VE is inaccessible to the first user based at least in part on the appearance of the avatar of the first user within the VE. Numerous other aspects are contemplated.

135.content: In the tongue of Eden, naming a thing was the same as creating it. To quote Steiner again, ‘Our speech interposes itself between apprehension and truth like a dusty pane or warped mirror. The tongue of Eden was like a flawless glass; a light of total understanding streamed through it. Thus Babel was a second Fall.' And Isaac the Blind, an early Kabbalist, said that, to quote Gershom Scholem's translation, ‘The speech of men is connected with divine speech and all language whether heavenly or human derives from one source: the Divine Name.' The practical kabbalists, the sorcerers, bore the title Ba'al Shem, meaning ‘master of the divine name.' ” “The machine language of the world,” Hiro says. “Is this another analogy?” “Computers speak machine language,” Hiro says. “It's written in ones and zeroes—binary code. At the lowest level, all computers are programmed with strings of ones and zeroes. When you program in machine language, you are controlling the computer at its brainstem, the root of its existence.
135.title: Tongue of Eden
135.abstract: A method for treating an oral cavity disorder is provided. The method comprises administering to the oral cavity at least one therapeutically effective dose of Cannabidiol (CBD).

136.content: It's going to take a lot of work to change that—a fundamental rebuilding of the whole Metaverse, carried out on a planetwide, corporate level. In the meantime, there may be a role for individuals who know their way around the place. A few hacks can make a lot of difference in this situation. A freelance hacker could get a lot of shit done, years before the giant software factories bestir themselves to deal with the problem. The virus that ate through Da5id's brain was a string of binary information, shone into his face in the form of a bitmap—a series of white and black pixels, where white represents zero and black represents one. They put the bitmap onto scrolls and gave the scrolls to avatars who went around the Metaverse looking for victims. The Clint who tried to infect Hiro in The Black Sun got away, but he left his scroll behind—he didn't reckon on having his arms lopped off—and Hiro dumped it into the tunnel system below the floor, the place where the Graveyard Daemons live. Later, Hiro had a Daemon take the scroll back to his workshop. And anything that is in Hiro's house is, by definition, stored inside his own computer. He doesn't have to jack into the global network in order to access it. It's not easy working with a piece of data that can kill you.
136.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for hacking the metaverse
136.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to methods, systems, and computer-readable media for hacking the metaverse. In one implementation, a method is performed by at least one processor executing instructions stored in non-transitory memory. The method includes receiving an input from a user device associated with a virtual reality (VR) environment via a VR headset coupled to the user device. The method further includes determining whether the input corresponds to a first type of command or a second type of command. Responsive to determining that the input corresponds to the first type of command, the method includes performing a first action within the VR environment. Responsive to determining that the input corresponds to the second type of command, the method includes performing a second action different than the first action within the VR environment. Numerous other aspects are also contemplated.

137.content: Corporation Sushi K Squeaky is walking straight uphill, paralleling a fresh motorcycle track that has cut deeply into the loose yellow soil. It consists of a deep, wide track with a narrower one that runs parallel, a couple of feet to the right. The track gets deeper the farther up they go. Deeper and darker. It looks less and less like a motorcycle rut in loose dirt and more like a drainage ditch for some sinister black effluent. Coming to America now Rappers trying to start a row Say “Stay in Japan, please, listen! We can't handle competition!” U.S. rappers booing and hissin' Ask for rap protectionism They afraid of Sushi K Cause their audience go away He got chill financial backin' Give those U.S. rappers a smackin' Sushi K concert machine Fast efficient super clean
137.title: Apparatus and method for transporting and dispensing sushi
137.abstract: An apparatus for transporting and dispensing sushi is disclosed. The apparatus includes a housing, a plurality of shelves supported by the housing, each of the plurality of shelves configured to support at least one roll of sushi, wherein each of the plurality of shelves is movable relative to the housing between a retracted position and an extended position, and a motor coupled to each of the plurality of shelves such that actuation of the motor causes movement of each of the plurality of shelves from the retracted position to the extended position or from the extended position to the retracted position. A method for transporting and dispensing sushi using the apparatus is also disclosed.

138.content: The story is quite complicated.” “Please excuse me if I have misinterpreted your story,” the businessman says, “but I was under the impression that men of your race were not allowed to fight during that war.” “Your impression is correct,” Hiro says. “My father was a truck driver.” “Then how did he come to be in hand-to-hand combat with a Nipponese officer?” “The incident took place outside a prisoner-of-war camp,” Hiro says. “My father and another prisoner tried to escape. They were pursued by a number of Nipponese soldiers and the officer who owned these swords.”
138.title: Sword of the samurai
138.abstract: A sword comprising a blade and a hilt, wherein the hilt is configured to be gripped by a user's hand. The hilt includes a crossguard that extends upwardly from an upper surface of the hilt in a direction generally perpendicular to the longitudinal axis of the blade. A lower end of the crossguard tapers downwardly away from the upper surface of the hilt toward a distal end of the crossguard. An upper end of the crossguard also tapers downwardly away from the upper surface of the hilt toward the distal end of the crossguard.

139.content: Miles and miles of eensy but strong fibers, like spaghetti. The sauce on the spaghetti is sticky, goopy stuff that stays fluid for an instant, when the loogie gun is fired, then sets quickly. MetaCops have to tote this kind of gear because when each franchulate is so small, you can't be chasing people around. The perp—almost always an innocent thrasher—is always a three-second skateboard ride away from asylum in the neighboring franchulate. Also, the incredible bulk of the Personal Modular Equipment Harness—the chandelier o' gear—and all that is clipped onto it slows them down so bad that whenever they try to run, people just start laughing at them. So instead of losing some pounds, they just clip more stuff onto their harnesses, like the loogie gun. The snotty, fibrous drop of stuff has wrapped all the way around her hand and forearm and lashed them onto the bar of the gate.
139.title: Loogie gun
139.abstract: A loogie gun is provided. The loogie gun includes a housing, a nozzle disposed in the housing and configured to eject mucus from an oral cavity of a user, wherein the nozzle comprises at least one light emitting diode (LED) that illuminates when the loogie gun is activated; and a power source electrically coupled to the at least one LED such that activation of the loogie gun causes the at least one LED to illuminate. In some embodiments, the loogie gun may further include a microcontroller electrically coupled to the at least one LED such that activation of the loogie gun causes the microcontroller to control brightness of the at least one LED. In some embodiments, the loogie gun may further include a speaker electrically coupled to the microcontroller such that activation of the loogie

140.content: Like all Sacrifice Zones, this one has a fence around it, with yellow metal signs wired to it every few yards. SACRIFICE ZONE WARNING. The National Parks Service has declared this area to be a National Sacrifice Zone. The Sacrifice Zone Program was developed to manage parcels of land whose clean-up cost exceeds their total future economic value. And like all Sacrifice Zone fences, this one has holes in it and is partially torn down in places. Young men blasted out of their minds on natural and artificial male hormones must have some place to do their idiotic coming-of-age rituals. They come in from Burbclaves all over the area in their four-wheel-drive trucks and tear across the open ground, slicing long curling gashes into the clay cap that was placed on the really bad parts to prevent windblown asbestos from blizzarding down over Disneyland.
140.title: Apparatus and method for forming a sacrificial zone in a semiconductor device
140.abstract: Implementations of apparatuses and methods for forming a sacrificial zone in a semiconductor device are disclosed herein. In an example, the apparatus includes a first masking layer positioned over a portion of a substrate; a second masking layer positioned over another portion of the substrate that is different from the portion of the substrate covered by the first masking layer; a third masking layer positioned over yet another portion of the substrate that is different from the portion of the substrate covered by the first masking layer and the portion of the substrate covered by the second masking layer; and a fourth masking layer positioned over still another portion of the substrate that is different from the portion of the substrate covered by the first masking layer, the portion of the substrate covered by the second masking layer, and the portion of the substrate covered by the third masking layer.

141.content: Y.T.'s mom goes and sits down in it, puts her arms on the arms of the chair, nestles her fingertips and palms into the little depressions that await. The neoprene fist of the blood-pressure cuff gropes blindly, finds her arm, and seizes it.
141.title: Method and apparatus for measuring blood pressure
141.abstract: A method of calibrating an ambulatory blood pressure monitor is disclosed. The method includes obtains at least one physiological parameter associated with the patient; determines whether the at least one physiological parameter satisfies a predetermined condition; in response to determining that the at least one physiological parameter satisfies the predetermined condition, initiates a calibration process by instructing the patient to engage in a physical activity comprising exercising or walking; while the patient is engaged in the physical activity, continuously monitors BP measurements obtained during the physical activity; upon completion of the physical activity, analyzes the plurality of BP measurements collected during the physical activity according to a pre-determined set of rules so as to determine if there are any outlier values among the plurality of BP measurements; and when it is determined that there are no outlier values among the plurality of

142.content: The deuteronomists somehow realized this and exterminated her by blocking all the vectors by which she infected new victims.” “With reference to viral infections,” the Librarian says, “if I may make a fairly blunt, spontaneous cross-reference—something I am coded to do at opportune moments—you may wish to examine herpes simplex, a virus that takes up residence in the nervous system and never leaves. It is capable of carrying new genes into existing neurons and genetically reengineering them. Modern gene therapists use it for this purpose.
142.title: Method and apparatus for treating neurological disorders
142.abstract: A method of treating a neurological disorder in a patient comprising administering to the patient one or more electrical stimulation pulses having a pulse width between about 0.1 milliseconds (ms) and about 2,000 ms at a frequency between about 0.5 hertz (Hz) and about 200 Hz over a period of time effective to treat the neurological disorder.

143.content: But they had to stop building the tower because of an informational disaster—they couldn't talk to each other.” “‘Disaster' is an astrological term meaning ‘bad star,' ” the Librarian points out. “Sorry—but due to my internal structure, I'm a sucker for non sequiturs.”
143.title: Tower of babel
143.abstract: A method for transmitting data in a wireless communication system is disclosed. The method includes receiving, by a user equipment (UE), downlink control information (DCI) including at least one physical downlink shared channel (PDSCH) resource block (RB) from a base station; determining whether the at least one PDSCH RB overlaps with an orthogonal frequency division multiplexing (OFDM) subcarrier that has been previously allocated to another UE; and if it is determined that the at least one PDSCH RB overlaps with the OFDM subcarrier that has been previously allocated to the other UE, avoiding interference between the at least one PDSCH RB and the other UE while using the OFDM subcarrier that has been previously allocated to the other UE.

144.content: “They make it look like a drug and feel like a drug so that people will want to take it. It's laced with cocaine and some other stuff.” “If it's not a drug, what is it?” “It's chemically processed blood serum taken from people who are infected with the metavirus,” Juanita says. “That is, it's just another way of spreading the infection.” “Who's spreading it?” “L. Bob Rife's private church. All of those people are infected.” Hiro puts his head in his hands. He's not exactly thinking about this; he's letting it ricochet around in his skull, waiting for it to come to rest.
144.title: Method and apparatus for treating or preventing COVID-19 by administering a therapeutically effective amount of human blood plasma containing SARS-CoV-2 antibodies
144.abstract: A method, system, and computer program product for treating or preventing COVID-19 in an individual is disclosed. In one embodiment, the method comprises determining whether the individual has been infected with SARS-CoV-2; if the individual has not been infected with SARS-CoV-2, providing to the individual a pharmaceutical preparation that does not contain any SARS-CoV-2 antibodies; and if the individual has been infected with SARS-CoV-2, providing to the individual a pharmaceutical preparation that contains a therapeutically effective amount of SARS-CoV-2 antibodies.

145.content: The untranslatable word resonates from the little speaker, pronounced “esucker” and “saka” respectively. “We are authorized Deputies of MetaCops Unlimited. Under Section 24.5.2 of the White Columns Code, we are authorized to carry out the actions of a police force on this territory.” “Such as hassling innocent thrashers ,” Y.T. says. The MetaCop turns off the translator. “By speaking English you implicitly and irrevocably agree for all our future conversation to take place in the English language,” he says. “You can't even rez what Y.T. says,” Y.T. says. “You have been identified as an Investigatory Focus of a Registered Criminal Event that is alleged to have taken place on another territory, namely, The Mews at Windsor Heights.”
145.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for untranslatable words
145.abstract: A method of translating text from a source language to a target language is provided. The method includes identifying an untranslatable word in the source language; determining that the untranslatable word corresponds to at least one synonym in the target language; retrieving information associated with the at least one synonym corresponding to the untranslatable word; generating a translation of the untranslatable word into the target language by replacing the untranslatable word with the at least one synonym according to the information associated with the at least one synonym; and outputting the translated text including the translation of the untranslatable word. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also provided.

146.content: Then he realizes why it seems so much lighter: most of its weight was ammunition, and Fisheye used up quite a bit. He half-carries, half-drags it back to the stern, making sure the heat exchanger stays in the water, and somersaults it into the zodiac. Hiro climbs in after it, joining Tranny, and starts attending to the motor. “No motor,” Tranny says.
146.title: Method and apparatus for deploying an unmanned underwater vehicle (UUV) from a zodiac
146.abstract: A method of deploying an Unmanned Underwater Vehicle (UUV) from a Zodiac is disclosed. The method comprises launching the UUV from the Zodiac, wherein the UUV is attached to the Zodiac by at least one tether; controlling movement of the Zodiac relative to the UUV while the UUV is submerged below the surface of the water; retrieving the UUV from the water when the UUV reaches a predetermined distance from the Zodiac; and detaching the UUV from the Zodiac so that the UUV moves away from the Zodiac.

147.content: In this way, a narrow beam of any color can be shot out of the innards of the computer, up through that fisheye lens, in any direction. Through the use of electronic mirrors inside the computer, this beam is made to sweep back and forth across the lenses of Hiro's goggles, in much the same way as the electron beam in a television paints the inner surface of the eponymous Tube. The resulting image hangs in space in front of Hiro's view of Reality. By drawing a slightly different image in front of each eye, the image can be made three-dimensional. By changing the image seventy-two times a second, it can be made to move. By drawing the moving three-dimensional image at a resolution of 2K pixels on a side, it can be as sharp as the eye can perceive, and by pumping stereo digital sound through the little earphones, the moving 3-D pictures can have a perfectly realistic soundtrack. So Hiro's not actually here at all. He's in a computer-generated universe that his computer is drawing onto his goggles and pumping into his earphones. In the lingo, this imaginary place is known as the Metaverse. Hiro spends a lot of time in the Metaverse. It beats the shit out of the U-Stor-It. Hiro is approaching the Street.
147.title: Method and apparatus for providing a virtual reality environment
147.abstract: A method of controlling an avatar in a virtual reality (VR) environment is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of detecting, by one or more motion sensors associated with a VR headset worn by a user, at least one movement performed by the user while wearing the VR headset; determining whether the detected movement corresponds to a pre-determined gesture; responsive to determining that the detected movement corresponds to the pre-determined gesture, instructing the avatar within the VR environment to perform an action corresponding to the pre-determined gesture; wherein performing the pre-determined gesture allows the user to control the avatar within the VR environment.

148.content: He no longer has to worry about trying to be the baddest motherfucker in the world. The position is taken. The crowning touch, the one thing that really puts true world-class badmother-fuckerdom totally out of reach, of course, is the hydrogen bomb. If it wasn't for the hydrogen bomb, a man could still aspire.
148.title: Badmotherfuckerdom, world-class badmother-fuckerdom, and methods of achieving world-class badmother-fuckerdom
148.abstract: Provided is a method for improving the performance of an athlete. The method includes administering to the athlete one or more doses of cannabidiol (CBD). In some embodiments, CBD may be administered in combination with tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), other cannabinoids, phytocannabinoids, terpenes, flavonoids, essential oils, vitamins, minerals, antioxidants, amino acids, peptides, proteins, hormones, growth factors, neurotransmitters, endocannabinoids, exogenous cannabinoids, homeopathic remedies, prescription medications, over-the-counter medications, dietary supplements, herbs, botanicals, functional foods, probiotics, prebiotics, metabol

149.content: In the cockpit are a pilot and copilot. Until half an hour ago, they were loyal employees of L. Bob Rife. Then they sat and watched out the windshield as the dozen Rife security drones who were stationed around the hangar variously got their heads blown off, their throats slit, or else just plain dropped their weapons and fell to their knees and surrendered. Now the pilot and copilot have taken lifelong oaths of loyalty to Uncle Enzo's organization. Uncle Enzo could have just dragged them out and replaced them with his own pilots, but this way is better. If Rife should, somehow, actually make it onto the plane, he will recognize his own pilots and think that everything is fine. And the fact that the pilots are alone there in the cockpit without any direct Mafia supervision will merely emphasize the great trust that Uncle Enzo has placed in them and the oath that they have taken. It will actually enhance their sense of duty.
149.title: Method and apparatus for hijacking an aircraft
149.abstract: A method of hijacking an aircraft includes the steps of (a) determining, at least in part by analyzing sensor data from one or more sensors associated with the aircraft, that the aircraft is about to be landed; (b) obtaining flight control authority over the aircraft while the aircraft is still airborne; (c) landing the aircraft using the obtained flight control authority; and (d) taking possession of the aircraft after it has been safely landed.

150.content: Once she gets over the shock of it and settles into a routine, she starts looking around her, watching the other fish-cutting dames, and realizes that this is just like life must be for about 99 percent of the people in the world. You're in this place. There's other people all around you, but they don't understand you and you don't understand them, but people do a lot of pointless babbling anyway.
150.title: Fish-cutting dame
150.abstract: A fish-cutting dame is disclosed. The fish-cutting dame includes a base, a cutting blade assembly and an adjustment mechanism. The cutting blade assembly has at least one cutting blade fixedly connected to the base. The adjustment mechanism can be used to adjust the position of the cutting blade relative to the base.

151.content: She drops into a fetal position to pass underneath a semi, headed for the Jersey barrier in the median strip like she's going to die, but Jersey barriers are easy for the smartwheels. That lower limb of the barrier has such a nice bank to it, like they designed it for road surfers. She rides halfway up the barrier, angles gently back down to the lane for a smooth landing, and she's in traffic.
151.title: Road surfing autonomous vehicle
151.abstract: A road surfing autonomous vehicle includes an autonomous driving system, a steering actuator, and a controller. The autonomous driving system is configured to drive the vehicle along a travel path. The steering actuator is coupled to at least one wheel of the vehicle so as to control rotation of the at least one wheel. The controller is electrically connected to the autonomous driving system and the steering actuator. The controller is configured to cause the autonomous driving system to drive the vehicle along the travel path while causing the steering actuator to rotate in accordance with a predetermined pattern such that the vehicle performs road surfing.

152.content: As manager of a local office, Jason's job is to portion work out to local contractors. Every morning, he parks his Oldsmobile out front and goes into the office, ducking quickly into the armored doorway to foil possible Narcolombian snipers. This does not prevent them from taking occasional potshots at the big Uncle Enzo that rises up above the franchise, but those signs can take an amazing amount of abuse before they start looking seedy. Safely inside, Jason signs onto Turfnet. A job list scrolls automatically onto the screen. All Jason has to do is find contractors to handle all of those jobs before he goes home that night, or else he has to take care of them himself.
152.title: Systems and methods for managing lawn care services
152.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for scheduling lawn care services. In one implementation, a method includes receiving an indication of a request to schedule a lawn care service at a geographic location. The method also includes determining a plurality of candidate providers that are available to perform the lawn care service within a predetermined time period associated with the requested lawn care service. The method further includes generating a graphical user interface (GUI) configured to receive input identifying a preferred provider from the plurality of candidate providers. The method additionally includes transmitting the input received via the GUI to identify the preferred provider among the plurality of candidate providers. Further, the method includes causing performance of the lawn care service by the preferred provider during the predetermined time period.

153.content: He is now a stone's throw away from a big blue cube sitting at ground level. All the other blue cubes sort of feed into it. There is a motorcycle parked next to the cube, rendered in color, but just one notch above black and white: big jaggedy pixels and a limited color palette. It has a sidecar. Raven's standing next to it. He is carrying something in his arms. It is another simple geometric construction, a long smooth blue ellipsoid a couple of feet in length. From the way he's moving, Hiro thinks that Raven has just removed it from the blue cube; he carries it over to the motorcycle and nestles it into the sidecar. “The Big One,” Hiro says. “It's exactly what we were afraid of,” Juanita says. “Rife's revenge.” “Headed for the amphitheater. Where all the hackers are gathered in one place.
153.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus related to motorcycles and blue cubes in the amphitheater
153.abstract: A method of controlling an autonomous vehicle is disclosed. The method includes receiving sensor data from one or more sensors coupled to the autonomous vehicle; processing the sensor data to identify objects within a field of view of the autonomous vehicle; determining that at least one identified object satisfies a predetermined criterion; responsive to satisfying the predetermined criterion, causing the autonomous vehicle to move toward the at least one identified object; while moving toward the at least one identified object, continuing to process the sensor data to identify additional objects within the field of view of the autonomous vehicle; and responsive to failing to identify any additional objects satisfying the predetermined criterion, stopping movement of the autonomous vehicle with respect to the at least one identified object. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

154.content: Just disease and ill health. Evil was a synonym for disease. So what does that tell you?” Hiro walks away, the same way he walks away from psychotic street people who follow him down the street. “It tells you that evil is a virus!” Lagos calls after him. “Don't let the nam-shub into your operating system!” Juanita's working with this alien?
154.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and treating nam-shub infections
154.abstract: A method of diagnosing NAM-SHUB infection is provided. The method includes obtaining one or more biological samples from a subject, wherein the one or more biological samples comprise nucleic acids; amplifying the nucleic acids to generate amplicons; sequencing the amplicons to generate sequence data; analyzing the sequence data using a machine learning model to determine whether the subject suffers from NAM-SHUB infection; and outputting an indication that the subject suffers from NAM-SHUB infection when the machine learning model determines that the subject suffers from NAM-SHUB infection.

155.content: Hiro guns his motorcycle forward and closes on Raven, swinging his katana. But Raven reaches back—watching him in the rearview mirror—and blocks the blow; he's carrying a big long knife in one hand. Then Raven cuts his speed down to almost nothing and dives in between a couple of the stanchions. Hiro overshoots him, slows down too much, and gets a glimpse of Raven screaming past him on the other side of the monorail; by the time he's accelerated and cut through another gap, Raven has already slalomed over to the other side. And so it goes. They run down the length of the Street in an interlacing zigzag pattern, cutting back and forth under the monorail. The game is a simple one.
155.title: Motorcycle chase scene
155.abstract: A motorcycle chase scene is disclosed. The motorcycle chase scene comprises at least one vehicle, wherein the at least one vehicle has an autonomous driving system configured to control movement of the at least one vehicle in response to sensor data received from sensors associated with the at least one vehicle.

156.content: The stairway flexes and recoils under his weight, reminding him of the jet's fragility. The pilot has seen it coming, doesn't wait to retract the stairway before he releases the brakes and sends the jet taxiing down the runway, swinging the nose away from the Rat Thing. He punches the throttles, nearly throwing the jet onto one wing as it whips around in a tight curve, and redlines the engines as soon as he sees the center line of the runway. Now they can only see forward and sideways.
156.title: Method and apparatus for launching an aircraft from a runway
156.abstract: A method of launching an aircraft from a runway includes determining that the aircraft is to be launched onto the runway. The method also includes, while the aircraft is being launched onto the runway, controlling at least one propeller of the aircraft so as to generate thrust in order to move the aircraft along the runway.

157.content: She goes around the corner and stands in the middle of the toy area, inadvertently getting the hem of her robe caught up in a Ninja Raft Warriors battle module, and knocks on the door to the potty. “Busy!” says a man's voice from the other side of the door.
157.title: Method and apparatus for controlling access to a toilet
157.abstract: A method of controlling access to a toilet is provided. The method comprises detecting, by at least one sensor associated with the toilet, that a user has left the toilet after using the toilet; in response to detecting that the user has left the toilet, determining whether there are any other users remaining within the toilet; responsive to determining that there are no other users remaining within the toilet, locking the toilet so as to prohibit new users from gaining access to the toilet; and unlocking the toilet if another user enters the toilet while the toilet is locked.

158.content: What we are doing here is more of a covert operation.” “A spy thing.” Intel. “Yeah. A spy thing,” the man says, his tone of voice suggesting that he is trying to humor someone. “And the only way to get this operation to work is if we have a Kourier who can cooperate with us a little bit.” “So all that stuff with Uncle Enzo was fake,” Y.T. says.
158.title: Systems and methods for secure communications between a kourier and a recipient
158.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for secure communications between a courier and a recipient. In one implementation, a method includes receiving, by a mobile computing device associated with a courier, an indication to initiate a communication session with a remote computing device associated with a recipient. The method further includes transmitting, by the mobile computing device in response to receipt of the indication, at least one request message to the remote computing device over a wireless network. The method further includes determining whether the at least one request message has been successfully delivered to the remote computing device. The method further includes transmitting, by the mobile computing device in response to determining that the at least one request message has not been successfully delivered to the remote computing device within a predetermined amount of time, at least one error message to the remote computing device via the wireless network.

159.content: Instead—what the fuck, Juanita's going to hire him, right?—he slams the button for LAVATORY GRANDE ROYALE. Never been here before. It's like something on the top floor of a luxury high-rise casino in Atlantic City, where they put semi-retarded adults from South Philly after they've blundered into the mega-jackpot. It's got everything that a dimwitted pathological gambler would identify with luxury: gold-plated fixtures, lots of injection-molded pseudomarble, velvet drapes, and a butler.
159.title: Bathroom faucet
159.abstract: A bathroom faucet includes a housing, a valve assembly disposed in the housing and configured to control flow of water from a water supply line to an outlet nozzle. The valve assembly includes a solenoid operatively coupled to at least one actuator that is movable between first and second positions. A controller is electrically coupled to the solenoid such that operation of the solenoid causes movement of the at least one actuator between the first position and the second position. When the at least one actuator is in the first position, the valve assembly restricts flow of water from the water supply line to the outlet nozzle. When the at least one actuator is in the second position, the valve assembly permits flow of water from the water supply line to the outlet nozzle.

160.content: This is the key phrase that all of her ware is waiting to hear. When she says it the second time, all the self-defense stuff comes on, which means that among other things, a few thousand volts of radio-frequency electrical power suddenly flood through the outsides of her cuffs. The head Fed behind the desk blurts out a grunt from way down in his stomach. He flies back away from her, his entire right side jerking spastically, trips over his own chair, and sprawls back into the wall, smacking his head on the marble windowsill. The jerk who's yanking on her other arm stretches out like he's on an invisible rack, accidentally slapping one of the other guys in the face, giving that guy a nice dose of juice to the head.
160.title: Self-defense bracelet
160.abstract: A self-defense bracelet includes a housing, an actuator, and a retractable element. The actuator is disposed in the housing to be movable between a first position and a second position. When the actuator is moved from the first position to the second position, the actuator causes the retractable element to extend out of the housing.

161.content: So all the data of the Sumerians have survived. Egypt left a legacy of art and architecture; Sumer's legacy is its megabytes.” “How many megabytes?”
161.title: Systems and methods for preservation of digital information
161.abstract: Implementations described herein are generally directed to systems and methods for the preservation of digital information. In one implementation, a system is provided that includes at least one memory comprising machine-readable instructions and at least one processor configured to execute the machine-readable instructions to perform a method. The method can include receiving an indication from a client device associated with a user; determining whether the received indication satisfies a predetermined criterion; in response to determining that the received indication satisfies the predetermined criterion, transmitting a notification to the client device notifying the user of expiration of access to content stored by the client device; and prior to transmission of the notification, encrypting the content stored by the client device such that the encrypted content is unrecoverable after a predetermined period of time.

162.content: Beneath is a scrolling list of numbers and names, starting with #11. He can scroll down the list if he wants to find his own ranking. The screen helpfully informs him that he is currently ranked number 863 out of 890 people who have ever participated in a sword fight in The Black Sun. Number One, the name and the photograph on the top of the list, belongs to Hiroaki Protagonist. 12 Ng Security Industries Semi-Autonomous Guard Unit #A-367 lives in a pleasant black-and-white Metaverse where porterhouse steaks grow on trees, dangling at head level from low branches, and blood-drenched Frisbees fly through the crisp, cool air for no reason at all, until you catch them.
162.title: Systems and methods for swordfighting
162.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for swordfighting. In one implementation, a method includes receiving an input from a user to initiate a virtual swordfight between two avatars in a virtual reality (VR) environment. The method also includes determining that at least one of the first avatar or the second avatar is about to be defeated by the other avatar during the virtual swordfight. Additionally, the method includes adjusting parameters associated with either the first avatar or the second avatar so as to prevent defeat of the first avatar or the second avatar while still maintaining realism within the VR environment. Further, the method includes continuing the virtual swordfight according to the adjusted parameters.

163.content: The proctor walks in front of her, holds it open, and she walks in, followed by the proctor. The last stall on the left is oversized, big enough for two people. Y.T.'s mom goes in, followed by the proctor, who closes and locks the door. Y.T.'s mom pulls down her panty hose, pulls up her skirt, squats over a pan, pees. The proctor watches every drop go into the pan, picks it up, empties it into a test tube that is already labeled with her name and today's date. Then it's back out to the lobby, followed again by the proctor.
163.title: Method and apparatus for urine testing
163.abstract: A method of determining the presence of an analyte in a biological sample is disclosed. The method comprises irradiating the biological sample with electromagnetic radiation at a first wavelength to excite fluorophores present in the biological sample; detecting light emitted from the biological sample as a result of excitation of the fluorophores by the electromagnetic radiation at the first wavelength, wherein the detected light has a second wavelength that is different from the first wavelength; and determining the presence of the analyte in the biological sample using the detected light having the second wavelength.

164.content: It's right there on her chest, a little bar code. A laser scans it as she careens toward the entrance and the immigration gate swings open for her. It's an ornate ironwork number, but harried White Columns residents don't have time to sit idling at the Burbclave entrance watching the gate slowly roll aside in Old South majestic turpitude, so it's mounted on some kind of electromagnetic railgun. She is gliding down the antebellum tree-lined lanes of White Columns, one microplantation after another, still coasting on the residual kinetic energy boost that originated in the fuel in Studley the Teenager's gas tank.
164.title: Method and apparatus for automated immigration processing
164.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods, systems, computer-readable media, and/or apparatuses that are configured to facilitate an automated immigration processing system. In one implementation, a method is performed by at least one computing device in an automated immigration processing system. The method includes receiving biometric data associated with a traveler; determining whether the received biometric data corresponds to previously stored biometric data corresponding to the traveler; responsive to determining that the received biometric data does not correspond to the previously stored biometric data, storing the received biometric data in association with information identifying the traveler; and permitting the traveler to pass through a border checkpoint without interacting with a border control agent when the received biometric data corresponds to the previously stored biometric data.

165.content: .” By this point, Hiro's face was frozen in a wary, astonished position that Juanita later made extensive use of in her work. Because, as she was talking to him, she was watching his face, analyzing the way the little muscles in his forehead pulled his brows up and made his eyes change shape.
165.title: Method and apparatus for capturing facial expressions
165.abstract: A method of determining an emotional state of a user is disclosed. The method includes receiving, by one or more processors, at least one image depicting a face of the user; extracting, by the one or more processors, from the at least one image, a plurality of regions of interest (ROIs), wherein each ROI in the plurality of ROIs corresponds to a portion of the face of the user; classifying, by the one or more processors, each ROI in the plurality of ROIs as belonging to one of a plurality of predetermined emotion categories; generating, by the one or more processors, a score indicative of which of the plurality of predetermined emotion categories most accurately describes the emotional state of the user; and outputting, by the one or more processors, the score. Various other aspects are

166.content: Then something different happens. Lights come on. The security system wants better illumination on these people. Hong Kong franchulates are famous for their lawngrids—whoever heard of a lawn you could park on?—and for their antennas . They all look like NASA research facilities with their antennas. Some of them are satellite uplinks, pointed at the sky. But some of them, tiny little antennas, are pointed at the ground, at the lawngrid. Y.T. does not really get this, but these small antennas are millimeter-wave radar transceivers. Like any other radar, they are good at picking up metallic objects. Unlike the radar in an air traffic control center, they can rez fine details. The rez of a system is only as fine as its wavelength; since the wavelength of this radar is about a millimeter, it can see the fillings in your teeth, the grommets in your Converse high-tops, the rivets in your Levi's. It can calculate the value of your pocket change.
166.title: Method and apparatus for controlling access to a secure location
166.abstract: A method of controlling access to a secure location is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: (i) receiving, at an access control device associated with the secure location, biometric data from a user; (ii) determining whether the received biometric data matches stored biometric data corresponding to one or more authorized users; and (iii) in accordance with a determination that the received biometric data does not match the stored biometric data corresponding to one or more authorized users, preventing the user from accessing the secure location.

167.content: Y.T. does a double take at this new phenomenon: Ng using the street name for a controlled substance. “You mean Freon?” she says. “Yes. The man who is the object of our inquiry is horizontally diversified. That is, he deals in a number of different substances.
167.title: Method and apparatus for detecting illicit drug trafficking
167.abstract: A method of detecting illicit drug trafficking is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) obtaining an X-ray image of a parcel; (b) identifying, in the X-ray image, at least one suspicious region that may be indicative of concealment of contraband within the parcel; (c) determining whether the at least one suspicious region identified in step (b) satisfies predetermined criteria to warrant further examination; (d) if it is determined in step (c) that the at least one suspicious region does not satisfy the predetermined criteria to warrant further examination, proceeding with clearance of the parcel; and (e) if it is determined in step (c) that the at least one suspicious region satisfies the predetermined criteria to warrant further examination, subjecting the contents of the parcel to secondary screen

168.content: Suddenly, Uncle Enzo has come rather close to her, caught her right hand in his left hand. Her Kourier gloves have an opening on the back of the hand just big enough for his lips. He plants a kiss on Y.T.'s hand.
168.title: Kourier glove with an opening on the back of the hand just big enough for a guy's lips to plant a kiss on the wearer's hand
168.abstract: A kourier glove includes a palm portion and a back-of-the-hand portion extending from the palm portion. The back-of-the-hand portion has an opening therein that exposes at least a portion of the wearer's skin when the glove is donned by the wearer.

169.content: She scans through the memo, hitting the Page Down button at reasonably regular intervals, occasionally paging back up to pretend to reread some earlier section. The computer is going to notice all this. It approves of rereading. It's a small thing, but over a decade or so this stuff really shows up on your work-habits summary. Having got that out of the way, she dives into work. She is an applications programmer for the Feds. In the old days, she would have written computer programs for a living. Nowadays, she writes fragments of computer programs. These programs are designed by Marietta and Marietta's superiors in massive week-long meetings on the top floor. Once they get the design down, they start breaking up the problem into tinier and tinier segments, assigning them to group managers, who break them down even more and feed little bits of work to the individual programmers. In order to keep the work done by the individual coders from colliding, it all has to be done according to a set of rules and regulations even bigger and more fluid than the Government procedure manual. So the first thing that Y.T.'s mother does, having read the new subchapter on bathroom tissue pools, is to sign on to a subsystem of the main computer system that handles the particular programming project she's working on. She doesn't know what the project is—that's classified—or what it's called. It's just her project. She shares it with a few hundred other programmers, she's not sure exactly who. And every day when she signs on to it, there's a stack of memos waiting for her, containing new regulations and changes to the rules that they all have to follow when writing code for the project. These regulations make the business with the bathroom tissue seem as simple and elegant as the Ten Commandments. So she spends until about eleven A.M. reading, re-reading, and understanding the new changes in the Project. There are many of these, because this is a Monday morning and Marietta and her higher-ups spent the whole weekend closeted on the top floor, having a catfight about this Project, changing everything. Then she starts going back over all the code she has previously written for the Project and making a list of all the stuff that will have to be rewritten in order to make it compatible with the new specifications. Basically, she's going to have to rewrite all of her material from the ground up.
169.title: Method and apparatus for tracking employee productivity
169.abstract: A method of tracking an employee's productivity includes receiving, by a computing device, sensor data associated with the employee. The sensor data is received from one or more sensors positioned proximate to the employee. The method also includes analyzing, by the computing device, the sensor data to identify at least one activity performed by the employee during a predetermined time period. The method further includes determining, by the computing device, whether the at least one activity corresponds to a pre-determined set of activities. The method additionally includes classifying, by the computing device, the at least one activity as either productive or non-productive in response to determining that the at least one activity corresponds to the pre-determined set of activities. Lastly, the method includes storing, by the computing device, information related to the classification of the at least one activity into a database.

170.content: Just because a piece of videotape never got edited into a broadcast program doesn't mean it's devoid of intel value. CIC long ago stuck its fingers into the networks' videotape libraries.
170.title: Method and apparatus for processing video data in a network-based digital video recorder (N-DVR) system
170.abstract: A method of processing video data includes receiving, by a computing device from a plurality of cameras coupled to an N-DVR system, the video data; identifying, by the computing device, one or more objects within the video data; determining, by the computing device, at least one characteristic associated with each of the one or more identified objects; storing, by the computing device, the determined at least one characteristic associated with each of the one or more identified objects as metadata that is associated with the video data; and transmitting, by the computing device, the video data and the stored metadata.

171.content: That, and the fact that she just came in here with a guy that everyone is scared of, gets her back through the containership to the reception area. “I need to use a Street terminal,” she says to the reception guy.
171.title: Systems and methods for providing secure access to a computing device using a street terminal
171.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for providing secure access to a computing device using a street terminal. In one implementation, a method includes detecting that a user is attempting to gain access to a computing device; determining whether the user is authorized to gain access to the computing device; in response to determining that the user is authorized to gain access to the computing device, obtaining biometric data associated with the user; comparing the biometric data to previously stored biometric data corresponding to the user; authenticating the user if the biometric data matches the previously stored biometric data; and granting access to the computing device upon authentication of the user. Implementations of the present disclosure also include computer-readable storage mediums encoded with instructions executable by one or more processors to perform the techniques described herein.

172.content: “A few maintenance workers, as normal.” “How do you know they are maintenance workers and not Rife soldiers in costume?
172.title: Apparatus and method for detecting unauthorized personnel
172.abstract: An apparatus for detecting an unauthorized person is disclosed. The apparatus includes at least one light source configured to emit electromagnetic waves in a predetermined wavelength range; at least one sensor configured to receive the electromagnetic waves emitted by the at least one light source, wherein the at least one sensor is positioned relative to the at least one light source such that the at least one sensor receives reflected electromagnetic waves of the electromagnetic waves emitted by the at least one light source; and a processing unit communicatively coupled to the at least one sensor, wherein the processing unit is configured to determine whether there is an unauthorized person within a detection zone using the reflected electromagnetic waves received by the at least one sensor. A method for detecting an unauthorized person is also disclosed.

173.content: “Lagos modified the strict Chomskyan theory by supposing that learning a language is like blowing code into PROMs—an analogy that I cannot interpret.” “The analogy is clear. PROMs are Programmable Read-Only Memory chips,” Hiro says. “When they come from the factory, they have no content. Once and only once, you can place information into those chips and then freeze it—the information, the software, becomes frozen into the chip—it transmutes into hardware. After you have blown the code into the PROMs, you can read it out, but you can't write to them anymore. So Lagos was trying to say that the newborn human brain has no structure—as the relativists would have it—and that as the child learns a language, the developing brain structures itself accordingly, the language gets ‘blown into' the hardware and becomes a permanent part of the brain's deep structure—as the universalists would have it.” “Yes. This was his interpretation.” “Okay. So when he talked about Enki being a real person with magical powers, what he meant was that Enki somehow understood the connection between language and the brain, knew how to manipulate it. The same way that a hacker, knowing the secrets of a computer system, can write code to control it—digital nam-shubs.” “Lagos said that Enki had the ability to ascend into the universe of language and see it before his eyes.
173.title: Method and apparatus for teaching a second language
173.abstract: A method of teaching a second language to a student is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) presenting, to the student, one or more first images; (b) receiving, from the student in response to presentation of the one or more first images, one or more responses corresponding to the one or more first images; (c) determining whether at least one of the one or more first images corresponds to at least one of a plurality of pre-determined keywords; (d) if it is determined in step (c) that at least one of the one or more first images corresponds to at least one of the plurality of pre-determined keywords, providing feedback to the student indicative of an association between the at least one of the one or more first images and the at least one of the plurality of pre-determined keywords; and (e) repeating steps (a)-(d) for successive

174.content: She is cruising down the Harbor Freeway, approaching the desired off-ramp, having pooned a southbound semi. A quarter-mile from the off-ramp, a bullet-pocked black Oldsmobile cruises past her, right-turn signal flashing.
174.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and responding to threats in an autonomous or semi-autonomous vehicle
174.abstract: A method of operating a self-driving vehicle is disclosed. The method includes receiving sensor data from one or more sensors associated with the self-driving vehicle, wherein the sensor data comprises information relating to objects within a vicinity of the self-driving vehicle. The method also includes processing the sensor data to identify at least one object that poses a threat to the self-driving vehicle; and responsive to identifying the at least one object that poses a threat to the self-driving vehicle, controlling operation of the self-driving vehicle such that the self-driving vehicle avoids contact with the at least one object that poses a threat to the self-driving vehicle.

175.content: So our gargoyle has already patched himself in to the computer that RadiKS uses to dispatch Kouriers.” The man with the glass eye turns, rotating his head way, way around like an owl, and nods in the direction of the gargoyle. A second later, Y.T.'s personal phone rings.
175.title: Method and apparatus for controlling a kiosk from a user's personal communication device (PCD)
175.abstract: A method of controlling a kiosk includes receiving, at a PCD, an indication that the PCD is within a predetermined proximity of the kiosk. The method also includes determining whether the PCD satisfies one or more conditions associated with communicating with the kiosk. In response to determining that the PCD satisfies the one or more conditions, the method further includes establishing a connection between the PCD and the kiosk via a local area network (LAN).

176.content: And there's miles and miles of it. After a few minutes, another chopper catches up with them and begins flying alongside, pretty close, in formation. It's the RARE chopper, the one full of medics. Through its cabin window, she can see Raven sitting in one of the seats.
176.title: A novel of the U.S. Army's 1st Special Forces Operational Detachment-Delta (SFOD-D)
176.abstract: The present invention is directed to a method for treating cancer comprising administering an effective amount of at least one anti-CD47 antibody or fragment thereof that binds to CD47, wherein the tumor cell expresses CD47 and/or the tumor microenvironment expresses CD47. In some embodiments, the tumor cell expresses CD47 but the tumor microenvironment does not express CD47. In some embodiments, the tumor microenvironment expresses CD47 but the tumor cell does not express CD47. In some embodiments, both the tumor cell and the tumor microenvironment express CD47. Also provided herein are pharmaceutical compositions comprising at least one anti-CD47 antibody or fragment thereof that binds to CD47 together with a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier.

177.content: She ushers him straight into a nice big paneled office where an Asian man sits behind a desk littered with models of helicopters. It is Mr. Ng himself. He stands up; they swap bows; the usher lady checks out. “You working with Fisheye?” Ng says, lighting up a cig. The smoke swirls in the air ostentatiously. It takes as much computing power realistically to model the smoke coming out of Ng's mouth as it does to model the weather system of the entire planet.
177.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for simulating a virtual environment based on a real-world environment
177.abstract: A method of simulating a virtual environment is provided. The method includes obtaining image data from an imaging device that captures images of a real-world environment in which the imaging device is disposed. The method also includes determining one or more objects within the real-world environment using the image data. The method further includes generating a three-dimensional (3D) model of at least a portion of the real-world environment based on the determined one or more objects.

178.content: Several of them overshot the Hong Kong franchise and had to back up a block or so. A barrage of doors thunking shut. Some of them don't bother, just leave the engines running and the doors wide open. Three jeeks linger on the sidewalk, eyeing the tire shreds impaled on spikes: long streaks of neoprene sprouting steel and fiberglass hairs, like ruined toupees.
178.title: Method and apparatus for cleaning a tire shred from a roadway
178.abstract: A method of cleaning a tire shred from a roadway includes the steps of (a) transporting at least a portion of the tire shred away from the roadway; (b) conveying the tire shred to a first location remote from the roadway; (c) receiving the tire shred at the first location; (d) depositing the tire shred onto a conveyor belt; (e) advancing the tire shred along the conveyor belt toward a second location remote from the roadway; (f) discharging the tire shred from the conveyor belt upon arrival at the second location; and (g) recirculating the tire shred back to the conveyor belt when the tire shred has not been completely discharged from the conveyor belt. An apparatus for cleaning a tire shred from a roadway is also disclosed

179.content: “Hey,” he says, “take this.” The Deliverator sticks his black-clad arm out the shattered window. A white rectangle glows in the dim backyard light: a business card. The Kourier snatches it from him on her next orbit, reads it. It says On the back is gibberish explaining how he may be reached: a telephone number. A universal voice phone locator code. A P.O. box. His address on half a dozen electronic communications nets. And an address in the Metaverse. “Stupid name,” she says, shoving the card into one of a hundred little pockets on her coverall.
179.title: Apparatus and method for delivering an item to a recipient
179.abstract: A delivery apparatus is provided. The delivery apparatus includes at least one sensor configured to detect movement of the delivery apparatus, wherein the at least one sensor is further configured to detect when the delivery apparatus has reached a predetermined distance from a location associated with a recipient's home address. A processor is coupled to the at least one sensor, wherein the processor is configured to receive data from the at least one sensor indicating that the delivery apparatus has reached the predetermined distance from the location associated with the recipient's home address. Responsive to receipt of the data, the processor is configured to send a notification to a mobile device associated with the recipient informing the recipient that the delivery apparatus is approaching the recipient's home address.

180.content: The bios patches itself into the CIC weather net so that it knows when it's about to run into precip. The aerodynamic cowling is totally flexible, calculates its own most efficient shape for the current speed and wind conditions, changes its curves accordingly, wraps around you like a nymphomaniacal gymnast. Scott figures this guy is going to waltz off with this thing for dealer invoice, being a friend and confidant of Mr. Norman. And it's not an easy thing for any red-blooded salesman to write out a contract to sell a sexy beast like this one at dealer invoice. He hesitates for a minute. Wonders what's going to happen to him if this is all some kind of mistake. The guy's watching him intently, seems to sense his nervousness, almost as if he can hear Scott's heart beating. So at the last minute he eases up, gets magnanimous—Scott loves these big-spender types—decides to throw in a few hundred Kongbucks over invoice, just so Scott can pull in a meager commission on the deal. A tip, basically. Then—icing on the cake—the guy goes nuts in the Cycle Shop.
180.title: Aerodynamic cowling for motorcycle helmets
180.abstract: An aerodynamic cowling for a motorcycle helmet is disclosed. In one embodiment, the aerodynamic cowling comprises an airfoil having a leading edge, a trailing edge, and a chord extending between the leading edge and the trailing edge.

181.content: Inside, the franchise is bright, white, robot-polished floors. A few feet from the doggie door is what looks like a black washing machine. This is the Rat Thing's hutch, where it lurks in darkness and privacy, waiting for a job to do. It is wired into the franchise by a thick cable coming out of the wall. Right now, the hutch's door is hanging open, which is another thing she's never seen before. And steam is rolling out from inside of it.
181.title: Method and apparatus for cleaning a floor of a retail establishment
181.abstract: A method includes receiving, by a computing device, an indication that a robotic vacuum cleaner is to be moved from a first location in a retail establishment to a second location within the retail establishment. The method also includes causing movement of the robotic vacuum cleaner from the first location to the second location such that the robotic vacuum cleaner cleans debris while moving from the first location to the second location. Movement of the robotic vacuum cleaner between the first location and the second location can include at least one of (i) driving the robotic vacuum cleaner over the debris or (ii) suctioning the debris as the robotic vacuum cleaner drives over the debris.

182.content: “I have an uncle who owns a car dealership in southern California,” Jason said, “and I know that's a rapidly expanding area, and—” “Plenty of opportunity zones!” Mr. Caruso said, pounding away on the keyboard with a flourish. He wheeled the monitor around to show Jason a map of the L.A. area blazing with red splotches that represented unclaimed turf sectors.
182.title: Method and apparatus for automated real estate brokerage
182.abstract: A computer-implemented method of conducting an automated real estate brokerage is disclosed. The method includes receiving, by a computing device, one or more inputs from a user; determining, by the computing device in response to the one or more inputs received from the user, at least one property characteristic associated with each of a plurality of properties that are available for sale; generating, by the computing device using the determined at least one property characteristic associated with each of the plurality of properties that are available for sale, a ranking of the plurality of properties that are available for sale; presenting, by the computing device via a graphical user interface (GUI), the ranking of the plurality of properties that are available for sale; receiving, by the computing device from the user via the GUI, a selection of one of the plurality of properties that are available for sale; and purchasing, by the computing device

183.content: When Fisheye becomes aware of this, he pulls the trigger again, the barrels whirl themselves up into a transparent cylinder, and the tearing, hissing noise begins again. As he waves the gun back and forth, hosing the target down with a hypersonic shower of depleted uranium, Bruce Lee's entire ship seems to sparkle and glitter, as though Tinkerbell was flying back and forth from stem to stem, sprinkling nuclear fairy dust over it. Bruce Lee's smaller yacht makes the mistake of coming around to see what's going on. Fisheye turns toward it for a moment and its high, protruding bridge slides off into the water. Major structural elements of the trawler are losing their integrity. Enormous popping and wrenching noises are coming from inside as big pieces of Swiss-cheesed metal give way, and the superstructure is slowly collapsing down into the hull like a botched soufflé. When Fisheye notes this, he ceases fire. “Cut it out, boss,” Vic says.
183.title: Method and apparatus for destroying an enemy vessel
183.abstract: A method of destroying an enemy vessel includes detecting, by a first unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), the enemy vessel. A second UAV is launched from the first UAV in response to detection of the enemy vessel. The second UAV flies toward the enemy vessel at a predetermined altitude while emitting electromagnetic pulses towards the enemy vessel. Upon destruction of the enemy vessel as a result of the electromagnetic pulses, the second UAV returns to the first UAV.

184.content: It is the shouting of someone who has just had a bucket of ice water dumped over his head. This shouting is still getting underway, she is still turning her head to look at the jeeks, when the doggie door emits another burst of light. Her eyes flick that-a-way; she thinks that she saw something, a long round shadow cross-sectioned in the light for a blurry instant as the door was being slammed inward.
184.title: Method and apparatus for detecting intruders
184.abstract: A method of detecting an intruder includes obtaining, by at least one processor, sensor data from sensors. The sensor data is indicative of the presence or absence of an object within a field of view (FOV) of each of the sensors. The method further includes determining, by the at least one processor, whether there are any false alarms in the sensor data. In response to determining that there are no false alarms in the sensor data, the method additionally includes classifying, by the at least one processor, portions of the sensor data as belonging to different types of objects. The method further includes generating, by the at least one processor, a three-dimensional (3D) model of the environment based on the sensor data including the classification of the portions of the sensor data into the different types of objects.

185.content: Gargoyle time. Hiro switches everything on: infrared, millimeter-wave radar, ambient-sound processing. The infrared doesn't do much in these circumstances, but the radar picks out all the weapons, highlights them in The Enforcers' hands, identifies them by make, model, and ammunition type. They're all fully automatic. But The Enforcers and the New South Africans don't need radar to see Hiro's katana with blood and spinal fluid running down the blade. The music of Vitaly Chernobyl and the Meltdowns is blasting through bad speakers all around him.
185.title: Method and apparatus for detecting concealed weapons
185.abstract: A method of detecting concealed weapons includes receiving, by a computing device, an image from a camera. The computing device determines that the image depicts at least one portion of a subject's torso. The computing device identifies features in the image corresponding to body parts of the subject. The computing device classifies each identified feature as belonging to either a left side or a right side of the subject's torso. The computing device calculates distances between respective ones of the identified features. The computing device compares the calculated distances with predetermined thresholds associated with different types of firearms.
