In one embodiment, an apparatus includes a plurality of sensors configured to generate sensor data indicative of the environment in which the apparatus is positioned; at least one processor coupled to the plurality of sensors, wherein the at least one processor is configured to receive the sensor data from the plurality of sensors via a wired or wireless communications link; and memory storing instructions executable by the at least one processor to cause the at least one processor to perform operations comprising determining whether any undead creatures are present within a predetermined proximity of the apparatus using the sensor data received from the plurality of sensors; responsive to determining that no undead creatures are present within the predetermined proximity of the apparatus, causing the apparatus to

316.content: They are cruising in the Mobile Unit. Y.T.'s hands are cuffed together in front of her. One hand is still half-encased in rubbery goo, smelling so intensely of vinyl fumes that both MetaCops have rolled down their windows. Six feet of loose fibers trail into her lap, across the floor of the Unit, out the door, and drag on the pavement.
316.title: Method and apparatus for restraining a subject
316.abstract: A method of restraining a subject includes positioning the subject in an upright posture, placing at least one foot of the subject into a shoe that is connected to a harness. The feet of the subject are secured within the shoes by securing straps so that the subject's legs are immobilized relative to his or her torso. In some embodiments, there may be more than one shoe attached to the harness with each shoe having its own corresponding pair of securing straps. A strap around the waist of the subject secures the upper body of the subject to the harness while another strap over the shoulders of the subject holds the arms of the subject against the chest of the subject.

317.content: Except that Rife was smart—he caught it in a controlled manner. He put it in a bottle. An informational warfare agent for him to use at his discretion. When it is placed into a computer, it snow-crashes the computer by causing it to infect itself with new viruses. But it is much more devastating when it goes into the mind of a hacker, a person who has an understanding of binary code built into the deep structures of his brain. The binary metavirus will destroy the mind of a hacker.” “So Rife can control two kinds of people,” Ng says. “He can control Pentecostals by using me written in the mother tongue. And he can control hackers in a much more violent fashion by damaging their brains with binary viruses.” “Exactly.” “What do you think Rife wants?” Ng says.
317.title: Method and apparatus for controlling human behavior using electromagnetic waves in the presence of weakly electric organisms
317.abstract: A method includes emitting an electromagnetic wave from at least one antenna, wherein the electromagnetic wave is configured to stimulate a weakly electric organism (WEO) within a subject. The method further includes detecting that the WEO has been stimulated with the electromagnetic wave. The method also includes determining whether the WEO has been stimulated by the electromagnetic wave above a predetermined threshold. If the WEO has not been stimulated by the electromagnetic wave above the predetermined threshold, the method includes adjusting characteristics of the electromagnetic wave such that the electromagnetic wave will stimulate the WEO above the predetermined threshold. On the other hand, if the WEO has been stimulated by the electromagnetic wave above the predetermined threshold, the method includes preventing future stimulation of the WEO by the electromagnetic wave.

318.content: The hall had been done up with an imaginary street pattern. Two “highways” divided it up into quadrants, and all the franchise companies and nationalities had their booths along the highways. Burbclaves and other companies had booths hidden among the suburban “streets” within the quadrants.
318.title: Burbclaves and methods of making and using the same
318.abstract: Provided herein are novel burcleaves, pharmaceutically acceptable salts thereof, compositions comprising them, and methods for their use.

319.content: He's yelling. Behind him, the Bangladeshis are picking up on his emotional vibes and becoming upset themselves. Suddenly, one of them, an incredibly gaunt man with a long drooping mustache, runs in front of the camera and begins to shout: “a ma la ge zen ba dam gal nun ka aria su su na an da . . .” The sounds spread from him to his neighbors, spreading across the flight deck like a wave. “Cut,” the journalist says, turning into the camera.
319.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable storage medium, for managing data. In some implementations, a method includes identifying, by a processor, a plurality of bangladeshis
319.abstract: methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable storage medium, for managing data. In some implementations, a method includes identifying, by a processor, a plurality of documents that are associated with one or more entities; determining, by the processor, an association between each document in the plurality of documents and at least one other document in the plurality of documents; associating, by the processor, each document in the plurality of documents with another document in the plurality of documents according to the determined associations; generating, by the processor, a graph comprising nodes corresponding to the plurality of documents and edges connecting pairs of nodes when there is an association between the pair of nodes; and outputting, by the processor, the generated graph.

320.content: Suddenly, they are fifty feet away from the trawler, not twenty feet. As the laughter on the railing dies away, Hiro hears a new sound: a low whirring noise from the direction of Fisheye, and from the atmosphere around them, a tearing, hissing noise, like the sound just before a thunderbolt strikes, like the sound of sheets being ripped in half. Looking back at Bruce Lee's trawler, he sees that the dark wavelike phenomenon was a wave of blood, as though someone hosed down the deck with a giant severed aorta.
320.title: Method and apparatus for harvesting marine mammals
320.abstract: A method of harvesting marine mammals includes receiving an indication that a marine mammal has been sighted in a body of water. A location of the marine mammal is determined within the body of water. An unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) is dispatched from a vessel into the body of water to locate the marine mammal. The UAV locates the marine mammal by emitting sonar pulses toward the surface of the body of water, detecting reflections of the sonar pulses at the surface of the body of water, and triangulating locations of the reflections relative to the UAV using time-of-flight measurements associated with travel times of the sonar pulses between the UAV and the reflections. Upon locating the marine mammal, the UAV communicates information about the marine mammal back to the vessel.

321.content: He was, in other words, expecting a hostage negotiation somewhat later on, after Rife had flown Y.T. back to his headquarters in Houston. But the hostage situation no longer obtains, and so Uncle Enzo feels it is important to stop Rife now, before he gets back to his home turf in Houston. He has called for a major realignment of Mafia forces, and right now, dozens of helicopters and tactical units are hastily replotting their courses and trying to converge on LAX as quickly as they can. But in the meantime, Enzo is here with a small number of his own personal bodyguards, and this technical surveillance man from Ng's organization.
321.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for managing an airport hostage situation. In some implementations, a computer-implemented method includes identifying a hostage situation at an airport
321.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for managing an airport hostage situation. In some implementations, a computer-implemented method includes identifying a hostage situation at an airport terminal; determining that one or more passengers are being held hostage by one or more terrorists within the airport terminal; in response to determining that the one or more passengers are being held hostage by the one or more terrorists within the airport terminal, transmitting information regarding the hostage situation to law enforcement personnel located outside of the airport terminal; receiving instructions from the law enforcement personnel related to responding to the hostage situation; and controlling operation of unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) according to the instructions received from the law enforcement personnel. Various other aspects are contemplated.

322.content: In the front it bends down sharply, and there is a black glass canopy, raked sharply like the windshield of a fighter plane. If the Rat Thing has eyes, this is where it looks out. Under that, where the jaw should be are the remains of some kind of mechanical stuff that has been mostly blown off by the explosion of the grenade. The black glass windshield—or facemask, or whatever you call it—has a hole blown through it.
322.title: Apparatus and method for controlling rodent infestation
322.abstract: An apparatus for controlling rodent infestation is disclosed.

323.content: “Hiro Protagonist,” the gargoyle says as Hiro finally tracks him down in the darkness beside a shanty. “CIC stringer for eleven months. Specializing in the Industry. Former hacker, security guard, pizza deliverer, concert promoter.” He sort of mumbles it, not wanting Hiro to waste his time reciting a bunch of known facts. The laser that kept jabbing Hiro in the eye was shot out of this guy's computer, from a peripheral device that sits above his goggles in the middle of his forehead. A long-range retinal scanner. If you turn toward him with your eyes open, the laser shoots out, penetrates your iris, tenderest of sphincters, and scans your retina. The results are shot back to CIC, which has a database of several tens of millions of scanned retinas. Within a few seconds, if you're in the database already, the owner finds out who you are. If you're not already in the database, well, you are now.
323.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for detecting unauthorized access to a computing device
323.abstract: A method of detecting unauthorized access to a computing device is disclosed. The method includes determining that the computing device has been inactive for a predetermined amount of time; while the computing device remains inactive after the predetermined amount of time, receiving an input from a sensor associated with the computing device indicative of motion proximate to the computing device; responsive to receiving the input indicating motion proximate to the computing device, determining that the computing device has been tampered with or accessed by an unauthorized user; and upon determining that the computing device has been tampered with or accessed by an unauthorized user, initiating one or more security protocols related to the computing device. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

324.content: His motorcycle is waiting for him on the gravel path that leads to the gate. Looking up over the fence, Hiro can see the lights of Downtown rising in the distance again. His computer has succeeded in jacking into L. Bob Rife's global network; he has access to the Street. This is as Hiro had expected. Rife must have a whole suite of satellite uplinks there on the Enterprise, patched into a cellular network covering the Raft.
324.title: Method and apparatus for communicating with an underwater habitat
324.abstract: A method of controlling communication between a surface vessel and an underwater habitat is disclosed. The method comprises receiving, at the surface vessel, one or more radio signals transmitted from the underwater habitat; determining whether the one or more radio signals are in accordance with a predetermined protocol; when the one or more radio signals are determined to be in accordance with the predetermined protocol, processing the one or more radio signals according to the predetermined protocol; and responding to the one or more radio signals according to the predetermined protocol.

325.content: Or coasting, slowly, arms splayed wildly out to the sides, chased by nervous security personnel. A piece of paper is wrapped around the pictures. It says: “Y.T.—Thanks for your help. As you can see from these pictures, I tried to train for this assignment, but it's going to take some practice. Your friend, Uncle Enzo.” Y.T. wraps the pictures up just the way they were, puts them back in her pocket, stifles a smile, returns to business matters.
325.title: Method and apparatus for training an autonomous vehicle to avoid collisions with pedestrians
325.abstract: A method of training an autonomous vehicle (AV) to avoid collisions with pedestrians includes receiving, by the AV, one or more sensor signals from one or more sensors associated with the AV. The method also includes detecting, by the AV, at least one presence of a pedestrian in proximity to the AV based on the one or more sensor signals. The method further includes determining, by the AV, that the AV is about to collide with the pedestrian based on the one or more sensor signals. The method additionally includes controlling, by the AV, movement of the AV away from the pedestrian when it is determined that the AV is about to collide with the pedestrian such that the AV does not collide with the pedestrian.

326.content: The kayaker looks behind himself for a few moments, reading the waves, then suddenly turns back around and begins to paddle hard, accelerating, glancing back every few strokes. A big wave is coming, and just as it swells up underneath the kayak, he's matching its speed. The kayak stays on top of the wave and shoots forward like a missile, riding the swell, suddenly going twice as fast as anything else on the water. Digging at the wave with one end of his paddle, the kayaker makes a few crude changes in his direction. Then he parks the paddle athwart the kayak, reaches down inside, and hauls out a small dark object, a tube about four feet long, which he hoists up to one shoulder. He and the speedboat shoot past each other going in opposite directions, separated by a gap of only about twenty feet.
326.title: Apparatus and method for retrieving an object from a body of water
326.abstract: A device configured to retrieve an object from a body of water is disclosed. The device may include a frame, a plurality of wheels coupled to the frame, wherein the plurality of wheels are movable relative to the frame between a deployed position and a stowed position, at least one propeller coupled to the frame such that rotation of the at least one propeller causes movement of the frame in a direction substantially perpendicular to a longitudinal axis of the frame, and a winch assembly coupled to the frame, wherein the winch assembly is operable to lift the object out of the body of water when the plurality of wheels are in the deployed position.

327.content: “First things first,” Juanita says. “The control tower.” “Okay, you get ready to grab the tablet, and I'll take out the control tower.” “How are you going to do that? By cutting people up with swords?” “Yeah.
327.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
327.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) includes receiving, by the UAV, at least one sensor measurement from each of a plurality of sensors associated with the UAV. Each of the plurality of sensors is configured to measure environmental conditions external to the UAV. The method also includes determining whether any of the at least one sensor measurement satisfies a predetermined condition. Responsive to determining that none of the at least one sensor measurement satisfies the predetermined condition, the method further includes adjusting flight characteristics of the UAV such that the UAV remains stationary relative to its surroundings.

328.content: “You saw the whole thing,” Da5id says. “A fixed-pattern of black-and-white pixels, fairly high-resolution. Just a few hundred thousand ones and zeroes for me to look at.” “So in other words, someone just exposed your optic nerve to, what, maybe a hundred thousand bytes of information,” Hiro says. “Noise, is more like it.” “Well, all information looks like noise until you break the code,” Hiro says. “Why would anyone show me information in binary code? I'm not a computer. I can't read a bitmap.” “Relax, Da5id, I'm just shitting you,” Hiro says.
328.title: Computer-implemented systems and methods for detecting anomalies in an autonomous vehicle
328.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure provide computer-implemented systems and methods for detecting anomalies in an autonomous vehicle. In one implementation, a method includes receiving sensor data from sensors associated with an autonomous vehicle (AV), wherein the AV is configured to operate without human intervention; determining whether at least some of the sensor data satisfies predetermined thresholds; responsive to determining that at least some of the sensor data satisfy the predetermined thresholds, identifying an anomaly within the AV; and transmitting information indicative of the anomaly to a remote computing device.

329.content: Hiro looks up, focuses his gaze on Earth, zooms in for a look. As he gets closer, the imagery he's looking at shifts from the long-range pictures coming in from the geosynchronous satellites to the good stuff being spewed into the CIC computer from a whole fleet of low-flying spy birds. The view he's looking at is a mosaic of images shot no more than a few hours ago. It's several miles across. Its shape constantly changes, but at the time these pictures were shot, it had kind of a fat kidney shape; that is, it is trying to be a V, pointed southward like a flock of geese, but there's so much noise in the system, it's so amorphous and disorganized, that a kidney is the closest it can come. At the center is a pair of enormous vessels: the Enterprise and an oil tanker, lashed together side by side. These two behemoths are walled in by several other major vessels, an assortment of container ships and other freight carriers. The Core.
329.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and identifying a vessel in a body of water
329.abstract: A method includes receiving, by one or more sensors associated with an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), sensor data from at least one sonar transducer. The UAV is configured to be airborne over a body of water. The method further includes processing the sensor data to generate image data representative of objects present in the body of water. The method also includes determining whether any of the objects depicted in the image data corresponds to a vessel located in the body of water. Responsive to determining that none of the objects depicted in the image data corresponds to a vessel located in the body of water, the method includes controlling the UAV to fly away from the body of water. On the other hand, responsive to determining that at least one of the objects depicted in the image data corresponds to a vessel located in the body of water, the method includes controlling the UAV to maneuver toward the vessel.

330.content: In Reality, people work with dangerous substances all the time—radioactive isotopes and toxic chemicals. You just have to have the right tools: remote manipulator arms, gloves, goggles, leaded glass. And in Flatland, when you need a tool, you just sit down and write it. So Hiro starts by writing a few simple programs that enable him to manipulate the contents of the scroll without ever seeing it. The scroll, like any other visible thing in the Metaverse, is a piece of software. It contains some code that describes what it looks like, so that your computer will know how to draw it, and some routines that govern the way it rolls and unrolls. And it contains, somewhere inside of itself, a resource, a hunk of data, the digital version of the Snow Crash virus. Once the virus has been extracted and isolated, it is easy enough for Hiro to write a new program called SnowScan. SnowScan is a piece of medicine. That is, it is code that protects Hiro's system—both his hardware and, as Lagos would put it, his bioware—from the digital Snow Crash virus. Once Hiro has installed it in his system, it will constantly scan the information coming in from outside, looking for data that matches the contents of the scroll. If it notices such information, it will block it.
330.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and preventing exposure to a computer virus
330.abstract: A method of detecting an unauthorized software application installed on a computing device is disclosed. The method includes determining, by a processor in the computing device, a plurality of trusted applications that are authorized to run on the computing device; identifying, by the processor, one or more suspicious processes running on the computing device; classifying, by the processor, each of the one or more suspicious processes as belonging to at least one of the plurality of trusted applications; generating, by the processor, a graphical user interface (GUI) comprising information associated with which of the plurality of trusted applications corresponds to each of the one or more suspicious processes; and presenting, by the processor, the generated GUI to a user of the computing device. Corresponding apparatus, system, methods and computer programs products are also disclosed.

331.content: Then he climbs up onto the wing of one of the planes so that his legs cannot be seen by someone crouching on the ground. He hunkers down on the end of the wing, opens his mouth so that he can hear better, and listens. The only thing he can hear at first is an uneven spattering noise that wasn't there before, like water falling out of a half-open faucet onto bare pavement. The sound seems to be coming from a nearby airplane. Uncle Enzo is afraid that it may be jet fuel leaking onto the ground, as part of a scheme to blow up this whole section of the airport and take out all opposition at a stroke. He drops silently to the ground, makes his way carefully around a couple of adjacent planes, stopping every few feet to listen, and finally sees it: one of his soldiers has been pinned to the aluminum fuselage of a Learjet by means of a long wooden pole. Blood runs out of the wound, down his pant legs, drips from his shoes, and spatters onto the tarmac. From behind him, Uncle Enzo hears a brief scream that suddenly turns into a sharp gaseous exhalation. He has heard it before. It is a man having a sharp knife drawn across his throat.
331.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable storage medium, for airport assassination. In some implementations, a method includes determining that an aircraft is scheduled to land at an airport, wherein
331.abstract: a first landing strip of the airport is occupied by another aircraft; identifying one or more unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) located within a predetermined range of the airport; selecting a UAV from the one or more UAVs as a designated UAV; controlling the designated UAV to fly toward the first landing strip while avoiding occupants of the other aircraft until the designated UAV arrives at the first landing strip; causing the designated UAV to collide with the other aircraft when the designated UAV arrives at the first landing strip; and controlling the designated UAV to land on the first landing strip after colliding with the other aircraft.

332.content: He has to jam the brakes, let traffic clear, cut across the curb lane to enter the Burbclave. The border post is well lighted, the customs agents ready to frisk all comers—cavity-search them if they are the wrong kind of people—but the gate flies open as if by magic as the security system senses that this is a CosaNostra Pizza vehicle, just making a delivery, sir. And as he goes through, the Kourier—that tick on his ass—waves to the border police! What a prick! Like he comes in here all the time!
332.title: Apparatus and method for preparing pizza
332.abstract: An apparatus for preparing a pizza includes a cooking chamber configured to receive the pizza. A heating element is disposed within the cooking chamber, wherein the heating element is configured to heat an interior surface of the cooking chamber so as to bake the pizza in the cooking chamber. The apparatus further includes at least one light emitting diode (LED) coupled to the heating element such that the LED illuminates the interior surface of the cooking chamber when the heating element is activated.

333.content: Where the driver's seat ought to be, there is a sort of neoprene pouch about the size of a garbage can suspended from the ceiling by a web of straps, shock cords, tubes, wires, fiber-optic cables, and hydraulic lines. It is swathed in so much stuff that it is hard to make out its actual outlines. At the top of this pouch, Y.T. can see a patch of skin with some black hair around it—the top of a balding man's head. Everything else, from the temples downward, is encased in an enormous goggle/mask/headphone/feeding-tube unit, held onto his head by smart straps that are constantly tightening and loosening themselves to keep the device comfortable and properly positioned. Below this, on either side, where you'd sort of expect to see arms, huge bundles of wires, fiber optics, and tubes run up out of the floor and are seemingly plugged into Ng's shoulder sockets . There is a similar arrangement where his legs are supposed to be attached, and more stuff going into his groin and hooked up to various locations on his torso. The entire thing is swathed in a one-piece coverall, a pouch, larger than his torso ought to be, that is constantly bulging and throbbing as though alive. “Thank you, all my needs are taken care of,” Ng says.
333.title: Vehicle for a single occupant
333.abstract: A vehicle is disclosed that can be used by a single occupant. The vehicle comprises at least one seat configured to accommodate an occupant of the vehicle, wherein the at least one seat is movable between a first position and a second position in response to movement of the occupant within the vehicle from a standing position to a seated position or vice versa.

334.content: He is wearing a partly assembled stage costume, apparently expecting to be performing tonight. Looks like he's taking Hiro up on his offer. He's watching a well-known television program called Eye Spy. It is produced by CIC and syndicated through one of the major studios. It is reality television: CIC picks out one of their agents who is involved in a wet operation—doing some actual cloak-and-dagger work—and has him put on a gargoyle rig so that everything he sees and hears is transmitted back to the home base in Langley. This material is then edited into a weekly hour-long program.
334.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for detecting anomalies in network traffic are disclosed herein. In one embodiment, a method for detecting anomalies in network traffic is disclosed. The method includes receiving
334.abstract: Method of forming an integrated circuit (IC) device comprising providing a semiconductor substrate; depositing a dielectric layer over the semiconductor substrate; patterning the dielectric layer to form a plurality of openings exposing portions of the semiconductor substrate; etching the semiconductor substrate through the plurality of openings to form a plurality of recesses extending into the semiconductor substrate; filling the plurality of recesses with a conductive material to form a plurality of interconnects electrically coupled to the semiconductor substrate; and encapsulating the plurality of interconnects within the dielectric layer.

335.content: It passes up through the plane of the rotor blades, near the center, and she can see the unbreakable cable start to wind itself around the delicate parts of the rotor's axle, like a garrote around a ballerina's neck. Through the chopper's windshield she can see Sasha reacting, flipping switches frantically, pulling levers, his mouth making a long string of Russian curses. The poon's handle gets snapped out of her hand, and she sees it get whipped into the center like it's a black hole.
335.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
335.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) includes determining, by the UAV, one or more control parameters associated with at least one component of the UAV; transmitting, by the UAV, the one or more control parameters to a ground station; receiving, by the UAV from the ground station, feedback information related to the one or more control parameters; calculating, by the UAV, updated control parameters based on the feedback information; and controlling, by the UAV, the at least one component of the UAV based on the updated control parameters.

336.content: Hiro is grinning wildly, pinioned in the crossfire of a dozen red laser beams scanning him from every direction at once. The Hong Kong robot security system is checking him out. Her, too; she looks down to see the lasers scribbling across her chest. “Welcome to Mr. Lee's Greater Hong Kong, Mr. Protagonist,” the security system says through a P.A. speaker. “And welcome to your guest, Ms. Y.T.”
336.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for generating a virtual reality environment based on an augmented reality environment
336.abstract: A method of generating a virtual reality (VR) environment from an augmented reality (AR) environment is provided. The method includes identifying one or more VR objects in the AR environment; determining that each of the one or more VR objects are to be displayed in the VR environment as a three-dimensional (3D) object rather than as a two-dimensional (2D) graphic; and displaying the one or more VR objects in the VR environment as 3D objects instead of as 2D graphics. Corresponding methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also provided.

337.content: This is it—got to pay more attention to the road—he swings into the side street, no warning, hoping maybe to whipsaw the Kourier into the street sign on the corner. Doesn't work. The smart ones watch your front tires, they see when you're turning, can't surprise them. Down Strawbridge Place! It seems so long, longer than he remembered—natural when you're in a hurry. Sees the glint of cars up ahead, cars parked sideways to the road—these must be parked in the circle. And there's the house. Light blue vinyl clapboard two-story with one-story garage to the side. He makes that driveway the center of his universe, puts the Kourier out of his mind, tries not to think about Uncle Enzo, what he's doing right now—in the bath, maybe, or taking a crap, or making love to some actress, or teaching Sicilian songs to one of his twenty-six granddaughters.
337.title: One-story garage with one-story living space above and a two-story living space on the other side of the garage
337.abstract: A building includes a first floor, a second floor disposed over the first floor, and a third floor disposed over the second floor. The building further includes a fourth floor disposed over the third floor. The building additionally includes an enclosure extending from the first floor to the third floor around at least a portion of each of the first floor, the second floor, and the third floor. The enclosure is configured to provide structural support for the first floor, the second floor, the third floor, and the fourth floor. In addition, the enclosure provides thermal insulation between the first floor, the second floor, the third floor, and the fourth floor. Further, the enclosure provides acoustic insulation between the first floor, the second floor, the third floor, and the fourth floor.

338.content: The Feds already know this, her house is bugged and tapped, it's a wonder it doesn't short out the electrical grid, all the extra stuff wired into it. “She broke my computer.” “Did she give an explanation for why she broke the computer?” “Yes. Sort of. I mean, if nonsense counts as an explanation.” “What was her explanation?” “She was afraid—this is so ridiculous—she was afraid I was going to catch a virus from it.”
338.title: Method and system for preventing unauthorized access to a computing device
338.abstract: A method of preventing unauthorized access to a computing device is disclosed. The method includes detecting, by the computing device, one or more sensors associated with the computing device; receiving, by the computing device, sensor data from each of the one or more sensors; determining, by the computing device, whether the sensor data satisfies at least one predetermined criterion; in response to determining that the sensor data satisfies the at least one predetermined criterion, transmitting, by the computing device, an authorization request to a remote server; receiving, by the computing device, an authorization code from the remote server; comparing, by the computing device, the authorization code received from the remote server with a previously stored authorization code; and granting, by the computing device, access to the computing device if the authorization code received from the remote server matches the previously stored authorization code.

339.content: She hooks it onto her belt so she can't fall and then thrashes around for what seems like a whole minute until she's not tangled up in the cable anymore, just dangling by the waist, twisting around and around between the chopper and the street, out of control. Then she gets the handle in both hands and unhooks it from her belt so she's hanging by the arms again, which was the whole point of the exercise. As she rotates, she sees the other chopper above her and off to the side, glimpses the faces watching her, knows that all of this is being relayed, over the radio, to Rife.
339.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) or unmanned aerial system (UAS)
339.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) or unmanned aerial system (UAS) is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: determining, by at least one sensor associated with the UAV/UAS, whether there is any obstacle within a predetermined distance from the UAV/UAS; in response to determining that there is no obstacle within the predetermined distance from the UAV/UAS, adjusting flight parameters of the UAV/UAS such that the UAV/UAS flies along a first trajectory towards a target location; and in response to determining that there is an obstacle within the predetermined distance from the UAV/UAS, adjusting the flight parameters of the UAV/UAS such that the UAV/UAS flies along a second trajectory different from the first trajectory towards the target location.

340.content: Hiro finds that his avatar can walk right through the hypercards without disturbing the arrangement. It is, in fact, the three-dimensional counterpart of a messy desktop, all the trash still remaining wherever Lagos left it. The cloud of hypercards extends to every corner of the 50-by-50-foot space, and from floor level all the way up to about eight feet, which is about as high as Lagos's avatar could reach. “How many hypercards in here?” “Ten thousand, four hundred and sixty-three,” the Librarian says.
340.title: Augmented reality library
340.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods, systems, and computer program products for providing augmented reality (AR) content. In one implementation, an AR application is executed by a computing device. The AR application includes instructions that cause the computing device to capture image data from a camera associated with the computing device. The captured image data depicts at least a portion of a real-world environment in which the computing device is located. The AR application also includes instructions that cause the computing device to analyze the captured image data to identify objects within the captured image data. The AR application further includes instructions that cause the computing device to determine whether any of the identified objects correspond to pre-stored AR content. Responsive to determining that none of the identified objects correspond to the pre-stored AR content, the AR application causes the computing device to display information indicating that no AR content has been found.

341.content: Weenie-roasting weather. Uncle Enzo is cooperating with Mr. Lee, which means working with Ng, and Ng, while highly competent, has a technological bias that Uncle Enzo distrusts. He would prefer a single good soldier in polished shoes, armed with a nine, to a hundred of Ng's gizmos and portable radar units. When they came out here, he was expecting a broad open space in which to confront Rife. Instead, the environment is cluttered. Several dozen corporate jets and helicopters are parked on the apron. Nearby is an assortment of private hangars, each with its own fenced-in parking area containing a number of cars and utility vehicles. And they are rather close to the tank farm where the airport's supply of jet fuel is stored. That means lots of pipes and pumping stations and hydraulic folderol sprouting out of the ground. Tactically, the area has more in common with a jungle than with a desert. The apron and runway themselves are, of course, more desertlike, although they have drainage ditches where any number of men could be concealed. So a better analogy would be beach warfare in Vietnam: a broad open area that abruptly turns into jungle.
341.title: Apparatus and method for cooking food over an open flame
341.abstract: An apparatus for cooking food over an open flame includes a housing having a first end and a second end opposite the first end. A base is disposed within the housing between the first end and the second end of the housing, wherein the base has a plurality of holes extending therethrough to allow heat generated by the open flame to be transferred from the open flame to the base. The apparatus further includes a support member coupled to the base such that the support member extends through the plurality of holes in the base when the support member is rotated about its longitudinal axis relative to the base.

342.content: “So to them there was no difference between infection with a parasite, like tapeworm, and demonic possession.” “Correct.” “Interesting. I wonder what they would have thought about computer viruses?” “Speculation is not in my ambit.” “Speaking of which—Lagos was babbling to me about viruses and infection and something called a namshub. What does that mean?” “Nam-shub is a word from Sumerian.”
342.title: Method and apparatus for treating or preventing an infectious disease by administering a therapeutically effective dose of a pharmaceutical composition comprising at least one antimicrobial peptide
342.abstract: Provided is a method for treating or preventing an infectious disease in a mammalian subject, the method comprising administering to said subject a pharmaceutical composition comprising at least one antimicrobial peptide. Also provided is use of at least one antimicrobial peptide in the manufacture of a medicament for treating or preventing an infectious disease in a mammalian subject.

343.content: Hiro runs after him. The Enforcer is trotting toward the end of the row, where the lights of the street are visible. The Enforcer exits the field a couple of seconds ahead of him, and, when Hiro gets to the curb, is in the middle of the road, illuminated mostly by flashing blue light from a giant overhead video screen. He is turning around and around with strange little stomping footsteps, not keeping his balance very well. He is saying, “Aaah, aaah” in a low, calm voice that gurgles as though he badly needs to clear his throat. As The Enforcer revolves, Hiro perceives that he has been impaled on an eight-foot-long bamboo spear.
343.title: Method and apparatus for capturing and releasing a person using a bamboo spear
343.abstract: A method of capturing and releasing a person using a bamboo spear includes inserting the bamboo spear into an insertion hole in a floor, moving the bamboo spear within the insertion hole from a first position to a second position, locking the bamboo spear at the second position, removing the bamboo spear from the insertion hole, unlocking the bamboo spear so that it can be withdrawn from the insertion hole, and withdrawing the bamboo spear from the insertion hole. In some embodiments, the step of moving the bamboo spear within the insertion hole from the first position to the second position comprises rotating the bamboo spear about its longitudinal axis while sliding the bamboo spear laterally within the insertion hole.

344.content: She looks out the window. The other chopper, the little aluminum corporate number, is flying alongside them, a little bit higher in the air, and all the people inside of it are peering out the windows, watching the pavement underneath them.
344.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) or unmanned aerial system (UAS)
344.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) or unmanned aerial system (UAS) is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of determining at least one control parameter, wherein the at least one control parameter relates to flight characteristics of the UAV or UAS; receiving sensor data from sensors associated with the UAV or UAS; processing the sensor data in accordance with the at least one control parameter to produce processed sensor data; comparing the processed sensor data against pre-determined thresholds that relate to safe operation of the UAV or UAS so as to determine whether the UAV or UAS is operating within predetermined safety parameters; and if it is determined that the UAV or UAS is not operating within the predetermined safety parameters, adjusting the at least one control parameter such that the UAV or UAS operates within the predetermined safety parameters.

345.content: Raven is ten meters away, grinning at him. “Bombs away,” Raven says. He pulls the glowing blue lozenge out of his sidecar with one hand and drops it on the center of the amphitheater. It breaks open like the shell of an egg and light shines out of it. The light begins to grow and take shape.
345.title: Method and apparatus for generating a holographic image
345.abstract: A method of generating a hologram comprises obtaining an object to be imaged by the hologram, wherein the object to be imaged is disposed at a first location in space. The method further comprises capturing images of the object to be imaged using one or more cameras while the object to be imaged is moved relative to the one or more cameras such that the object to be imaged is positioned at a plurality of different locations with respect to the one or more cameras. The method further comprises determining a three-dimensional (3D) model of the object to be imaged from the captured images. The method further comprises calculating a two-dimensional (2D) hologram corresponding to the 3D model of the object to be imaged. The method further comprises projecting the calculated 2D hologram onto a reflective surface located at a second location in space

346.content: She has arms that are as strong as a man's, strong from hanging on to that poon on the freeway, so she wraps them around his head like a vise and presses her forehead against the side of his head and starts orbiting the tip of her tongue around the little folded-over rim of his outer ear. He stands paralyzed for a couple of minutes, breathing shallowly, while she works her way inward, and when she finally shoves her tongue into his ear canal, he bucks and grunts like he's just been harpooned, lifts her up off his leg, kicks the chair across the room so hard it cracks against the steel wall of the shipping container. She feels herself falling backward toward the futon, thinks for a moment she's about to get crushed beneath him, but he catches all the weight on his elbows, except for his lower body, which slams into hers all at once, sending another electric shot of pleasure up her back and down her legs.
346.title: Method and apparatus for treating erectile dysfunction
346.abstract: A method of treating erectile dysfunction includes the steps of administering to a patient suffering from erectile dysfunction an intracavernosal injection of prostaglandin E1 (PGE1) in combination with at least one vasodilator selected from the group consisting of papaverine, phentolamine, methylene blue, nitroglycerin, sodium nitroprusside, dipyridamole, nifedipine, amlodipine, nicardipine, felodipine, benazepril, enalapril, lisinopril, captopril, hydralazine, minoxidil, prazosin, terazosin, doxazosin, alfuzosin, tamsulosin, yohimbine, phenylephrine, clonidine, methyld

347.content: Up ahead, the channel dead-ends. Hiro does a one-eighty. With the big heat exchanger dragging behind it, the boat is not nearly as maneuverable or as fast as Hiro wants it to be. He passes back underneath the booby-trap wire and starts exploring another narrow channel that he passed earlier. “Okay, we're home. You're sitting at your desk,” Y.T. says. “Okay,” Hiro says, “this is going to be tricky.”
347.title: Method and apparatus for navigating in a virtual reality environment
347.abstract: A method of navigating in a virtual reality (VR) environment is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: determining an orientation of a VR headset worn by a user; detecting, using at least one sensor attached to the VR headset, movement of the VR headset with respect to a real-world coordinate system; calculating a change in orientation of the VR headset relative to the real-world coordinate system as a function of the determined orientation of the VR headset and the detected movement of the VR headset with respect to the real-world coordinate system; and controlling navigation within the VR environment according to the calculated change in orientation of the VR headset relative to the real-world coordinate system.

348.content: Ng stops the van. He turns on some lights—very dim lights. That's how anal this guy is—he has gone to the trouble to install special dim lights in addition to all the bright ones. They are looking into a sort of bowl, right at the foot of a major drum heap, that is strewn with litter.
348.title: Method and apparatus for treating wastewater
348.abstract: A method of treating wastewater is disclosed. The method includes introducing the wastewater into an aeration tank, wherein the wastewater comprises hydrogen sulfide (H2S), ammonia (NH3), methane (CH4), carbon dioxide (CO2), nitrogen (N) and/or oxygen (O). The method further includes removing at least a portion of the H2S from the wastewater in the aeration tank to produce treated wastewater.

349.content: Now Jason Breckinridge is the manager of Nova Sicilia #5328 in the Valley. He puts on his smart terracotta blazer every morning and drives to work in his Oldsmobile. Lots of young entrepreneurs would be driving BMWs or Acuras, but the organization of which Jason is now a part puts a premium on tradition and family values and does not go in for flashy foreign imports. “If an American car is good enough for Uncle Enzo . . .” Jason's blazer has the Mafia logo embroidered on the breast pocket. A letter “G” is worked into the logo, signifying Gambino, which is the division that handles accounts for the L.A. Basin. His name is written underneath: “Jason (The Iron Pumper) Breckinridge.” That is the nickname that he and Mr. Caruso came up with a year ago at the job fair in Illinois.
349.title: Coffea arabica plant named Nova Sicilia #5328
349.abstract: The invention refers to a new and distinct variety of Coffea arabica seedlings, botanically known as Coffea arabica L. that is characterized by the following combination of morphological and physiological traits: (1) moderately vigorous growth habit; (2) dark green colored foliage; (3) purple-colored young stems; (4) glossy light green colored mature leaves; (5) medium-sized fruiting twigs; (6) high yield potential; (7) early flowering time; (8) late harvest time; (9) good resistance to coffee berry borer infestation; (10) good resistance to leaf rust infestation; (11) good resistance to black leaf spot infestation; and (12) resistant to coffee wilt disease.

350.content: There are big heaps of shit rising up from place to place—coal or slag or coke or smelt or something. Every time they come around a corner, they encounter a little plantation of vegetables, tended by Asians or South Americans. Y.T. gets the impression that Ng wants to just run them over, but he always changes his mind at the last instant and swerves around them. Some Spanish-speaking blacks are playing baseball on a broad flat area, using the round lids of fifty-five-gallon drums as bases. They have parked half a dozen old beaters around the edges of the field and turned on their headlights to provide illumination. Nearby is a bar built into a crappy mobile home, marked with a graffiti sign: THE SACRIFICE ZONE. Lines of boxcars are stranded in a yard of rusted-over railway spurs, nopal growing between the ties. One of the boxcars has been turned into a Reverend Wayne's Pearly Gates franchise, and evangelical CentroAmericans are lined up to do their penance and speak in tongues below the neon Elvis.
350.title: The Disposal Summary:Method and apparatus for disposing of unwanted matter
350.abstract: A method, system, and computer program product are disclosed for the disposal summary. In one embodiment, an exemplary method may include receiving data associated with at least one item to be disposed by a user; storing the received data in a database; retrieving information from the database that is stored therein relating to other items previously disposed by the user; calculating a total amount of waste generated by the user over a predetermined period of time using the retrieved information; determining whether the calculated total amount of waste exceeds a pre-determined threshold value; responsive to determining that the calculated total amount of waste does not exceed the pre-determined threshold value, transmitting instructions to dispose the at least one item; and responsive to determining that the calculated total amount of waste has exceeded the pre-determined threshold value, preventing transmission of instructions to dispose the at least one item.

351.content: In one hand he is holding a long device a couple of inches in diameter, which is the source of the whirring noise. It is a circular bundle of parallel tubes about pencil-sized and a couple of feet long, like a miniaturized Gatling gun. It whirs around so quickly that the individual tubes are difficult to make out; when it is operating, it is in fact ghostly and transparent because of this rapid motion, a glittering, translucent cloud jutting out of Fisheye's arm. The device is attached to a wrist-thick bundle of black tubes and cables that snake down into the large suitcase, which lies open on the bottom of the raft. The suitcase has a built-in color monitor screen with graphics giving information about the status of this weapons system: how much ammo is left, the status of various subsystems. Hiro just gets a quick glimpse at it before all of the ammunition on board Bruce Lee's ship begins to explode. “See, I told you they'd listen to Reason,” Fisheye says, shutting down the whirling gun. Now Hiro sees a nameplate tacked onto the control panel. “Fucking recoil pushed us halfway to China,” Fisheye says appreciatively.
351.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
351.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) is provided. The method includes determining, by the UAV, a current position of the UAV; receiving, by the UAV, one or more commands from a ground control station (GCS), wherein the one or more commands are associated with at least one task to be performed by the UAV; comparing, by the UAV, the current position of the UAV against a predetermined geofence boundary within which the UAV is permitted to fly; identifying, by the UAV, when the current position of the UAV breaches the predetermined geofence boundary, whether the one or more commands received from the GCS can be executed in accordance with airspace regulations; and executing, by the UAV, the one or more commands only if it is determined that the one or more commands can be executed in accordance with

352.content: None of that stuff.” “So what are we doing in this place?” He shrugs. “This is an example of the bad places I used to hang out. But if you're going to get decent food on the Raft, you have to come to a place like this.” A waiter approaches the table. His eyes are big, his movements tentative. He's not coming to take an order; he's coming to deliver bad news. “Sir, you are wanted on the radio.
352.title: Method and apparatus for communications over data-carrying power lines
352.abstract: A method of transmitting information from a source device to a destination device includes receiving, by the source device, an indication of at least one frequency band in which the source device is authorized to communicate with the destination device. The method further includes generating, by the source device, a plurality of modulated signals each having a different carrier frequency within the at least one frequency band; and transmitting, by the source device, the plurality of modulated signals to the destination device using the at least one frequency band. In addition, the method includes receiving, by the destination device, the plurality of modulated signals via the at least one frequency band; and demodulating, by the destination device, the plurality of modulated signals to recover the information. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

353.content: But like anything else in the Metaverse, this rule is nothing but a protocol, a convention that different computers agree to follow. In theory, it cannot be ignored. But in practice, it depends upon the ability of different computers to swap information very precisely, at high speed, and at just the right times. And when you are connected to the system over a satellite uplink, as Hiro is, out here on the Raft, there is a delay as the signals bounce up to the satellite and back down. That delay can be taken advantage of, if you move quickly and don't look back. Hiro passes right through the wall on the tail end of his all-penetrating katana. Rifeland is a vast, brightly lit space occupied by elementary shapes done up in primary colors. It is like being inside an educational toy designed to teach solid geometry to three-year-olds: cubes, spheres, tetrahedrons, polyhedrons, connected with a web of cylinders and lines and helices. But in this case, it has gone way, way out of control, as if every Tinkertoy set and Lego block ever made had been slapped together according to some long-forgotten scheme. Hiro's been around the Metaverse long enough to know that despite the bright cheery appearance of this thing, it is, in fact, as simple and utilitarian as an Army camp. This is a model of a system. A big complicated system. The shapes probably represent computers, or central nodes in Rife's worldwide network, or Pearly Gates franchises, or any other kind of local and regional offices that Rife has going around the world. By clambering over this structure and going into those bright shapes, Hiro could probably uncover some of the code that makes Rife's network operate. He could, perhaps, try to hack it up, as Juanita suggested.
353.title: Systems, methods, and computer-readable media for managing access to metaverse environments
353.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to systems, methods, and computer-readable media for managing access to metaverse environments. In one implementation, a method is performed at a computing device executing a virtual reality (VR) application that provides access to a VR environment in a metaverse comprising a plurality of interconnected VR environments. The method includes determining an identity of a first user accessing the VR environment; identifying a second user attempting to access the VR environment while the first user is accessing the VR environment; and preventing the second user from accessing the VR environment when the first user is accessing the VR environment. Numerous other implementations are also contemplated.

354.content: The one thing that can't be helped is the reaction time of the user. So when they were racing their latest motorcycle software, holding wild rallies through Downtown at Mach 1, they didn't worry about engine capacity. They worried about the user interface, the controls that enabled the rider to transfer his reactions into the machine, to steer, accelerate, or brake as quickly as he could think.
354.title: Motorcycle helmet with heads-up display
354.abstract: A motorcycle helmet includes a visor, an optical module disposed behind the visor and configured to project images onto at least one portion of the visor for viewing by a user wearing the motorcycle helmet.

355.content: “Turn off all the lights,” Eliot says when it seems they are still miles away. “Remember that we have already been sighted by several hundred or even several thousand people who are armed and hungry.” Vic is already going around the boat shutting off lights via the simple expedient of a ball peen hammer. Fisheye just stands there and listens intently to Eliot, suddenly respectful. Eliot continues.
355.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
355.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) includes receiving, by the UAV, at least one sensor measurement from each of a plurality of sensors associated with the UAV. Each of the plurality of sensors is configured to measure environmental conditions external to the UAV. The method also includes determining whether any of the at least one sensor measurement satisfies a predetermined condition. Responsive to determining that none of the at least one sensor measurement satisfies the predetermined condition, the method further includes transmitting control instructions to cause the UAV to perform a precautionary maneuver.

356.content: So it's not like she exactly feels vulnerable or anything. But still, she'd like to pick her target. So she maintains escape velocity until she's found the woman who seemed friendly—the bald chick in the torn-up Chanel knockoff—and then zeroes in on her. “Let's get off into the woods, man,” Y.T. says, “I want to talk to you about what's going on with what's left of your brain.” The woman smiles, struggles to her feet with the good-natured awkwardness of a retarded person in a good mood.
356.title: Apocalypse survival guide
356.abstract: A method of providing an apocalypse survival guide is disclosed. The method includes receiving, from a user device, a request to provide an apocalypse survival guide; determining that the user device is located within a predetermined geographic area; and in response to determining that the user device is located within the predetermined geographic area, transmitting information associated with the apocalypse survival guide to the user device.

357.content: That no matter how good it is, the Metaverse is distorting the way people talk to each other, and she wants no such distortion in her relationships. Da5id notices Hiro, indicates with a flick of his eyes that this is not a good time. Normally, such subtle gestures are lost in the system's noise, but Da5id has a very good personal computer, and Juanita helped design his avatar —so the message comes through like a shot fired into the ceiling. Hiro turns away, saunters around the big circular bar in a slow orbit. Most of the sixty-four bar stools are filled with lower-level Industry people, getting together in twos and threes, doing what they do best: gossip and intrigue. “So I get together with the director for a story conference.
357.title: Augmented Reality (AR) and Virtual Reality (VR) systems, apparatuses, methods, and computer program products for providing an immersive virtual reality (VR) or augmented reality (AR) environment for
357.abstract: An AR/VR system includes one or more sensors configured to capture sensor data. The AR/VR system also includes at least one computing device in communication with the one or more sensors. The at least one computing device is configured to receive the sensor data from the one or more sensors; process the sensor data to generate processed sensor data; compare the processed sensor data against predetermined thresholds to determine whether any of the processed sensor data exceeds the predetermined thresholds; and responsive to determining that any of the processed sensor data exceeds the predetermined thresholds, provide visual cues indicative of hazardous conditions associated with VR content being presented via the AR/VR system. Various other aspects are contemplated.

358.content: “Got it.” At half an hour on the dot, she hears the back door being unlocked. The lights come on. Her Knight Visions save her from wracking eyeball pains. The manager thunks down a couple of steps, glares at her, glares at her for rather a long time. The manager, clearly, is tempted. That momentary glimpse of flesh has been ricocheting around in his brain for half an hour. He is wracking his mind with vast cosmological dilemmas.
358.title: Sexual harassment in the workplace
358.abstract: A system and method for detecting sexual harassment in the workplace is disclosed. In one embodiment, an exemplary computer-implemented method comprises obtaining data from at least one of a plurality of video cameras positioned to capture images of individuals within a geographic area; analyzing the obtained data to identify behaviors that may be indicative of sexual harassment; determining whether any of the identified behaviors are occurring within the geographic area; and if it is determined that any of the identified behaviors are occurring within the geographic area, notifying law enforcement authorities about the occurrence of such behavior(s). Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

359.content: It's like if they figured out a way to regulate horses at the same time the Model T and the airplane were being introduced.” “But a cable TV system isn't the same as a phone system.” “At that stage it wasn't, cause it was just a local system. But once you get local systems all over the world, all you got to do is hook 'em together and it's a global network. Just as big as the phone system. Except this one carries information ten thousand times faster. It carries images, sound, data, you name it.” A naked PR plant, a half-hour television commercial with no purpose whatsoever other than to let L. Bob Rife tell his side of a particular issue. It seems that a number of Rife's programmers, the people who made his systems run, got together and formed a union—unheard of, for hackers—and filed a suit against Rife, claiming that he had placed audio and video bugs in their homes, in fact placed all of them under twenty-four-hour surveillance, and harassed and threatened some programmers who were making what he called “unacceptable lifestyle choices.” For example, when one of his programmers and her husband engaged in oral sex in their own bedroom one night, the next morning she was called into Rife's office, where he called her a slut and a sodomite and told her to clean out her desk. The bad publicity from this so annoyed Rife that he felt the need to blow a few million on some more PR. “I deal in information,” he says to the smarmy, toadying pseudojournalist who “interviews” him.
359.title: Systems and methods for providing an internet of things (IoT) platform that includes a plurality of IoT devices and a plurality of computing devices, wherein the plurality of IoT devices are in communication with the
359.abstract: A system including at least one processor; memory coupled to the at least one processor; instructions stored in the memory to be executed by the at least one processor to provide an Internet of Things (IoT) platform that includes a plurality of IoT devices and a plurality of computing devices, wherein the plurality of IoT devices are in communication with the plurality of computing devices.

360.content: Instead, he's got to put up with two-dimensional satellite imagery. He is looking at a red dot superimposed on a black-and-white photograph of the Raft. The red dot is in the middle of a narrow black channel of water: YOU ARE HERE.
360.title: Systems and methods for detecting anomalies in geospatial data
360.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for detecting anomalies in geospatial data. In one implementation, an apparatus includes at least one processor coupled to a machine-readable medium. The at least one processor may be configured to execute computer-executable instructions stored on the machine-readable medium. When executed, the computer-executable instructions may instruct the at least one processor to perform operations comprising obtaining spatial data associated with a plurality of locations; determining whether each location of the plurality of locations is within a predetermined threshold distance from another location of the plurality of locations; and identifying as an anomaly any location of the plurality of locations that is determined not to be within the predetermined threshold distance from another location of the plurality of locations.

361.content: Ng keeps changing the direction of the van, as though he's searching for something, and Y.T. gets the sense that the pitch of the hum is rising. It's definitely rising, building up in the direction of a squeal. Ng snarls a command and the volume is reduced.
361.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an autonomous vehicle
361.abstract: A method of controlling an autonomous vehicle includes determining, by one or more sensors associated with the autonomous vehicle, that the autonomous vehicle is to be stopped at a stop line. The method also includes stopping the autonomous vehicle in accordance with a first set of instructions when the autonomous vehicle is determined to be within a predetermined distance from the stop line. The method further includes continuing to move the autonomous vehicle in accordance with a second set of instructions when the autonomous vehicle is determined to be less than the predetermined distance from the stop line.

362.content: It flashes back and forth from color to black and white, and when it's in color, it rolls wildly around the color wheel as though being strafed with high-powered disco lights. And it's not staying within it's own body space; hair-thin pixel lines keep shooting off to one side, passing all the way across The Black Sun and out through the wall. It is not so much an organized body as it is a centrifugal cloud of lines and polygons whose center cannot hold, throwing bright bits of body shrapnel all over the room, interfering with people's avatars, flickering and disappearing.
362.title: Methods and systems for managing virtual reality (VR) environments
362.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include methods and systems for managing VR environments. In one implementation, a method is performed by at least one processor executing instructions embodied in non-transitory memory. The method includes determining that a first user device associated with a first user has moved from a first location to a second location different than the first location. Responsive to determining that the first user device associated with the first user has moved from the first location to the second location different than the first location, identifying an augmented reality (AR) environment corresponding to the second location. Further, responsive to identifying the AR environment corresponding to the second location, transmitting information indicative of the identified AR environment to a second user device associated with a second user. Numerous other aspects are also claimed and described.

363.content: Fido knows a whole lot of different streets. He just runs down streets, and he knows where he is and where he's going. At first, the only trace that B-782 leaves of his passage is a dancing trail of sparks down the center of the franchise ghetto. But once he makes his way out onto a long straight piece of highway, he begins to leave further evidence: a spume of shattered blue safety glass spraying outward in parallel vanes from all four lanes of traffic as the windows and the windshields of the cars blow out of their frames, spraying into the air like rooster tails behind a speedboat.
363.title: Method and system for detecting unauthorized use of an autonomous vehicle
363.abstract: A method is provided for detecting unauthorized use of an autonomous vehicle. The method includes receiving, by a computing device associated with the autonomous vehicle, sensor data from one or more sensors coupled to the autonomous vehicle; processing, by the computing device, the sensor data to identify at least one user in proximity to the autonomous vehicle; determining, by the computing device, whether the at least one user is authorized to operate the autonomous vehicle; and responsive to determining that the at least one user is not authorized to operate the autonomous vehicle, preventing operation of the autonomous vehicle by the at least one user. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

364.content: “I don't see the connection between Da5id's computer having a crash, and you calling an ambulance.” “The Brandy's scroll wasn't just showing random static. It was flashing up a large amount of digital information, in binary form. That digital information was going straight into Da5id's optic nerve. Which is part of the brain, incidentally—if you stare into a person's pupil, you can see the terminal of the brain.” “Da5id's not a computer. He can't read binary code.” “He's a hacker. He messes with binary code for a living. That ability is firm-wired into the deep structures of his brain. So he's susceptible to that form of information.
364.title: Methods and systems for treating neurological disorders
364.abstract: A method of treating a neurological disorder in a subject is provided. The method includes administering to the subject one or more doses of an adeno-associated virus (AAV) encoding brain derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF), wherein the AAV expresses BDNF at a level sufficient to treat the neurological disorder.

365.content: The smoke ties her bronchial passages into granny knots. The place is equipped with a shattering Third World sound system: pure distortion echoing off painted steel walls at three hundred decibels. A television set bolted onto one wall is showing foreign cartoons, done up in a two-color scheme of faded magenta and lime green, in which a ghoulish wolf, kind of like Wile E. Coyote with rabies, gets repeatedly executed-in ways more violent than even Warner Bros. could think up.
365.title: Method and apparatus for treating a respiratory disorder associated with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)
365.abstract: A method of treating a respiratory disorder associated with COPD includes administering to a patient in need thereof an anti-IL-13 antibody or fragment thereof, wherein the anti-IL-13 antibody or fragment thereof comprises (i) a heavy chain variable domain having the amino acid sequence of SEQ ID NO: 2; and (ii) a light chain variable domain having the amino acid sequence of SEQ ID NO: 4.

366.content: “Shit, that's just what I need, trying to explain to Uncle Enzo how I managed to get his little bunny rabbit shot in the kneecaps.” “It's a noninvasive procedure,” the computer guy says in a placid, liquid voice. The computer guy rotates the case around in his hand a few times, just to get a feel for it. Then he slides it into a large open-ended cylinder that is resting on the top of a table. The walls of the cylinder are a couple of inches thick. Frost appears to be growing on this thing. Mystery gases continuously slide off of it, like teaspoons of milk dropped into turbulent water. The gases plunge out across the table and drop to the floor, where they make a little carpet of fog that flows and blooms around their shoes. When the computer guy has it in place, he yanks his hand back from the cold. Then he puts on a pair of computer goggles. That's all there is to it.
366.title: Method and apparatus for diagnosing and treating mental illness
366.abstract: A method of diagnosing or treating a mental illness includes obtaining, by a computing device, physiological data associated with an individual; determining, by the computing device, one or more features from the physiological data; generating, by the computing device, a feature vector including the one or more features; transmitting, by the computing device, the feature vector to at least one remote server; receiving, by the computing device, a classification result indicating whether the individual has the mental illness.

367.content: The driver's side window of the black car rolls down. It's the guy. Jason. He's sticking his whole head out the window to look back at her, driving blind.
367.title: Method and apparatus for controlling a vehicle
367.abstract: A method of controlling a vehicle includes determining, by an electronic control unit (ECU) of the vehicle, at least one first parameter relating to a driving state of the vehicle; determining, by the ECU, at least one second parameter relating to the driving state of the vehicle; comparing, by the ECU, the at least one first parameter with the at least one second parameter; identifying, by the ECU, in response to the comparison between the at least one first parameter and the at least one second parameter meeting a predetermined criterion, that the vehicle is travelling off-road; and performing, by the ECU, upon identification that the vehicle is travelling off-road, at least one action.

368.content: Da5id scans the table, picks up one of the hypercards, and shows it to Hiro. “Da5id,” Hiro says, “I can't believe you took a hypercard from a black-and-white person.” Da5id laughs.
368.title: Method and apparatus for providing an augmented reality (AR) user interface for a virtual reality (VR) head-mounted display (HMD)
368.abstract: A method of operating a VR HMD is disclosed. The method comprises detecting, by one or more sensors associated with the VR HMD, movement of the VR HMD relative to a real-world environment in which the VR HMD is located. The method further comprises determining that the movement of the VR HMD has exceeded a predetermined threshold value. In response to determining that the movement of the VR HMD has exceeded the predetermined threshold value, the method comprises controlling at least one aspect of operation of the VR HMD so as to transition from a first mode of operation corresponding to use of the VR HMD in the real-world environment to a second mode of operation corresponding to use of the VR HMD in an AR environment distinct from the real-world environment.

369.content: But there's also the question of the big chopper, which has a talent for making noise. She drags herself out onto the hood of the car, feeling little hunks of safety glass beneath her carving parallel scratches into the paint job. Rife's big Soviet chopper is right there, hovering about twenty feet above the avenue, and by the time she sees it, it has already accumulated a dozen more poons. Her eyes follow the cables down to street level, and she sees Kouriers straining at the lines; this time, they're not letting go. Rife gets suspicious, and the chopper gains altitude, lifting the Kouriers off their planks. But a passing double-bottom semi sheds a small army of Kouriers—there must be a hundred of them pooned onto the poor thing—and within a few seconds, all their MagnaPoons are airborne and at least half of them stick to the armor plating on the first try. The chopper lurches downward until all of the Kouriers are on the ground again. Twenty more Kouriers come flying in and nail it; those that can't, grab onto someone else's handle and add their weight.
369.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
369.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: determining, by at least one sensor associated with the UAV, a current position of the UAV relative to a target location; receiving, by a processor associated with the UAV, control signals from a ground-based controller in response to the determined current position of the UAV relative to the target location; comparing, by the processor, the received control signals against predetermined flight parameters relating to manoeuvrability of the UAV; generating, by the processor, updated control signals responsive to the comparison between the received control signals and the predetermined flight parameters; and transmitting, by the processor, the updated control signals to propulsors associated with the UAV so as to cause the UAV to move towards the target location.

370.content: “So our buddy, Enki, the hacker god, has to bail her ass out of Hell.” “Enki creates two people and sends them into the netherworld to rescue Inanna. Through their magic, Inanna is brought back to life. She returns from the netherworld, followed by a host of the dead.” “Juanita went to the Raft three days ago,” Hiro says. “It's time to get hacking.”
370.title: Methods, systems, and computer-readable media for managing a virtual reality environment
370.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to methods, systems, and computer-readable media for managing a virtual reality (VR) environment. In one implementation, a method is performed at an electronic device with one or more processors, wherein the electronic device comprises a head-mounted display configured to be worn by a user wearing the head-mounted display. The method includes displaying, via the head-mounted display, a VR environment; detecting that the user has removed the head-mounted display from the user's eyes; in response to detecting that the user has removed the head-mounted display from the user's eyes, pausing playback of content associated with the VR environment; and resuming playback of the content associated with the VR environment after a predetermined period of time.

371.content: Y.T. turns to look behind herself. One of the miniature suns is hanging above the maze of shipping containers, casting light into all its crannies, blinding the gunmen who stand guard there.
