The scene flashes too light and too dark as her goggles' electronics try to make up their mind. But in the midst of this whole visual tangle she gets one image printed indelibly on her retina: the gunmen going down like a treeline in a hurricane, and for just an instant, a line of dark angular things silhouetted above the maze as they crest it like a cybernetic tsunami. Rat Things. They have evaded the whole maze by leaping over it in long, flat parabolas.
371.title: Method and apparatus for defeating autonomous drones and other unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs) and unmanned aerial systems (UASs)
371.abstract: A method of defeating an Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) or Unmanned Aerial System (UAS) is disclosed. The method may include detecting the UAV/UAS, determining that the UAV/UAS is operating in accordance with one or more predetermined flight patterns, identifying when the UAV/UAS deviates from the one or more predetermined flight patterns, transmitting a jamming signal to the UAV/UAS while the UAV/UAS operates in accordance with the one or more predetermined flight patterns, and continuing to transmit the jamming signal to the UAV/UAS after the UAV/UAS deviates from the one or more predetermined flight patterns until the UAV/UAS returns to the one or more predetermined flight patterns.

372.content: The binocular guy nods, reaches up with one hand and presses a lapel switch. The next time he turns around, a word is written across his back in neon green electropigment: MAFIA. The older guy turns away; his windbreaker says the same thing. Hiro turns around in the middle of the gangplank. There are twenty crew members in plain sight all around him. Suddenly, their black windbreakers all say, MAFIA. Suddenly, they are all armed.
372.title: Method and apparatus for identifying a person' 100 feet or more away
372.abstract: A method of identifying a person who is at least one hundred (100) feet from an electronic device. The method includes receiving, by the electronic device, first biometric data corresponding to a user of the electronic device; transmitting, by the electronic device, the first biometric data to a remote server; receiving, by the electronic device, second biometric data corresponding to the person that is at least one hundred (100) feet from the electronic device; comparing, by the electronic device, the first biometric data with the second biometric data; determining, by the electronic device, whether there is a match between the first biometric data and the second biometric data; and in response to determining that there is a match between the first biometric data and the second biometric data, enabling communication between the electronic device and the person. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

373.content: “Not all languages are the same, as Steiner points out. Some languages are better at metaphor than others. Hebrew, Aramaic, Greek, and Chinese lend themselves to word play and have achieved a lasting grip on reality: ‘Palestine had Qiryat Sefer, the “City of the Letter,” and Syria had Byblos, the “Town of the Book.” By contrast other civilizations seem “speechless” or at least, as may have been the case in Egypt, not entirely cognizant of the creative and transformational powers of language.' Lagos believed that Sumerian was an extraordinarily powerful language—at least it was in Sumer five thousand years ago.” “A language that lent itself to Enki's neurolinguistic hacking.” “Early linguists, as well as the Kabbalists, believed in a fictional language called the tongue of Eden, the language of Adam. It enabled all men to understand each other, to communicate without misunderstanding.
373.title: Method and apparatus for communicating with an extraterrestrial intelligence
373.abstract: A method of communicating with an extraterrestrial intelligence (ETI) includes receiving, from the ETI, one or more signals transmitted into space by the ETI. The method also includes determining that the one or more signals are encoded in accordance with a predetermined encoding scheme. The method further includes decoding the one or more signals using the predetermined encoding scheme to obtain at least one piece of information about the ETI.

374.content: The rest of him looks more like his father, who was African by way of Texas by way of the Army—back in the days before it got split up into a number of competing organizations such as General Jim's Defense System and Admiral Bob's National Security. Four things are on the cargo pallet: a bottle of expensive beer from the Puget Sound area, which Hiro cannot really afford; a long sword known in Nippon as a katana and a short sword known as a wakizashi—Hiro's father looted these from Japan after World War II went atomic—and a computer. The computer is a featureless black wedge. It does not have a power cord, but there is a narrow translucent plastic tube emerging from a hatch on the rear, spiraling across the cargo pallet and the floor, and plugged into a crudely installed fiber-optics socket above the head of the sleeping Vitaly Chernobyl. In the center of the plastic tube is a hair-thin fiber-optic cable. The cable is carrying a lot of information back and forth between Hiro's computer and the rest of the world. In order to transmit the same amount of information on paper, they would have to arrange for a 747 cargo freighter packed with telephone books and encyclopedias to power-dive into their unit every couple of minutes, forever. Hiro can't really afford the computer either, but he has to have one. It is a tool of his trade. In the worldwide community of hackers, Hiro is a talented drifter.
374.title: Method and apparatus for authenticating an identity of a user of a computing device based on a biometric characteristic of the user and a method and apparatus for authorizing access to at least one function of the computing device based on the authenticated identity
374.abstract: A method is provided for authenticating an identity of a user of a computing device. The method comprises receiving, via a first input/output (I/O) interface of the computing device, data representative of a biometric characteristic of the user; determining whether the received data satisfies a pre-determined criterion; in response to determining that the received data satisfies the pre-determined criterion, transmitting, via a second I/O interface of the computing device different from the first I/O interface, a signal indicative of the determined satisfaction of the pre-determined criterion; and upon receiving, via the second I/O interface, a confirmation signal responsive to the transmitted signal, authenticating the identity of the user of the computing device. Corresponding apparatus, system, computer program product, and methods are also provided.

375.content: She throws her plank outside onto the parking lot, drags her body through just as she hears the rear door being unlocked. By the time the three-ringer has found that all-important light switch, she is banking a sharp turn into the front lot—which has turned into a jeek festival!
375.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an autonomous vehicle to avoid pedestrians in a parking lot
375.abstract: A method of controlling an autonomous vehicle includes determining that the autonomous vehicle is entering a parking lot. The method also includes detecting one or more pedestrians in the parking lot while the autonomous vehicle is driving within the parking lot. The method further includes identifying a first path through the parking lot, wherein the first path does not intersect with the one or more pedestrians. The method additionally includes navigating the autonomous vehicle along the first path such that the autonomous vehicle avoids the one or more pedestrians.

376.content: Your driver is hit!” “Got it!” Squeaky hollers. Hiro goes back into the closest row. He hears a sound off to the right and uses the katana to cut his way through into that row. This is not a nice place to be at the moment, but it is safer than standing in the street under the plutonic light of the video screen. Down the row is a man. Hiro recognizes him by the strange shape of his head, which just gets wider until it reaches his shoulders.
376.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an autonomous vehicle
376.abstract: A method of controlling an autonomous vehicle includes determining, by one or more sensors associated with the autonomous vehicle, that the autonomous vehicle is moving at a speed greater than a predetermined threshold. Responsive to determining that the autonomous vehicle is moving at the speed greater than the predetermined threshold, control circuitry associated with the autonomous vehicle controls the autonomous vehicle to decelerate from the speed greater than the predetermined threshold to a speed less than the predetermined threshold. Control circuitry associated with the autonomous vehicle further controls the autonomous vehicle to accelerate from the speed less than the predetermined threshold back to the speed greater than the predetermined threshold.

377.content: Working on her computer. But she's not looking at the screen right now, she's got some notes on her lap that she's going through. Just as Mom is looking up at her, Y.T. winds up and throws the crystal award. It goes right over Mom's shoulder, glances off the computer table, flies right through the picture tube. Awesome results.
377.title: Method and apparatus for delivering an object to a target
377.abstract: A method of delivering an object to a target comprising the steps of: (a) providing at least one sensor; (b) receiving data from the at least one sensor; (c) analyzing the data received in step (b); (d) determining, based on the analysis performed in step (c), whether or not it is safe to deliver the object to the target; and (e) delivering the object to the target when it is determined in step (d) that it is safe to deliver the object to the target.

378.content: A passing fighter plane bursts into flames, falls out of its trajectory, and zooms directly toward him at twice the speed of sound. It plows into the Street fifty feet in front of him, disintegrates, and explodes, blooming into a tangled cloud of wreckage and flame that skids across the pavement toward him, growing to envelop him so that all he can see is turbulent flame, perfectly simulated and rendered. Then the display freezes, and a man materializes in front of Hiro. He is a classic bearded, pale, skinny hacker, trying to beef himself up by wearing a bulky silk windbreaker blazoned with the logo of one of the big Metaverse amusement parks. Hiro knows the guy; they used to run into each other at trade conventions all the time.
378.title: Systems and methods for generating virtual reality environments based on real-world data
378.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for generating virtual reality (VR) environments based on real-world data. In one implementation, a VR environment may be generated by obtaining sensor data from sensors associated with an autonomous vehicle traveling along a roadway. The sensor data may be analyzed to identify objects in the vicinity of the autonomous vehicle. One or more attributes of the identified objects may be determined using the sensor data. A VR environment may then be generated that includes representations of at least some of the identified objects according to the one or more attributes. The VR environment may be presented via a head mounted display worn by a user operating the autonomous vehicle.

379.content: Leni Riefenstahl films. The sculptures of Michelangelo and the fictional inventions of Da Vinci made real. World War II dogfights zooming in and out of the middle, veering out over the crowd, shooting and burning and exploding. Scenes from a thousand classic films, flowing and merging together into a single vast complicated story. But in time, it begins to simplify itself and narrow into a single bright column of light. By this point, it is the music that is carrying the show: a pounding bass beat and a deep, threatening ostinato that tells everyone to keep watching, the best is yet to come.
379.title: Systems and methods for providing an immersive audiovisual experience
379.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for providing an immersive audiovisual experience. In one implementation, a method includes receiving first audio data associated with a first virtual environment (VE), determining second audio data associated with a second VE that is different from the first VE, combining the first audio data and the second audio data to generate combined audio data, and transmitting the combined audio data to at least one head-mounted device (HMD).

380.content: Raven strokes one end of it with his other hand, and a chunk falls off. Something flickers in that hand, the blade of a knife apparently. He has just cut off the end of the pole at an acute angle to make it into a spear.
380.title: Method and apparatus for harvesting aquatic organisms from a body of water
380.abstract: A method is provided for harvesting aquatic organisms from a body of water. The method comprises the steps of: (a) deploying, in the body of water, a plurality of acoustic transducers; (b) transmitting an acoustic signal into the body of water using at least one of the plurality of acoustic transducers such that the acoustic signal propagates through the body of water; (c) receiving reflections of the acoustic signal with at least one of the plurality of acoustic transducers to determine locations of aquatic organisms within the body of water; (d) determining sizes of the aquatic organisms by measuring distances traveled by portions of the acoustic signal reflected off the aquatic organisms; and (e) controlling movement of a capture device relative to the aquatic organisms so as to capture the aquatic organ

381.content: “So Ovchinnikov let himself be persuaded to use his submarine—which is very large and very fast—to evacuate some of these poor Refus to TROKK. “But, naturally, he was paranoid about the idea of letting a whole bunch of unknown quantities onto his ship. These nuke-sub commanders are real security freaks, for obvious reasons. So they set up a very strict system. All the Refus who were going to get on the ship had to pass through metal detectors, had to be inspected.
381.title: Systems and methods for facilitating refugee resettlement in a host country are disclosed herein. In one embodiment, a method for facilitating refugee resettlement in a host country is disclosed. The method
381.abstract: Implementing: receiving data associated with a plurality of refugees to be resettled in the host country; analyzing the received data to identify at least one common attribute among the plurality of refugees; determining that the at least one common attribute relates to an employment status of the plurality of refugees; accessing information related to job opportunities available in the host country; identifying potential matches between the plurality of refugees and the job opportunities from the accessed information; and communicating the identified potential matches to each of the plurality of refugees.

382.content: The people who gave her the envelope to deliver to EBGOC headquarters. All of this is fitting together now: the Feds and L. Bob Rife and the Reverend Wayne's Pearly Gates and the Raft are all part of the same deal. “Who the hell are all these people?” she asked Raven when she first saw it.
382.title: Method, system, and apparatus for managing communications between a plurality of users in a virtual reality environment
382.abstract: A method, system, and apparatus are disclosed for managing communications between a plurality of users in a virtual reality (VR) environment. In one embodiment, the method comprises receiving an indication that a first VR device associated with a first user wishes to communicate with a second VR device associated with a second user. The method further comprises determining whether the first user is authorized to communicate with the second user. If it is determined that the first user is not authorized to communicate with the second user, the method comprises preventing communication between the first VR device and the second VR device. Otherwise, if it is determined that the first user is authorized to communicate with the second user, the method comprises enabling communication between the first VR device and the second VR device.

383.content: He flips open the big suitcase. The screen is still on, showing him a flat desktop display with a menu bar at the top. He uses a trackball to pull down a menu: HELP Getting ready Firing Reason Tactical tipsl Maintenance Resupply Troubleshooting Miscellaneous Under the “Getting ready” heading is more information than he could possibly want on that subject, including half an hour of badly overexposed video starring a stocky, scar-faced Asian guy whose face seems paralyzed into a permanent look of disdain. He puts on his clothes. He limbers up with special stretching exercises. He opens up Reason. He checks the barrels for damage or dirt. Hiro fast-forwards through all of this. Finally the stocky Asian man puts on the gun. Fisheye wasn't really using Reason the right way; it comes with its own mount that straps to your body so that you can soak up the recoil with your pelvis, taking the force right in your body's center of gravity. The mount has shock absorbers and miniature hydraulic goodies to compensate for the weight and the recoil. If you put all this stuff on the right way, the gun's a lot easier to use accurately. And if you're goggled into a computer, it'll superimpose a handy cross hairs over whatever the gun's aimed at. “Your information, sir,” the Librarian says. “Are you smart enough to tie that information into YOU ARE HERE?” Hiro says. “I'll see what I can do, sir. The formats appear to be reconcilable. Sir?” “Yes?” “These blueprints are several years old. Since they were made, the Enterprise has been purchased by a private owner—” “Who may have made some changes. Gotcha.” Hiro's back in Reality. He finds an open boulevard of water that leads inward to the Core. It has a sort of pedestrian catwalk running along one side of it, pieced together haphazardly, a seemingly endless procession of gangplanks, pontoons, logs, abandoned skiffs, aluminum canoes, oil drums. Anywhere else in the world, it would be an obstacle course; here in the Fifth World, it's a superhighway.
383.title: Method and apparatus for controlling a virtual reality environment based on a user's physiological state
383.abstract: A method of controlling a virtual reality environment includes obtaining, by an electronic device, biometric data associated with a user; determining, by the electronic device, whether the biometric data satisfies one or more predetermined thresholds; in response to determining that the biometric data satisfies the one or more predetermined thresholds, identifying, by the electronic device, at least one sensory stimulus provided to the user via a head-mounted display (HMD); and providing, by the electronic device, the at least one sensory stimulus to the HMD. Corresponding systems and computer program products are also disclosed.

384.content: “What?” she says into the phone. A computer voice tells her that she is supposed to make a pickup in Griffith Park and deliver it to a Reverend Wayne's Pearly Gates franchise in Van Nuys. “If you want something delivered from point A to point B, why don't you just drive it down there yourselves?” Y.T. asks. “Put it in one of those black Lincoln Town Cars and just get it done.” “Because in this case, the something doesn't exactly belong to us, and the people at point A and point B, well, we aren't necessarily on the best of terms, mutually speaking.” “You want me to steal something,” Y.T. says.
384.title: Apparatus and method for delivering an object from a patient's body
384.abstract: An apparatus for delivering an object from a patient's body is disclosed. The apparatus comprises at least one elongate shaft having a proximal end and a distal end, wherein the distal end of the at least one elongate shaft defines a lumen extending therethrough. A first expandable member is secured to the distal end of the at least one elongate shaft such that the first expandable member is movable between a collapsed configuration and an expanded configuration. At least one second expandable member is secured to the distal end of the at least one elongate shaft such that the at least one second expandable member is movable between a collapsed configuration and an expanded configuration.

385.content: If one's native tongue influences the physical structure of the developing brain, then it is fair to say that the Sumerians—who spoke a language radically different from anything in existence today—had fundamentally different brains from yours. Lagos believed that for this reason, Sumerian was a language ideally suited to the creation and propagation of viruses. That a virus, once released into Sumer, would spread rapidly and virulently, until it had infected everyone. ” “Maybe Enki knew that also,” Hiro says.
385.title: Method and apparatus for detecting and treating viral infections
385.abstract: A method of diagnosing or treating a viral infection includes administering to a subject an effective amount of at least one compound selected from the group consisting of (i) N-acetylcysteine, (ii) glutathione, (iii) ascorbic acid, (iv) alpha lipoic acid, (v) resveratrol, (vi) curcumin, (vii) quercetin, (viii) epigallocatechin gallate, (ix) grape seed extract, (x) pterostilbene, (xi) genistein, (xii) sulforaphane, (xiii) indole-3-carbinol, (xiv) pioglitazone, (xv) metformin, (xvi) ibuprofen, (xvii) celecoxib, (xvi

386.content: This language—the mother tongue—is a vestige of an earlier phase of human social development. Primitive societies were controlled by verbal rules called me. The me were like little programs for humans. They were a necessary part of the transition from caveman society to an organized, agricultural society. For example, there was a program for plowing a furrow in the ground and planting grain. There was a program for baking bread and another one for making a house. There were also me for higher-level functions such as war, diplomacy, and religious ritual. All the skills required to operate a self-sustaining culture were contained in these me, which were written down on tablets or passed around in an oral tradition. In any case, the repository for the me was the local temple, which was a database of me, controlled by a priest/king called an en. When someone needed bread, they would go to the en or one of his underlings and download the bread-making me from the temple. Then they would carry out the instructions—run the program—and when they were finished, they'd have a loaf of bread. “A central database was necessary, among other reasons, because some of the me had to be properly timed.
386.title: Method and apparatus for controlling human behavior
386.abstract: A method of controlling human behavior is provided. The method includes receiving, by an electronic device from a user wearing the electronic device, one or more biometric signals indicative of at least one physiological state of the user over a period of time; determining, by the electronic device during the period of time, when the user is experiencing emotional distress based on the one or more biometric signals; in response to determining that the user is experiencing emotional distress, presenting, by the electronic device, stimulus information to the user via a graphical user interface (GUI), wherein the stimulus information comprises content designed to alleviate the emotional distress experienced by the user as indicated by the one or more biometric signals; and responsive to presentation of the stimulus information, receiving, by the electronic device from the user, feedback indicating whether the presented stimulus information alleviated the emotional dist

387.content: “Computers rely on the one and the zero to represent all things. This distinction between something and nothing—this pivotal separation between being and nonbeing—is quite fundamental and underlies many Creation myths.” Hiro feels his face getting slightly warm, feels himself getting annoyed. He suspects that the Librarian may be pulling his leg, playing him for a fool. But he knows that the Librarian, however convincingly rendered he may be, is just a piece of software and cannot actually do such things. “Even the word ‘science' comes from an Indo-European root meaning ‘to cut' or ‘to separate.' The same root led to the word ‘shit,' which of course means to separate living flesh from nonliving waste. The same root gave us ‘scythe' and ‘scissors' and ‘schism,' which have obvious connections to the concept of separation.”
387.title: Method, system, and computer-readable storage media for providing a virtual reality (VR) environment
387.abstract: A method of providing a virtual reality (VR) environment includes receiving an indication to provide the VR environment. The method also includes determining that one or more sensors associated with at least one computing device are within a predetermined proximity of each other. The method further includes transmitting instructions from the first computing device to the second computing device instructing the second computing device to generate the VR environment. The method additionally includes causing generation of the VR environment by the second computing device in accordance with the instructions received from the first computing device.

388.content: “Some language I didn't recognize,” Da5id says. “Just a bunch of babble.” Babble. Babel.
388.title: Systems and methods for detecting anomalies in communications
388.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for detecting anomalies in communications. In one implementation, a method includes receiving, by a computing device from a first user equipment (UE), a request to establish a communication session between the first UE and a second UE; determining, by the computing device, an indication that the communication session was established between the first UE and the second UE; obtaining, by the computing device, data associated with the communication session; analyzing, by the computing device, the data associated with the communication session using at least one machine-learning model configured to determine whether there is an anomaly in the communication session; identifying, by the computing device, an anomaly in the communication session when the analysis indicates that there is an anomaly in the communication session; and initiating, by the computing device, a remedial action corresponding to the identified anomaly. Other implementations are also disclosed herein.

389.content: As they approach, the guys on the deck sit up, take notice, draw revolvers out of their waistbands. But then Tranny speaks up in a happy stream of Tagalog. And everything changes. Tranny gets the full Prodigal Son welcome: crying, hysterical fat ladies, a swarm of little kids piling out of their hammocks, sucking their thumbs and jumping up and down. Older men beaming, showing great gaps and black splotches in their smiles, watching and nodding and diving in to give him the occasional hug. And on the edge of the mob, way back in the darkness, is another wirehead. “You come in, too,” says one of the women, a lady in her forties named Eunice.
389.title: Apparatus and method for detecting and locating a person in need of assistance
389.abstract: A system is provided for detecting and locating a person in need of assistance. The system includes a plurality of sensors configured to generate sensor data indicative of an environment within which the plurality of sensors are disposed, at least one processor coupled to the plurality of sensors, wherein the at least one processor is configured to receive the sensor data generated by the plurality of sensors from the plurality of sensors, analyze the sensor data received from the plurality of sensors to determine whether there is a presence of a person in need of assistance within the environment, and upon determining that there is a presence of a person in need of assistance within the environment, transmit a location of the person in need of assistance to a remote computing device.

390.content: Then he unties his shoelaces and pulls his shoes off. He takes his socks off, too, and stuffs them into the shoes. He takes the straight razor out of his pocket, flips it open, and slits both of his trouser legs from the hem up to his groin, then bunches the material up and cuts it off.

391.content: Her date is a Clint. Brandy and Clint are both popular, off-the-shelf models. When white-trash high school girls are going on a date in the Metaverse, they invariably run down to the computer-games section of the local Wal-Mart and buy a copy of Brandy. The user can select three breast sizes: improbable, impossible, and ludicrous. Brandy has a limited repertoire of facial expressions: cute and pouty; cute and sultry; perky and interested; smiling and receptive; cute and spacy. Her eyelashes are half an inch long, and the software is so cheap that they are rendered as solid ebony chips.
391.title: Method and apparatus for generating a virtual reality avatar
391.abstract: A method of generating a virtual reality avatar is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of: (a) obtaining at least one image; (b) extracting features from the at least one image; (c) classifying the extracted features into feature classes; (d) determining anatomical landmarks in the at least one image; (e) aligning the determined anatomical landmarks with pre-determined anatomical landmarks, wherein the pre-determined anatomical landmarks are stored in a reference database; (f) transforming the aligned anatomical landmarks to produce transformed anatomical landmarks; (g) calculating pose parameters using the transformed anatomical landmarks; and (h) applying the pose parameters to generate a three-dimensional model of the virtual reality avatar. An apparatus for generating a virtual reality avatar is also disclosed.

392.content: Some of them are talking to gringos from the Industry. And a large part of the quadrant, in the back corner, has been screened off by a temporary partition. Bigboard again. Hiro figures out which tables are behind the partition, starts reading off the names. The only one he recognizes immediately is an American: L. Bob Rife, the cable-television monopolist. A very big name to the Industry, though he's rarely seen. He seems to be meeting with a whole raft of big Nipponese honchos. Hiro has his computer memorize their names so that, later, he can check them against the CIC database and find out who they are. It has the look of a big and important meeting. “Secret Agent Hiro! How are you doing?” Hiro turns around. Juanita is right behind him, standing out in her black-and-white avatar, looking good anyway.
392.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for managing data. In some implementations, a method includes identifying, by a processor, a plurality of data objects stored in a plurality
392.abstract: methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for managing data. In some implementations, a method includes identifying, by a processor, a plurality of data objects stored in a plurality

393.content: He has switched over to his small, invisible avatar. He is hovering in the air now above the shattered remains of the egg; gravity takes him right down into the center of it. As he falls, he is muttering to himself: “SnowScan.” It's the piece of software he wrote while he was killing time on the liferaft. The one that searches for Snow Crash. With Hiro Protagonist seemingly gone from the stage, the hackers turn their attention toward the giant construction rising up out of the egg. All that nonsense with the sword fight must have been just a wacky introductory piece—Hiro's typically offbeat way of getting their attention. This light and sound show is the main attraction. The amphitheater is now filling up rapidly as thousands of hackers pour in from all over the place: running down the Street from The Black Sun, streaming out of the big office towers where the major software corporations are headquartered, goggling into the Metaverse from all points in Reality as word of the extravaganza spreads down the fiber-optic grapevine at the speed of light. The light show is designed as if late comers were anticipated. It builds to false climax after false climax, like an expensive fireworks show, and each one is better.
393.title: Method and apparatus for searching for a digital object in a computer network
393.abstract: A method of searching for a digital object in a computer network includes receiving, by a computing device from a search engine, a request to search for the digital object; determining, by the computing device, whether the digital object is stored locally at the computing device; responsive to determining that the digital object is not stored locally at the computing device, transmitting, by the computing device, metadata associated with the digital object to the search engine; and responsive to determining that the digital object is stored locally at the computing device, providing, by the computing device, the digital object to the search engine. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

394.content: “And then came television, and the Reverend Wayne, backed up by the vast media power of L. Bob Rife. The behavior that the Reverend Wayne promulgates through his television shows, pamphlets, and franchises can be traced in an unbroken line back to the Pentecostal cults of early Christianity, and from there back to pagan glossolalia cults.
394.title: Apparatus and method for producing glossolalia
394.abstract: An apparatus configured to produce glossolalia is disclosed. The apparatus may include at least one microphone configured to receive an audio signal from a user, wherein the audio signal comprises vocalizations of the user; at least one speaker configured to output audible feedback in response to the audio signal received by the at least one microphone; and at least one light emitting diode (LED) configured to output visual feedback in response to the audio signal received by the at least one microphone.

395.content: Hiro hangs up and walks into the new room. The Librarian follows. It is about fifty feet on a side. The center of the space is occupied by three large artifacts, or rather three-dimensional renderings of artifacts. In the center is a thick slab of baked clay, hanging in space, about the size of a coffee table, and about a foot thick. Hiro suspects that it is a magnified rendering of a smaller object. The broad surfaces of the slab are entirely covered with angular writing that Hiro recognizes as cuneiform. Around the edges are rounded, parallel depressions that appear to have been made by fingers as they shaped the slab. To the right of the slab is a wooden pole with branches on top, sort of a stylized tree. To the left of the slab is an eight-foot-high obelisk, also covered with cuneiform, with a bas-relief figure chiseled into the top. The room is filled with a three-dimensional constellation of hypercards, hanging weightlessly in the air. It looks like a high-speed photograph of a blizzard in progress. In some places, the hypercards are placed in precise geometric patterns, like atoms in a crystal. In other places, whole stacks of them are clumped together.
395.title: Method and apparatus for accessing and manipulating electronic information using a graphical user interface
395.abstract: A method of providing access to, and manipulation of, electronic information is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) presenting at least one visual element in a graphical user interface; (b) capturing an image of the presented visual element(s); (c) extracting from the captured image data relating to said visual element(s); (d) comparing the extracted data with pre-stored reference data corresponding to predetermined types of visual elements so as to determine which type of visual element or combination of visual elements has been imaged; and (e) determining whether any action needs to be taken in relation to the determined type of visual element or combination of visual elements. An apparatus for carrying out the method is also disclosed.

396.content: “The belief in the magical power of language is not unusual, both in mystical and academic literature. The Kabbalists—Jewish mystics of Spain and Palestine—believed that supernormal insight and power could be derived from properly combining the letters of the Divine Name.
396.title: Apparatus and method for enhancing cognitive abilities
396.abstract: An apparatus, system and method for enhancing cognitive abilities is disclosed. The apparatus comprises an electroencephalogram (EEG) headset having at least one EEG sensor configured to detect electrical activity in the brain of a user wearing the EEG headset. A processing unit coupled to the EEG headset is configured to receive data from the at least one EEG sensor indicative of the electrical activity detected by the at least one EEG sensor when the user wears the EEG headset. The processing unit is further configured to analyze the data received from the at least one EEG sensor to determine whether the user's cognitive abilities have been enhanced as a result of using the EEG headset. In response to determining that the user's cognitive abilities have been enhanced, the processing unit may provide feedback to the user indicating that the user's cognitive abilities

397.content: Hiro has pinched one of Da5id's beers from the fridge, and he sits up here for a while, in what used to be his favorite place, drinking his beer slowly, like he used to, reading stories in the lights. The old central neighborhoods are packed in tight below an eternal, organic haze. In other cities, you breathe industrial contaminants, but in L.A., you breathe amino acids. The hazy sprawl is ringed and netted with glowing lines, like hot wires in a toaster. At the outlet of the canyon, it comes close enough that the light sharpens and breaks up into stars, arches, glowing letters. Streams of red and white corpuscles throb down highways to the fuzzy logic of intelligent traffic lights. Farther away, spreading across the basin, a million sprightly logos smear into solid arcs, like geometric points merging into curves. To either side of the franchise ghettos, the loglo dwindles across a few shallow layers of development and into a surrounding dimness that is burst here and there by the blaze of a security spotlight in someone's backyard. The franchise and the virus work on the same principle: what thrives in one place will thrive in another. You just have to find a sufficiently virulent business plan, condense it into a three-ring binder—its DNA—xerox it, and embed it in the fertile lining of a well-traveled highway, preferably one with a left-turn lane. Then the growth will expand until it runs up against its property lines. In olden times, you'd wander down to Mom's Cafe for a bite to eat and a cup of joe, and you would feel right at home. It worked just fine if you never left your home-own. But if you went to the next town over, everyone would look up and stare at you when you came in the door, and the Blue Plate Special would be something you didn't recognize.
397.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer-readable storage medium, for facilitating an interaction between a user and a chain restaurant. In one aspect, the method includes presenting, via a graphical user
397.abstract: interface of a mobile application executing on a mobile device associated with the user, a plurality of menu items corresponding to food items offered by the chain restaurant; in response to receiving input from the user indicating selection of a first menu item included in the plurality of menu items, determining that the first menu item is not currently available at the chain restaurant; responsive to determining that the first menu item is not currently available at the chain restaurant, transmitting instructions to cause preparation of the first menu item according to recipe information associated with the first menu item; and upon completion of preparation of the first menu item, transmitting instructions to cause delivery of the first menu item to the chain restaurant.

398.content: He has a large office with French doors and a balcony looking out over endless rice paddies where little Vietnamese people work. Clearly, this guy is a fairly hardcore techie, because Y.T. counts hundreds of people out in his rice paddies, plus dozens more running around the village, all of them fairly well rendered and all of them doing different things. She's not a bithead, but she knows that this guy is throwing a lot of computer time into the task of creating a realistic view out his office window. And the fact that it's Vietnam makes it twisted and spooky. Y.T. can't wait to tell Roadkill about this place. She wonders if it has bombings and strafings and napalm drops. That would be the best. Ng himself, or at least, Ng's avatar, is a small, very dapper Vietnamese man in his fifties, hair plastered to his head, wearing military-style khakis.
398.title: Systems and methods for providing an augmented reality interface for controlling an autonomous vehicle
398.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for providing an augmented reality interface for controlling an autonomous vehicle. In one implementation, a method includes receiving sensor data from sensors associated with an autonomous vehicle (AV), wherein the AV is operating in an autonomous mode; determining that the AV is to be controlled by a user; generating an augmented reality image using at least a portion of the sensor data; transmitting the augmented reality image to a head-mounted device worn by the user; displaying the augmented reality image on a display of the head-mounted device; allowing the user to interact with the augmented reality image via the head-mounted device; and controlling operation of the AV based on interactions between the user and the augmented reality image.

399.content: “The reason you know that is because you found it in Lagos's stack. And the reason Lagos bothered to look it up is because he was doing market research. Looking for someone who might pay him hard cash for the stuff he dug up in the Babel/Infocalypse stack.” “He thought,” Hiro says, “that L. Bob Rife might have a use for some viruses.” “Right. See, I don't understand all this shit. But I guess he found an old virus or something that was aimed at the elite thinkers.” “The technological priesthood,” Hiro says. “The infocrats. It wiped out the whole infocracy of Sumer.”
399.title: Methods, systems, and apparatus, including computer programs encoded on a computer storage medium, for maneuvering a cognizant agent. One of the methods includes receiving, by a cognizant maneuvering system from a cogniz
399.abstract: system, an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV), or both, sensor data indicative of one or more obstacles; generating, by the cognizant maneuvering system in response to determining that the UAV is within a predetermined proximity of at least one of the one or more obstacles, a first set of instructions comprising commands instructing the UAV to avoid the at least one of the one or more obstacles; transmitting, by the cognizant maneuvering system, the first set of instructions to the UAV; receiving, by the cognizant maneuvering system from the UAV, confirmation that the UAV has successfully avoided the at least one of the one or more obstacles; generating, by the cognizant maneuvering system in response to determining that the UAV has successfully avoided the at least one of the one or more obstacles, a second set of instructions compr

400.content: “And perhaps, because no one was listening to them, perhaps they invented the concept of good and evil in the process, as a hook.” “Hook?” “Industry term.
400.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an autonomous vehicle based on emotional state of occupant(s)
400.abstract: A method is provided for controlling an autonomous vehicle. The method includes detecting, by one or more sensors associated with the autonomous vehicle, that at least one occupant of the autonomous vehicle is experiencing an emotional state. The method also includes determining, in response to detecting that the at least one occupant of the autonomous vehicle is experiencing the emotional state, information related to the emotional state experienced by the at least one occupant of the autonomous vehicle. The method further includes adjusting operation of the autonomous vehicle based on the determined information related to the emotional state experienced by the at least one occupant of the autonomous vehicle.

401.content: Passing by the Kowloon, it picks up the smell of bacon frying and coffee brewing, and Hiro can't help but meditate on the fact that his last meal was half of a cheap beer in a Kelley's Tap in a Snooze 'n' Cruise. The scene in front of the Spectrum 2000 has devolved into a generalized roar of unbelievably loud white noise as all the people inside and outside of the hotel fire their weapons back and forth across the street. Something touches his shoulder. Hiro turns to brush it away, sees that he's looking down at a short Chinese waitress who has come down the pier from the Kowloon. Having gotten his attention, she puts her hands back where they were originally, to wit, plastered over her ears. “You Hiro Protagonist?” she mouths, basically inaudible over the ridiculous noise of the firefight. Hiro nods. She nods back, steps away from him, jerks her head toward the Kowloon. With her hands plastered over her ears this way, it looks like some kind of a folkdance move. Hiro follows her down the pier.
401.title: Method and apparatus for communicating with a user of a virtual or augmented reality system
401.abstract: A method performed by a computing device comprising one or more processors. The method comprises receiving, at the computing device from a head-mounted display (HMD) coupled to a user wearing the HMD, an indication that the user is experiencing discomfort associated with use of the HMD; in response to receiving the indication, determining whether the discomfort experienced by the user can be alleviated without compromising safety of the user; and in response to determining that the discomfort experienced by the user can be alleviated without compromising safety of the user, transmitting, to the HMD, instructions configured to cause the HMD to modify operation of the HMD such that the discomfort experienced by the user is alleviated without compromising safety of the user. Various other methods, systems, and computer-readable media are also disclosed.

402.content: Hiro is messing around in Flatland. He is doing this partly to conserve the computer's batteries; rendering a three-dimensional office takes a lot of processors working fulltime, while a simple two-dimensional desktop display requires minimal power. But his real reason for being in Flatland is that Hiro Protagonist, last of the freelance hackers, is hacking. And when hackers are hacking, they don't mess around with the superficial world of Metaverses and avatars. They descend below this surface layer and into the netherworld of code and tangled nam-shubs that supports it, where everything that you see in the Metaverse, no matter how lifelike and beautiful and three-dimensional, reduces to a simple text file: a series of letters on an electronic page. It is a throwback to the days when people programmed computers through primitive teletypes and IBM punch cards. Since then, pretty and user-friendly programming tools have been developed. It's possible to program a computer now by sitting at your desk in the Metaverse and manually connecting little preprogrammed units, like Tinkertoys. But a real hacker would never use such techniques, any more than a master auto mechanic would try to fix a car by sliding in behind the steering wheel and watching the idiot lights on the dashboard.
402.title: Systems and methods for simulating three-dimensional (3D) space in a two-dimensional (2D) environment
402.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure include systems and methods for simulating three-dimensional (3D) space in a two-dimensional (2D) environment. In one implementation, a method includes receiving an input from a user via a graphical user interface (GUI), wherein the input specifies at least one virtual object to be added to a scene displayed by the GUI. The method further includes adding the at least one virtual object to the scene being displayed by the GUI such that the at least one virtual object is positioned relative to other objects within the scene as specified by the input received from the user via the GUI.

403.content: A robot arm unfolds itself from the ceiling of the van, crisply yanks the vial from her hand, swings it around, and holds it in front of a video camera set into the dashboard. The typewritten label stuck onto the vial says, just “Testosterone.” “Ha ha, a false alarm,” Ng says. The van suddenly rips forward, starts heading right into the middle of the Sacrifice Zone. “Want to tell me what's going on?” Y.T. says, “since I have to actually do the work in this outfit?” “Cell walls,” Ng says. “The detector finds any chemical that penetrates cell walls. So we homed in naturally on a source of testosterone. A red herring.
403.title: Method and apparatus for detecting contraband
403.abstract: A method of detecting contraband in an enclosure is disclosed. The method comprises the steps of (a) emitting electromagnetic radiation into the enclosure; (b) receiving at least some of the electromagnetic radiation that has interacted with objects within the enclosure to produce scattered electromagnetic radiation; (c) analysing the scattered electromagnetic radiation to determine one or more characteristics thereof; and (d) comparing the determined one or more characteristics against predetermined threshold values, wherein if the determined one or more characteristics satisfy the predetermined threshold values then it is inferred that said object(s) contains contraband.

404.content: Hiro has an account with The Rest Stop. To live at the U-Stor-It, you sort of have to have an account. So he gets to bypass the front office where the attendant waits by the cash register. He shoves his membership card into a slot, and a computer screen lights up with three choices: M F NURSERY (UNISEX) Hiro slaps the “M” button. Then the screen changes to a menu of four choices: OUR SPECIAL LIMITED FACILITIES— THRIFTY BUT SANITARY STANDARD FACILITIES—JUST LIKE HOME—MAYBE JUST A LITTLE BETTER PRIME FACILITIES—A GRACIOUS PLACE FOR THE DISCRIMINATING PATRON THE LAVATORY GRANDE ROYALE He has to override a well-worn reflex to stop himself from automatically punching SPECIAL LIMITED FACILITIES, which is what he and all the other U-Stor-It residents always use.
404.title: Apparatus and method for storing and dispensing items
404.abstract: An apparatus for storing and dispensing an item includes a housing having a first end, a second end opposite the first end, and a plurality of sides extending between the first end and the second end. The apparatus further includes a door pivotably coupled to the housing such that the door is movable between a closed position in which the door covers at least a portion of the first end of the housing and an open position in which the door uncovers at least a portion of the first end of the housing.

405.content: “Thanks.” “It's just for fun,” he says, “but if you ever get into trouble, and you show those dog tags to whoever it is that's giving you a bad time, then things will probably change very quickly.” “Thanks, Uncle Enzo.”
405.title: Method and apparatus for presenting an avatar in a virtual reality environment based on a user's emotional state
405.abstract: A method of controlling the presentation of an avatar in a virtual reality (VR) environment is disclosed. The method comprises detecting, via one or more sensors, at least one physiological parameter associated with a user wearing a VR head-mounted display (HMD). The method further comprises determining, based on the detected at least one physiological parameter, an emotional state of the user. The method additionally comprises selecting, based on the determined emotional state of the user, content to be presented by the avatar within the VR environment. Furthermore, the method comprises causing the selected content to be presented by the avatar within the VR environment.

406.content: Some of them try to scam, to sneak a few bills into their pocket when they think the security camera isn't watching, and run down the street to the nearest Caymans Plus or The Alps franchulate, which hover in these areas like flies on road kill. But these people rapidly find out that in Narcolombia, just about everything is a capital offense, and there is no judicial system to speak of, just flying justice squads that have the right to blow into your franchulate any time of day or night and fax your records back to the notoriously picky computer in Medellín.
406.title: Compositions and methods for treating or preventing narcolepsy, narcolepsy-cataplexy, hypersomnolence, sleep apnea, obesity, diabetes, depression, anxiety
406.abstract: Provided herein are compositions comprising (R)-3,5-dihydroxybenzaldehyde. Also provided herein are methods of using the compounds and compositions to treat conditions such as narcolepsy, narcolepsy-cataplexy, hypersomnolence, sleep apnea, obesity, diabetes, depression, anxiety, cognitive impairment, Parkinson's disease, Alzheimer's disease, amyotrophic lateral sclerosis, multiple sclerosis, schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, attention deficit hyperactivity disorder, post-traumatic stress disorder, obsessive-compulsive disorder, chronic pain, cocaine addiction, heroin addiction, nicotine addiction, withdrawal symptoms associated with opioid receptor antagonists,

407.content: He runs in toward the fuselage on silent, bare feet, ducks beneath it, and comes up from underneath with his straight razor in one hand. The assassin—Raven—is right where Enzo expected him. But Raven is already getting suspicious; he stands up to look over the top of the fuselage, and that puts his throat out of reach.
407.title: Method and system for controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV)
407.abstract: A method of controlling an unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) includes receiving, by the UAV, one or more sensor signals from one or more sensors associated with the UAV. The method also includes determining, by the UAV, that at least one of the one or more sensor signals is indicative of hazardous weather conditions proximate to the UAV. The method further includes transmitting, by the UAV, a command signal to a ground station in response to determining that at least one of the one or more sensor signals is indicative of hazardous weather conditions proximate to the UAV. The command signal instructs the ground station to take control of the UAV so as to direct the UAV away from the hazardous weather conditions. Finally, the method includes receiving, by the UAV, confirmation that the ground station has taken control of the UAV.

408.content: They have the twangy sound that you always hear from Vietnamese when they are in the back rooms of stores and restaurants carrying on family disputes in the mother tongue, but as far as Y.T. can tell, they aren't real words, just sound effects. “Do you work a lot for these guys?” Y.T. asks. “Occasional small security jobs. Unlike most large corporations, the Mafia has a strong tradition of handling its own security arrangements. But when something especially technical is called for—” He pauses in the middle of this sentence to make an incredible zooming sound in his nose.
408.title: Systems and methods for managing security arrangements in a mafia-like organization
408.abstract: Implementations of the present disclosure relate to systems and methods for managing security arrangements in a mafia-like organization. In one implementation, a computer-implemented method may include receiving an indication that a first user is interested in joining a mafia-like organization (MMO), wherein the MMO comprises a plurality of users; determining whether the first user satisfies at least one predetermined criterion associated with the MMO; responsive to determining that the first user satisfies the at least one predetermined criterion, assigning the first user as a member of the MMO by associating the first user with other members of the MMO via a blockchain network; and facilitating communication between the first user and other members of the MMO via the blockchain network.

409.content: “The social structure of any nation-state is ultimately determined by its security arrangements,” Ng says, “and Mr. Lee understands this.” Oh, wow, we're going to be profound now. Ng is suddenly talking just like the old white men on the TV pundit powwows, which Y.T.'s mother watches obsessively. “Instead of hiring a large human security force—which impacts the social environment—you know, lots of minimum-wage earners standing around carrying machine guns—Mr. Lee prefers to use nonhuman systems.” Nonhuman systems. Y.T. is about to ask him, what do you know about the Rat Thing.
409.title: Method and apparatus for controlling an autonomous vehicle
409.abstract: A method of controlling an autonomous vehicle is disclosed. The method comprises detecting, by one or more sensors associated with the autonomous vehicle, at least one object in proximity to the autonomous vehicle; determining whether the at least one object is likely to interact with the autonomous vehicle; responsive to determining that the at least one object is likely to interact with the autonomous vehicle, predicting how the at least one object will interact with the autonomous vehicle over a predetermined period of time; and controlling movement of the autonomous vehicle during the predetermined period of time according to the predicted interaction between the at least one object and the autonomous vehicle.

410.content: Y.T. establishes her space on the pavement by zagging mightily from lane to lane, establishing a precedent of scary randomness. Keeps people on their toes, makes them react to her, instead of the other way round. Now these men are trying to put her in a box, make her follow rules. She unzips her coverall all the way down below her navel.
410.title: Method and apparatus for controlling a self-driving vehicle
410.abstract: A method of controlling a self-driving vehicle includes receiving, by an electronic control unit (ECU) of the self-driving vehicle, sensor data from at least one sensor associated with the self-driving vehicle; determining, by the ECU, whether there is a risk of collision between the self-driving vehicle and another object using the sensor data; in response to determining that there is no risk of collision between the self-driving vehicle and the other object, transmitting, by the ECU, driving instructions to actuators of the self-driving vehicle so as to drive the self-driving vehicle along a predetermined travel path; and in response to determining that there is a risk of collision between the self-driving vehicle and the other object, stopping or slowing down the self-driving vehicle.

411.content: Raven pulls it out, drops to one knee, and swings his knife hand around in a long ellipse between T-Bone's thighs. Then he jumps over T-Bone's collapsing body and runs. Hiro gets the sense that T-Bone is a dead man, so he follows Raven. His intention is not to hunt the man down, but rather to maintain a very clear picture of where he is. He has to cut through a number of rows.
411.title: Method and apparatus for locating and tracking a person of interest
411.abstract: A method, system, and computer program product to locate and track a person of interest (POI) are disclosed. In one embodiment, the method comprises obtaining location information associated with a plurality of mobile devices in an area; determining that at least one of the plurality of mobile devices is within a predetermined distance of a POI; identifying movement data associated with the at least one of the plurality of mobile devices over a period of time; analyzing the movement data to determine whether the at least one of the plurality of mobile devices is moving toward or away from the POI; and responsive to determining that the at least one of the plurality of mobile devices is moving toward the POI, initiating surveillance of the POI.
